name: Apartment for sale
description:
This beautiful apartment is located in Ancona, historical town on the east coast of Italy, immersed in the land of the sunflowers. Ancona is the main city in the Marche region, a soft hills area that borders the Adriatic Sea. Ancona is located a few km from the town of Loreto, and minutes from the splendid beaches of Porto Novo and Sirolo. The park of  Monte Conero is a national park with trails that bring directly to hidden beaches, or on the top of the mountain to enjoy the view of the blue sea.
The port of Ancona offers ferry service to Greece and Croatia. 
The position of the  apartment is ideal both in winter and summer. The lively and friendly  city of Ancona offers shopping and entratainment for families, couples, and singles. It is close to major Italian historical sites(Loreto 30 minutes, Venice 3.5 hrs, Rome 3hrs), and airports (Ancona, Rimini, and Pescara).

description:

Перфектен, панорамен четиристаен мезонет с площ от 183 кв. м на 4 и 5 етажи в луксозна пететажна сграда от 2004г. с отлични общи части и хидравличен асансьор, на ул. 'Тунджа' /до НДК/. РАЗПРЕДЕЛЕНИЕ: ПЪРВО НИВО: просторна дневна с камина, свързана с трапезария и светъл кухненски бокс, спалня с прилежаща баня (с хидро-масажорна вана) и тоалетна, мокро помещение, закрита тераса - оформена като зимна градина. ВТОРО НИВО: две спални с баня (душ-кабина) и тоалетна и две панорамни тераси. Всички помещения са много слънчеви, а камината и вътрешната стълба създават изключителен уют и атмосфера. Имотът е отличен както за живеене, така и за ИНВЕСТИЦИЯ. ПОДОВИ НАСТИЛКИ: кухненски бокс (напълно оборудван, с вградени уреди) и входно антре - гранитогрес, дневна и стаи - ламинат, санитарни помещения - луксозен фаянс, теракота. Тераси – гранитогрес. ИЗЛОЖЕНИЕ: дневна и трапезарията - ИЗТОК/ЮГ/ЗАПАД, спалня - ИЗТОК, на второто ниво спалните - ИЗТОК и ЮГ. Към апартамента има мазе, идеални части от земята.  Апартамента се предлага без обзавеждането.

name: The Eagle's Nest/My Salerno Apartment B&B
description:
Take the stairs away from chaos to an eclectic slice of zen overlooking the Amalfi Coast at our home ‘The Eagle's Nest.’

A lovely spot if you are looking for peace & tranquility near nature…
But still want to have access to tourism-hot spots and great places to eat.

Where are we?
Our B&B is located in a lovely, quiet village - a beautiful undiscovered gem ovelooking the Amalfi Coast near hiking and nature trails, and only a few minutes from Vietri sul Mare.
By car or bus we are: 
•15-20 minutes from Salerno
•5-10 minutes to Marina di Albori where there is a beach (lido - beach club with umbrella and chair rental), and 5 minutes from Vietri Sul Mare (lido - beach club with umbrella and chair rental) 
Our location is accessible to: 
•Public transport 
•Buses to Amalfi and Positano (from Vietri sul Mare) 
•Local direct bus to the Salerno Port (15 minutes) where you can take ferrys to Amalfi, Positano, and Capri. 
•Pompeii is easily reachable by train from the station at Vietri sul Mare (5 minutes away by bus)

Are you close to the sites?
Our B&B is very accessible to the Amalfi Coast transit and we can provide all the info. you need to plan your day trips and get the best out of your vacation! Via transit you can make connections to stations in Naples, Pompeii, Vietri sul Mare-Amalfi Coast, Paestum or Salerno (and also the ferry docks to get to the Amalfi Coast hot-spots). 
There is also a hiking trail within walking distance where you can see an incredible view of the Amalfi Coast, Salerno, and many villages from one vantage point. 

The rooms?
There are 2 bedrooms to choose from. Both are airy and spacious and there is a lovely view of the mountains and/or sea, and a small common-area balcony where you can sit out and relax.
There is a shared bathroom, an eating area and a kitchen with all amenities.

The main-floor large room is equipped with Bathtub - this room is 80EUR/night in high season
The 2nd floor is a comfortable guestroom 70EUR per night in high season.
Please inquire for weekly rates.

What’s included?
We provide a light breakfast including tea and/or espresso coffee in the mornings. You are welcome to store food items in the kitchen, and there is a cafe just a short distance away. They carry fresh pastries.
Also complimentary are towels, linens, beach towels, internet access, map, transit info.
A washing machine is also available to do laundry (at 3EUR per load).

What amenities are nearby?
There is also a mini-supermarket as well as other food vendors, just a minute’s walk from the apartment where you can find essentials. There are also coffee bars and a restaurant less than 10 minutes away on foot, and if you take the bus just 5 minutes away there is a plethora of eateries!

Is there parking?
Parking is on the street main street. Depending on volume, you may have to park about a maximum 2 min-walk away. Not usually further.


Is there anything else I should know?
The bathroom is shared, there is a washing machine (nominal charge for usage), and a kitchen with all amenities. If you wish to use the kitchen to cook meals - please INFORM us during the reservation process as there is a nominal EXTRA charge. We kindly request our guests do not cook or store meat/fish in the kitchen as we are vegetarian and the house is sometimes used as a holistic retreat. Thanks!

Please take note: 
As our location is higher up and overlooking the sea, you must take some stairs to reach us. Although we, (and so far our guests) think it's well worth the climb - it may not be suitable for parents travelling with young children, seniors, or others with health issues. (Otherwise most say after walking up 3 or 4 times - it's no problem!) 
That said, if you are travelling with huge, heavy bags it may be tedious for you getting to the house. 

Little Extras

NEW! Sailboat excursions organized along the coast! (Starting from mid-June, subject to availability, minimum 2 people) you can have a dip in the sea from a 35foot sailboat and enjoy the sun and sea, and views from the coast! Pricing depends on length of excursion and locale travelled to - for more info and please inquire with 
us!

Fluent English, Spanish and Italian spoken!

name: Apartment for sale in old town Verona
description:
Some information about the location and history :
The apartment is located at the last two floors of an ancient palace originally builded in the second half of 1.700. Amazing testimony is the wooden carved and painted ceiling in the entrance. All the building was totally restored and the works finished in 2006. Via Scrimiari n.6 it means only 500m. to Piazza Erbe and 800m. to Piazza Bra (the most famous squares of the town) in the oldest area of Verona where the first inhabitants settle down and start to build what would become one of the most beautiful, stunning and spectacular cities all over Italy. Arena, Castel Vecchio, Basilica di San Zeno and Teatro Romano are only some examples for which this town is the 4^ most visited in Italy from turists (after Venice, Florence and Rome). The name “Scrimiari” takes probably origin from the several workshops (in 1.700 were located above all here) specialized creating and selling caskets (scrigno in Italian language). The road is quiet and only one way, but anyway the apartment appears in the inner side of the buiding. You’ll see roofs and other old buildings in an absolute silent atmosphere, feeling to live in countryside and not in a noisy town. 

As said the building finished to be complitly restored in 2006 and the apartment was totally remade on the project of a creative Architect that changed all the plans giving a modern a minimalist style even for the furnishings advised to the owner. Simplicity, design and good taste that all mixed together give the pleasant feeling to be in a very friendly and cozy place called Home. It’s really a little jewel for people of good taste who can only fall in love for it.

Totally the apartment is about 150 sqm on two floors. At the first : an open-space divided in two areas by a wall with in one side the library, tv etc. and in the other side kitchen with table etc. ; a bathroom ; a lumber room ; a bedroom (used now as study) ; a balcony. At the second : a bedroom ; a bathroom : a terrace.

name: Clinton Hill Studio Apartment for Sale
description:
This bright and spacious first floor studio apartment (Apt. 102) is the perfect home for many.  Whether you are a first-time homebuyer, a student, a couple saving for the future, or a retiree, this is a wonderful space to call your own. 

The large main room has space for living, dining, and sleeping, and the apartment boasts a beautiful solid oak Murphy bed which complements the parquet floors.  It features a wall of oversized windows which welcome plenty of natural light. The kitchen has an abundance of cabinet space, a tile floor, and a new sink and silestone countertop.  There is also ample closet space as well as a dressing alcove.  

Willoughby Walk Cooperative Apartments is a 100% owner occupied cooperative building located on Willoughby Avenue across from the Pratt Institute's stunning campus and delightful sculpture garden.  The building has solid financials and is well-serviced by a 24-hour maintenance and security staff.  There is a laundry room and storage in the basement.  Dogs and cats are welcome.  The building is a half mile from Fort Greene Park and short walking distance to a grocery store, pharmacy, post office, and countless restaurants, bars, and boutiques along DeKalb and Myrtle Avenues.  This beautiful, historic neighborhood is incredibly diverse and dynamic, and it is central to all that Brooklyn has to offer.  

Transportation options are plentiful with the Clinton/Washington G stop, B38, B54, and B69 all in walking distance.  And the LIRR and subway hub at Atlantic Terminal are just 2 miles away.  Parking is also available on the street and there is a waiting list for private parking in the building's lot.  Don’t miss this wonderful opportunity to become a homeowner in one of the most appealing neighborhoods in Brooklyn.

Low monthly maintenance of $418 is 45% tax deductible.

For more information, please visit us online at www.clintonhillstudio.com.

name: Amazing Apartment for Sale in Banani
description:
Built by Assurance Developments, this immaculate apartment is on the third floor of a 10 storied building. It is on the South and East facing corner, fronting a wide and leafy street. The apartment is 2815 sq. is feet in total, including car parking and common shared spaces. It has 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 4 verandahs, a large living area perfect for entertaining, well-equipped kitchen with gas connection and maid’s room.

With excellent cross-ventilation, and open views looking out onto the green, quiet neighbourhood, the apartment has access to plenty of natural light and air, so rare in Dhaka's urban jungle. There is also full electricity loading available and AC connections in all rooms. The landscaped rooftop garden provides a lovely getaway for a quiet evening, and along with the community space, is also available for parties. The building has two stairways, including one fire exit. The car park and ground floor is equipped with sprinklers and a full firefighting system for the whole building.

This street is one of the last, quiet and exclusive residential pockets of Banani, with many independent houses still standing. Just a few minutes from Airport Road and Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Gulshan 2 and the Banani commercial hubs. There are parks, masjids, shopping centres and restaurants within walking distance, making this spot one of the most sought-after in the Banani area.

name: 3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Zabbar (near Smart City)
description:
The apartment consists of a very large and bright Open Plan (Kitchen / Dining / Living), three bedrooms, bathroom and ensuite.
 
As it can be seen from the pictures, this apartment boasts country views and distant sea-views of the Mediterranean. The area is called St. Peter's Area (in Zabbar) and it is a very quiet area.
 
The apartment is on the third floor and has elevator facilities.  It is situated in the south-east of the country which is of a historical and of a strategic importance:
 
- 2 minutes away from SmartCity Malta
- 10 Minutes away from M’Scala and the Airport
- 2 Minutes away from the Rocky Beaches of Xghajra and Kalkara.
- 5 Minutes away from the Historic Three Cities
 
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/3-Bedroom-Apartment-for-Sale-in-Zabbar-near-Smart-City/241355299235344
 
Additional Information on Smart City (Malta)
SmartCity Malta is located on the island’s eastern coastline, providing spectacular views of the Mediterranean. It lies just south of Valletta, Malta’s capital, and is approximately 5 km away from the international airport.  SmartCity Malta is a purpose-built, state-of-the-art economic centre developed to incorporate all the essential elements organisations need to excel, all set in environmentally friendly surroundings. For more details on Smart City visit http://malta.smartcity.ae The land value in the next decade is expected to rise.
 
Additional Information on Haz-Zabbar 
Ħaż-Żabbar is bound to the north by Kalkara and Xgħajra, to the west by Fgura and Cottonera fortifications (enclosing the localities of Vittoriosa and Cospicua - the Historical Three Cities), to the east by Marsaskala.  

The town was used as an encampment by the Ottoman armies at the outset of the Great Siege and later as a base by the Maltese insurgents against French rule in around 1800. A memorable battle took place in front of the Ħaż-Żabbar Sanctuary. To this day, French-era cannonballs are to be seen in household walls in the city's older parts and some are also in the church museum after being retrieved from the old church dome.  Ħaż-Żabbar was granted city status by the last Grand Master on Malta, Ferdinand de Hompesch, in whose name the population built a triumphal arch on the main approach road from Paola through Fgura.  During the British era a number of forts and batteries were built in the area. These were Fort St Rocco, Fort St Leonardo, Delle Grazie Battery and Zonqor Battery. Fort St Rocco was built between 1873 and 1875. It was later expanded and 3 cannons were fitted. Also, Fort St leonardo was fitted with 4 cannons. These two forts took care of the neighboring seas. The two batteries also took care of the area altogether with the Rinella battery which contains the famous 100 ton Armstrong Gun.
 
Additional Information on the Historical Three Cities
The Three Cities offer an intriguing insight into Malta and its history. Left largely unchanged, these cities area slice of authentic life as well as a glimpse into Malta's maritime fortunes. The Three Cities can rightly claim to be the cradle of Maltese history, as Vittoriosa, Senglea and Cospicua have provided a home and fortress to almost every people who settled on the Islands. Their harbour inlets have been in use since Phoenician times: the docks always providing a living for local people, but also leaving them vulnerable when Malta's rulers were at war. As the first home to the Knights of St. John, the Three Cities' palaces, churches, forts and bastions are far older than Valletta's. The local communities here celebrate holy days and festas as nowhere else on the Islands. The most spectacular events are the Easter processions when statues of the "Risen Christ" are carried at a run through crowded streets.
 
Additional Information on il-Kalkara
Il-Kalkara is a small picturesque village in Malta, with a population of 2,999 as of March 2011. The village of Kalkara developed as a small fishing community around the sheltered inlet of Kalkara Creek. Some historians believe that the land that today is known as Kalkara, was one of the first to be inhabited by the initial dwellers of Malta that came from nearby island of Sicily. The idea behind this theory is that the inlets of the Grand Harbour could have provided these primitive emigrants with the needed shelter after having endured their long voyage in the Mediterranean Sea. Nevertheless such theories cannot be proven and Kalkara's early history will remain largely unknown.

Kalkara is located on the eastern coast of Malta and forms part of the inner harbour area of the Grand Harbour. It occupies the area around Kalkara Creek and extends to both valley sides around the creek. Rinella Bay, the only sandy beach in the Grand Harbour, is found at the mouth of the Rinella valley. Kalkara is one of the few localities within the Grand Harbour area which still has relatively large open spaces which naturally divide it from other towns and villages.

name: Mieszkanie na sprzedaż / Apartment for sale
description:
Do sprzedania nowo urządzone, ciche mieszkanie z klimatycznym, słonecznym ogrodem, położone w Miasteczku Wilanów w eleganckim budynku przy ul. Klimczaka.

Na 43,7 m2 powierzchni mieszkalnej znajduje się salon (20 m2) z kuchnią (5 m2), sypialnia (11,3 m2) łazienka (6 m2) oraz przedpokój z szafą wnękową. W ciekawie zaaranżowanej łazience znajduje się pojemna szafka gospodarcza z miejscem na pralkę.

Atutem mieszkania są wysokie, szerokie drewniane okna, wychodzące na południowy zachód doskonale doświetlają wnętrze podkreślając wysokość pomieszczeń - 2,9 m! W oknach zamontowane są zewnętrzne rolety antywłamaniowe.

Dodatkową zaletą mieszkania jest kameralny ogród z zadaszonym tarasem i pięknym trawnikiem (idealne miejsce na wypicie porannej kawy lub spędzenie miłego popołudnia przy kieliszku wina)

Elegancki budynek z 2006 r. charakteryzuje się wysokim standardem wykończenia. Elewację wykończono piaskowcem, ściany i posadzki holu - marmurem w ciepłym odcieniu oraz lustrami. W budynku znajduje się recepcja z całodobową ochroną i monitoringiem.

Miasteczko Wilanów charakteryzuje się bogatą infrastrukturą rekreacyjną i usługową - w pobliżu liczne sklepy, punkty usługowe, apteki, przedszkola, restauracje, parki, ścieżki rowerowe, a także Pałac w Wilanowie, Park Kultury w Powsinie.

Okolica posiada dobrą komunikację. W kilka minut można dojść do przystanku autobusowego.

Czynsz: 360 zł (CO, woda, fundusz remontowy, ochrona, śmieci)

name: 2 Bedroom Poolside Apartment: For Sale From $289,000
description:
They say location is everything and your new address doesn't disappoint. Within walking distance you're connected directly to the city or Galleria by trains and buses. 

Apart from a range of local pubs, cafes and restaurants, nearby busy Beaufort Street provides necessities such as banks, post office and chemist. Tenth Ave also serves up a bakery for breakfast or kebabs for a late night snack. 

The convenience of an extended trading supermarket is only a block away and a 24 hour deli is also nearby. Edith Cowan Uni's Mt Lawley Campus is an iPod jog or scenic cycle away. So although off-street parking is provided for your vehicle- you may not need it!

Thanks to its location within the complex, this apartment stays cool all day. Even if the temperature rises, the pool will cool you down.

For more details contact Aneta Ward or Tracey Phillips at Michael Johnson & Co.

Tracey Phillips: traceyphillips@mjandco.com.au +61 419 929 688

name: Luxury Seaside Apartment for sale in Malta
description:
Apartment 532. Beautiful furnished luxury apartment in the best part of the island of Malta. 250 square meters, enjoying totally unobstructed views from the front terrace and side terrace. The lavish layout consists of a large open plan with living and dining area, separate kitchen, 3 very large double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, ensuite shower and an extra living room. Apartment has air conditioning in all rooms. Price includes a 2 car garage.

The apartment is the largest in this unique residence and the commanding position is complimented by outstanding features which include superb views of Mellieha bay and the Maltese countryside. The development is totally car free and has easy access to three large pools, the sandy and rocky beaches of Mellieha bay and the picturesque village of Mellieha.

name: Cannes Apartment For Rent / For Sale
description:
The apartment can accommodate six guests with three bedrooms and three en- suite bathrooms. It occupies 90 square meters on the second floor of a modern building, served by two elevators. A generous outdoor terrace (sixty square meters), furnished with a dining table and two sun loungers, completes your Cannes experience (note that synthetic grass has been removed. Now it is tiles)

Inside, there are three bedrooms, all en-suite with Starck-designed fittings. The master bedroom has a king size bed and the two remaining bedrooms have twin beds. Generous clothes storage is available in each bedroom. A small but fully-equipped kitchen opens onto the dining area within the open-plan lounge, as well as onto the outdoor terrace. The apartment is fully air-conditioned and is equipped with international stations on the 52' LCD screen TV, together with WEB fast ADSL WIFI.

name: For sale, luxury triplex apartment in Estoril, Portugal
description:
Ideally located, this striking modern triplex apartment is part of Estoril Real luxury condominium which has magnificent gardens, a beautiful large swimming pool, garage and gate keeper. 

Within walking distance from Estoril Tennis Club and Estoril Golf Club, one of the most prestigious golf clubs in Europe, 2 minutes away from the highway A5, 5 minutes from the magnificent beaches of the Estoril Coast and 25 minutes from Lisbon International Airport it's also very close to the best shopping areas.

Airy and with much light, it offers a comfortable living room/dinning room, with fire place, wooden floor, central heating, air conditioning, terrace, a half bath, a modern kitchen, a home office and small patio on the groundfloor.

On the first floor, two bedrooms and a bathroom are adjacent to the ample en suite master bedroom with full closet and a large balcony with a very relaxing amazing sea view.

The lower floor has two generous bedrooms, a large full bathroom, a very large playroom, a kitchenette and loads of storage.

In the garage, three parking spaces and a large storage room conclude the premises.

Should you be interested, please get in touch through this page or send an email to boss@saldax.eu

BIO: David’s easy going attitude and willingness to go the extra mile make him a favorite among clients, and his passion for real state is immediately apparent. Born in Puerto Rico, David moved to New York at the age of 2, and his immense knowledge of New York is appreciated by all of his clients. David cites his laid back nature, ability to listen, and genuine concern for his clients as qualities he believes to be important in a real estate professional. He prides himself on listening and addressing any concerns in order to find a home his clients will be happy with for years to come. He is versatile, hard working, and has a great knowledge of the ever-changing market trends.

Before beginning his adventure in real estate, David worked in banking, where he enjoyed working with many different people of all backgrounds. Currently a resident of Sunset Park in Brooklyn, David loves the diversity found throughout the city, and loves that he can essentially “travel the world” without ever leaving the city.

David holds a BBA from Iona, where he was an active member of the Delta Upsilon Fraternity. In his spare time he enjoys poker, salsa, and exploring the city.

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

Facebook has made some new changes you might like to be aware of. Since September 20th less posts (10% according to Ogilvy) show up on your news-feeds. Even if you like a page there is no guarantee new posts will show up. Facebook is imposing page administrators to pay to promote their pages, so only the 10% of the fans receive the updates on their news feed as a result.

We have received comments/messages from some of you that you are not receiving our posts in your news feed. Now there is an option to make sure you do. You can add an "Interests List" for your favorite pages by following the directions below.
******
To keep our page on your news-feed, simply go to our FB page and click on the GEAR symbol (next to the “Message” tab) and from the drop-down menu, please select "Add to Interest Lists".  (I know, that's what you thought you did by 'Liking'! Now one more step is needed apparently.) (From A Page To keep on RECEIVING POSTS you have to OPEN THE PAGE, hover the mouse on the "Like" button near the gear symbol. In the pop-up select "ADD TO THE INTEREST LISTS".)
******

Please comment, share and like. It will increase the chance of you receiving new posts. Doing so will assure that you continue getting posts from the pages you love.

<3 As always, THANK YOU for being our fans. <3

name: New York City Apartments for Sale and Rent - Vladimir Kulagin, Broker
description:
Vlad, In the game of NYC Realty, you are a first ballot hall of famer and your jersey will one day hang in the rafters of Bulgaria. This poem is a gift and I want you to keep it" "I once had a broker named bad vlad Times with him were happy and sad. We started on the east, After we enjoyed a McDonald's feast, And close comrades we became at once. After murray hill showed us no love, Vlad looked to the heavens above. Told the agents to stop scheming, To keep on believing, And to start our journey out west. At onset there was resistance from the team. Vlad insisted the west was our dream, Gyms and doormen, renovations and more, The ultimate spot to bring back my whores. After finding a spot on 56th, Vlad tells me our offer doesn't exist. More scheming he said, But don't hang your head, We'll find your pimp palace this week. At conclusion of apartment crisis 2012, We continued our search in the kitchen of hells. One place was all it took, Rather gave it a second look, And we decided to finally settle down. Our long journey had ended, A Bulgarian we friended, And we found a place to call home, But at the end of the day, I wouldn't have had it any other way, In our triumphant battle of choosing a place to stay. All the time spent doodling, Don't know who the landlords thought they were fooling, Because we were riding with the best, Vladimir Kulagin. 

- John Gallotta July 15th, 2012,   


Vlad, You are the brother I never had. I would take a bullet in the arm Or leg for you. There are less than 3200 wild tigers in the world, and you are one of them. You are welcome at PH9 365 days a year! Love, Alex 

- Alex Lupica July 15th, 2012

Vlad, You are a God living among mere mortals. I''d follow you to the gates of Avalon. If I know anyone living in NYC, you are the first and only real estate I''d recommend! 

- John Rather, July 15, 2012


“Vladimir Kulagin was absolutely wonderful! Both my roommate and I were looking to move into the city from other areas. We knew the area we wanted to live in, and the price we were willing to pay, but expected very little in terms of what we would find. Vladimir was in constant contact with us from the beginning of our search and was very assuring that we wouldn't necessarily have to lower our standards. The very first apartment he showed us was the one we moved into -- the building was way more luxurious than we were expecting and the rent was within our budget! Vladimir was dedicated to helping us settle on this apartment we wanted, and was in constant dialogue with us throughout the application process. He made himself available to us at all hours of the day and night to answer questions and ensure that we were on the right track. His extensive knowledge of the NYC housing market combined with his honest and friendly demeanor made us extremely comfortable and confident that we were settling on the best choice available. We would absolutely recommend him to anyone looking to buy or rent in the city.” 

-Alexi Noelle and Marilyn Mereles
February 02, 2012


I met Vladimir when looking for an apartment to rent in Manhattan.In our first meeting, Vladimir was extremely prepared and showed us exactly the apartments that met our criteria and budget.We were able to finalize a place at the end of the same day. Vladimir’s professionalism and knowledge of the Manhattan rental/ purchase market is incomparable, which is why I sought his help when I was ready to buy a condo.Once again Vladimir did not disappoint and we were able to finalize a place within days of our search.Both of my experiences with Vladimir have been exceptional and I would recommend his expertise to anyone. 

- Nikita February 09, 2011

name: Tel Aviv Luxury Apartments For Rent / Sale
description: After years of anticipation, a tower overlooking the White City is being built on the Tel Aviv skyline. The White City is a rare architectural gem, built in the early Twentieth Century on the blue coast of Tel Aviv – a symbolic link between the grandeur of the past and the miracles of the future. 46 Frishman, the lofty tower over the White City, stands 28 stories high above the beating heart of the city, over the crossroad of Frishman, Dizengoff and Esther Hamalka Streets. 46 Frishman was conceived as a contemporary building, but with great respect for the past. The tower, unique from every angle, combines the advantages of modern design and all possible luxuries with great restraint and dignity.

Every day in the demanding New York real estate market more than a thousand people are looking for a place that suits their particular needs and lifestyle. Matching each one of them with the ideal property is a process that can be very long and frustrating if you don’t focus on their criteria. 

The agent has to listen to their clients, understand their needs, provide an outstanding service and find them the ideal living space. The knowledge of neighborhoods and the ability to negotiate the best deal combined with an excellent eye for detail and quality are so essential because before everything else the real estate business is about developing relationships. 

And this is exactly what Valentina Veleva does after she moved to New York from Sofia, Bulgaria. Her bachelor’s degree in Marketing and Management has fully prepared her for that. 

Whether you are looking for an apt or selling your home, Valentina will quickly and honestly answer any questions. Clients love her down to earth personality, patience and strong work ethic. She has shown a great ability to work around people's budget and finds exactly what they are looking for. Working with Valentina is a simple and pleasant process at the end of which you will be completely satisfied.

name: Luxurious Apartments for Sale in La Romana
description:
The Price
Starting from 60,000 euros.

The Area
La Romana is approx 35 minutes from Alicante airport and is a beautiful  village. The streets are paved with Jasmine bushes, honeysuckle and Oleander bushes which are the pride and joy of the residents. The streets are clean and quiet with plenty of open spaces for parks, walks and sports.
The village itself is very Spanish, with fantastic bars and restaurants, and there is a small community of English and Dutch residents that have created a lovely "home from home community" with many social activities.
There is a large weekly market on a Saturday which sells goods, food - meat, fish, cheese, fruit and veg - and there is a stall selling English pastries too.
The local Spanish Newsagent sells English papers, 7 days a week, as well as a variety of magazines.
Nearby, La Romana has its own Bodega selling beautiful wine very cheaply. Approx 6 euros for 5 litres.
La Romana Spa Hotel offers luxurious treatments in beautiful surroundings. There is a small supermarket in the village but less than a 10 minute drive, the town of Novelda provides will provide larger supermarkets, municipal swimming pool and other shops if required.
The Builder
The Builder is well known in the area and has 40 yrs of experience building all property types. He has very high standards and uses the best materials available. He has extremely hight standards which is shown in his workmanship.
The Apartments
11 apartments offering 1, 2 and 3 bedroomed apartments which all have a storage room and underground parking space. All apartments have a fully fitted kitchen, utility room and are fully plumbed for dishwasher and washing machine. In each apartment, there are:
1) Power showers/and or hydro-massage bath in the main bathroom.
2) Wiring for TV pre-installed so no trailing wires.
3) Pre installation of air conditioning
4) Beautiful Tiles on the wall/floor.
5) Lift from the ground floor to the roof terrace.
7) Communal roof terrace with beautiful views of the town and mountains.
8) Entry phone with camera.
9) Wooden doors that have been treated so that re-painting is not required.
10) 3 ground floor apartments have internal patio areas.
11) the apartments on the 1st and 2nd floor have doors leading onto a Juliet Balcony providing beautiful views to the park.
12) all apartments have double glazing. 

They are complete, legal and have all of the required paper work in place.

Independent Solicitor available to handle any Sales.

name: Upper East Side Apartments For Sale
description:
David Cooper is a Senior Vice President with Prudential Douglas Elliman in New York City. 

David Cooper is a standout, even among seasoned brokers. That’s because he is closely attuned to his clients’ needs from the very beginning. Listening to them and learning what they want at the very outset of the relationship is critical. That conversation, or series of conversations, will set the tone for the work that David will do on their behalf. Whether it’s for a buyer, seller or investor, David will combine his extensive knowledge of New York City real estate, his customers wants and needs, and produce an outcome that will more than satisfy every time. It’s that quality, along with his genuine sincerity and professional integrity that makes him one of the top brokers in Manhattan.

David devotion to his clients is always apparent. Personable and passionate, he works relentlessly on their behalf to get them the best deal. He is their advocate and they know this. He is refreshingly honest, straightforward and intelligent and when you combine those characteristics along with his work ethic and negotiation skills, he is able to service his buyers and sellers most effectively. This enables them to have confidence that the decisions made will be the correct ones. Many of David’s clients become life-long friends. As a result, many are repeat customers or often direct referrals to David’s attention. “It’s the best compliment that I can receive,” he says, “and the one that I most appreciate.” 

David is with Douglas Elliman for 11 years, 8 of which were spent on the Jacky Teplitzky team. “He is meticulous, with an exceptional facility for detail,” says Jacky Teplitzky, who notes his encyclopedic knowledge of the New York condominium market and ‘ins and outs’ of the co-op board application process. “That ability is so needed in real estate, which is often very complex, where even a straightforward transaction involves many steps. 

Sports are another of David’s passions, and he feels this helps translate his competitive edge, drive and determination in Real Estate. He is also well respected amongst his peers and even mentors fellow associates, sharing his insight and guiding them through the many obstacles in order to close a deal. 

David is a graduate of the University of Maryland at College Park. Married with a 10 year old daughter, he and his family are active members of Temple Chaverim in Plainview, New York. 

As is his professional trademark, David is always happy to hear from past clients and prospects who are interested in New York Real Estate.

name: Riverview Terraces Apartments & House for SALE for $450,000
description:
Total land area is 8.76 acres; the lot includes woodland and a spacious lawn around the buildings. Across River Road (at the end of Beaumont Lane) is the Susquehanna River and beautiful adjoining mountain.  The neighborhood is rural residential.  Not far away is historic French Azilum.  
  Each of the six apartments has off-street parking immediately in front of it. Each of five apartments in one building has 2 bedrooms, a full bath, a  kitchen furnished with electric appliances, laundry room with hook-ups, ground-source heating/AC.  The sixth apartment is in a building by itself and has one bedroom; its other features are the same as the five apartments.  Both buildings are concrete block construction with shingled roof, and all the apartments and house use water from a drilled well and use a common septic system. 
    The house was built in 2011; it has ground-source heating/AC, 3 full baths, 3 bed rooms, kitchen furnished with electric appliances, living room, dining room, 2 hobby rooms, an enclosed sun-porch overlooking the river; it has a main floor, an upper level with four dormers,and  a partially finished, walk-out basement with an adjacent car port. The house has vinyl siding and shingled roof.
   Recently natural gas drilling and pipeline building has begun in earnest with subsequent economic growth in the area.  The public school district is Towanda, and there is a Christian school within about 15 miles.
  In 2013 the average income for 6 apartments was $3368 a month, and the property tax for the year was $4612.

DMCI Homes was recognized as one of the Best Developers and One Castilla Place as one of the Best Mid-Range Condo Development at the 2013 Philippines Property Awards. To know more about Philippines Property Awards, please visit www.philippinespropertyawards.com.

DMCI Homes was awarded with distinction for its official corporate website. The completely redesigned and mobile-optimized Website was launched in January 2013.
With over 6,000 entries received from across the U.S. and around the world, the Communicator Awards is the largest and most competitive awards program honoring the creative excellence for communications professionals.





Quezon City Exemplary Taxpayer 
DMCI Homes was honored as one of the exemplary corporate taxpayers during Quezon City’s 73rd Foundation Month Celebration. The Quezon City government highlighted the contribution of companies that are not only top taxpayers, but are also actively engaged in the social responsibility programs of the city.





Corporate Notes
This year, DMCI Homes was able to raise PhP 10 Billion through a notes facility agreement with top financial institutions and lenders. The initial offer of PhP 5 Billion was oversubscribed by 100%, showing a clear indication of lender trust and confidence in the company. With the infusion of these funds, DMCI Homes will be able to offer a wider array of resort-style communities for young Filipino families.

name: Satılık ve Kiralık Daireler ( Sale and Rental Apartments )
description:
İLAN YAYINLAMA KURALLARI
•İlan sahibi, girişini yaptığı ilan içeriğinin güncel ve doğru bilgilerden oluştuğundan ve söz konusu içeriğin kullanım ve ilan etme yetkilerine haiz olduğundan emin olmalıdır. İlan içeriği ile ilgili tüm sorumluluk ilan sahibine aittir. 
•İlan sahibi, her bir gayrimenkul için sadece bir ilan yayınlayabilir. Bir kurumsal üyelik altında aynı gayrimenkul için birden fazla ilan yayınlanması durumunda mükerrer olan ilanlar Moderatör tarafından sistemden silinecektir. 
•İlan fotoğrafları sadece gayrimenkule ait fotoğraflardan oluşmalı ve bu fotoğrafların sayfa üzerinden yayınlanmasıyla ilgili kısıtlama olmamalıdır. Logo ve benzeri fotoğraflar, Moderatör tarafından ilan içeriğinden silinecektir.
•İlan başlığı ve içeriğinde, sadece ilanı verilen gayrimenkule ait bilgiler bulunmalıdır.
•Satılmış, kiralanmış veya arz edilmekten vazgeçilmiş gayrimenkullere ait ilanlar, ilan sahibi tarafından Moderatörlere bildirilmelidir.
•İlan sahibi, www.satilikvekiralikdaireler.com adresinde ilan yayınlayarak, Moderatör tarafından belirlenmiş ve yine Moderatör tarafından güncellenebilir olan işbu ilan yayınlama kuralları, Üyelik Sözleşmesi, Kullanım Koşulları ve Gizlilik Politikası çerçevesinde hareket edeceğini kabul, beyan ve taahüt eder. 
•İş bu kurallar çerçevesinde hareket etmeyen ilan sahiplerinin ilanları, ilan içeriklerinin bir kısmı veya tamamı silinebilir, kara liste'ye alınabilir, ilan sahibinin üyeliğine Moderatör tarafından tek taraflı olarak son verilebilir, Üyelik Sözleşmesi feshedilebilir.

name: Pattaya Condos for sale or rent
description:
We sell and rent out property in the Pattaya area of Thailand. We offer financing, sale and rentals of condos/houses/commercial etc.

Company Overview
We sell houses, condos and land etc. in Pattaya Thailand below market prices. We offer 0% financing with easy low monthly payments and short/long term rentals of condos/houses and we help investors to find the best deals.
Contact us through phone: +66896808874 or via e-mail: lars@thaihomeinvest.com or khunlars@gmail.com

Buy your new condo from us at a lower price and we even offer to finance the purchase of your condo.

How do we finance your purchase of our condos?
We are able to offer financing through our mother company Amarisas International Ltd. We also find resale property which is owner financed.
This means you do not need to qualify for a mortgage through any banks as you simply make a contract with us and pay a down payment and monthly instalments. It's that easy!

Who are we?
We're two young entrepreneurs, a young couple whom are very interested in and excited about the real estate business in Pattaya and as such we first bought a single condo unit in 2010 for us to use and perhaps rent out for other people to enjoy while waiting for this condo to gain value (capital gain investment).
Things evolved though and we decided to take things to the next level and we bought more condos with resale in mind. 
Here we are and if you would like to know more about us then please fell free to add me Lars Larsen as your friend here on Facebook.

name: Jesse Bryant, Sales Representative At Urban Landmark Realty Inc. Brokerage
description:
If you are looking for a realtor who is dedicated, determined and dependable, look no further than Jesse Bryant. 
Jesse knows that carefully listening to his clients needs, and being responsive to their questions and concerns is the key to building lasting relationships that will ensure future business and referrals from his clients.
Jesse started his real estate career as a researcher for a developer at the age of eighteen.  Since 2010, Jesse has worked on a condo team in the capacity of administrator and has learned all aspects of the team environment.  In 2012, Jesse completed the OREA courses to become licensed and is now the lead buyer’s agent for the Urban Lifestyle Condo Team.
When not busy with real estate, Jesse enjoys landscaping, gardening as well as spending time with his dog Billy.
When you need a Toronto real estate professional who will dedicate himself to finding you the right home, call Jesse Bryant, Sales Representative at Urban Landmark’s Urban Lifestyle Condo Team at 416-863-5000 ext. 230 or you can e-mail him directly at jesse@urbanlandmark.com.

name: Mansi on Raymond
description:
About us	
Mansi on Raymond provides fully furnished luxury accommodation for corporate and tourist stays right in the heart of Gippsland.
We have 1,2,3 and studio apartments available for long and short term stays depending on our guests needs.

Located on Raymond Street we are just a short stroll away from Sale’s business and shopping districts.

Our goal
Our goal is to provide our guests with a superior accommodation experience. We have strived to provide all the comforts of home guests could need during your stay.

What we provide
Guests have the option of booking our fully furnished townhouses with one, two or three bedrooms depending on their needs.

What’s included
Included with our accommodation is complimentary Wi-Fi and Foxtel. Foxtel is available in all bedrooms and living rooms.
All bedrooms have their own en-suite and are soundproofed so a peaceful night’s sleep is assured. Bedrooms also have their own individual locks to give guests further privacy.
The kitchen and dining room is fully equipped so prepare a meal and enjoy it inside or eat out in the courtyard on those warm summer nights.
Each townhouse has a spacious living area that faces north where guests can relax and watch television on a 40 inch flat screen TV. 

Pricing	
For details on pricing please see our website www.masnionraymond.com.au or contact our friendly staff on 03 5143 0118 or stay@mansi.com.au.

name: Jamie Schoffman, Licensed Real Estate Salesperson
description:
When it comes to heavy lifting, Jamie Schoffman is at the top of his class.  Nowadays this former powerlifter and weight lifter does his very best at Bond New York.  And with a longtime family history buying, selling, and renting properties, he's especially well-suited to assist you in all of your real estate needs. 

Jamie is a professional through and through. You can count on him to work tirelessly until each and every client is satisfied. He is always direct and honest to a tee. And on a personal level you can expect a broker who is both wildly intelligent and fantastically funny to boot. 

Jamie holds a Bachelor of Science Degree from The Florida State University.  He is a licensed real estate salesperson and an accredited member of The Real Estate Board of New York (REBNY).  He is a born and raised New Yorker and published author.  Jamie and his wife, Chris Ann, currently reside on the Upper East Side.

name: Luxury Condo For Sale in Piermont, NY
description: Piermont Landing, Piermont, NY.  You will be delighted with this immaculate condo with designer touches throughout including 9 foot ceilings, new floors in kitchen and hallway and ultra plush Karastan carpeting in the living room and bedroom. The open kitchen offers granite countertops, maple cabinetry and a convenient pass through to the dining area. Generously sized bedroom with new a/c and double closets. Other features you will enjoy are the in-unit washer and dryer, linen closet, two indoor parking spaces near the entrance to the building, community room and full gym overlooking the river. The friendly, vibrant Village of Piermont with its fun festivals, great restaurants, cool shops and riverfront park is just steps away.  An abundance of recreational activities are right outside your door. Stroll along the waterfront promenade, walk to marinas and sail the Hudson, bike along the Erie trail or picnic in Flywheel park. All this and more and just minutes to Manhattan.

description:
babyballet® is a fun, award-winning pre-school dance concept for girls and boys from 6 months to 6 years. With schools right across the UK, babyballet® dance classes allow babies, toddlers and young children to enjoy the physical and social benefits of ballet, song and dance in a safe, caring, positive and informal environment.

 With a real focus on learning through play, the unique babyballet® syllabus offers four key stages of ballet and tap classes where every child can build their confidence and social skills, learning manners, discipline and respect while developing their basic ballet technique, coordination, musicality, balance, posture and rhythm.

 babyballet’s fully qualified, friendly and engaging dance teachers are joined in class by the babyballet® bears, Twinkle & Teddy, who help to encourage all the little stars to interact and share as they learn to dance without any pressure. 

 Give your child the chance to dance at your local babyballet® school where there’s always a warm and friendly welcome - come and join the fun!

name: Barbados Beach Condos For Sale
description:
Ocean Two is a four star, beachfront resort located on the tranquil south shore of Barbados. The resort occupies a beautiful stretch of Dover Beach at the quiet end of the popular St. Lawrence Gap.  

“The Gap”, as it is commonly called, is a bustling neighbourhood of restaurants, bars, hotels and shops that is frequented by visitors and residents alike.

Our full-service Barbados resort features luxurious one and two bedroom suites that come equipped with fully appointed kitchens and large patios or terraces.  Every suite provides owners with lovely views of the Caribbean Sea.

Two swimming pools keep guests refreshed, and water sports attendants keep guests entertained.  Fine dining and in-room spa treatments allow guests at this Barbados resort to indulge themselves in the Caribbean luxury lifestyle.

Explore the ownership opportunities available at our beachfront resort.  From membership in our private residence club to owning a condo that can be included in our successful condo rental program, we’ll help you achieve your goal of owning a beach condo in sunny Barbados.

name: Global Alliance for Banking on Values
description:
Founded in 2009, the Global Alliance for Banking on Values (GABV) is an independent network of banks and banking cooperatives with a shared mission to use finance to deliver sustainable economic, social and environmental development. The Global Alliance comprises 25 financial institutions operating across 30 countries in Asia, Africa, Australia, Latin America, North America and Europe; serving 20 million customers; holding up to USD 100 billion of combined assets under management; and powered by a network of 30,000 co-workers.

With a Secretariat headquartered at Triodos Bank in The Netherlands, this network of banks, credit unions, microfinance and community banks shares a charter to use finance to find global solutions to international problems—and to promote a positive, viable alternative to the current financial system.

At its heart, the GABV is a Chief Executive Officer network providing a unique space for leaders committed to values-based banking to collaborate and inspire. It also provides learning and development opportunities for senior executives, experts and talented banking professionals at member banks.

The GABV takes a leading role in the debate about how to build a sustainable financial future by managing joint projects among members, experts and partners to help deliver this future and by advocating for change.

name: Banking Services Cronicle (BSC Academy)
description:
Banking Services Chronicle, also known as B.S.C., is a familiar name among lakhs of students. In fact, B.S.C. has become synonymous with professionalism and excellence in the field of competitive exams. We are both a friend and a guide to the youth standing at crossroads pf career. Our effort is to make sure that you have a noble aim at the first place, and then to see that you land bang on target.

The B.S.C. team set out with a missionary zeal with its magazine by the name of Banking Services Chronicle. When the first issue (Oct 1993) came out, a big vacuum was filled. Until then, there had been no magazine which focussed on banking sector entrance exams. Over the years, we have blossomed into an all rounder magazine. Though Bank P.O. exam still continues to be our forte, the monthly magazine has enough material to cater the need of other exams as well.

Soon it was realised that there is a need of interactive preparation and that propelled us to come up with B.S.C. correspondence course. Our correspondence course is the most cost-effective. It builds concepts, provides time saving tips and covers latest trends in Bank P.O. and Bank Clerk Entrance Exams. All this in more than 5000 pages.

Now, we publish various competition - related books from B.S.C. Publishing Co. Pvt. Ltd. few of them deserve special mention - the Magical Book Series. M. Tyra's "Quicker Maths" has created history of sorts through its revolutionary approach to mathematical problems. M.K. Pandey's "Analytical Reasoning" makes you an expert in the game of logic. Chetananand Singh's "English Is Easy" makes the language as simple as maths and as interesting as a story. N.K. Sinha's book on "Money, Banking and Finance" is a useful guide to today's world of economics. And 30 Practice Sets for Bank PO exam gives you the best rehearsal before the actual event.

Besides books on Bank PO exams, we publish various books for management aspirants as well. Some of them are General Intelligence for MBA Entrance Test, Data Interpretation and Data Sufficiency for MBA Entrance Tests etc. These books are scientifically designed and prepared by our expert authors so that you feel as an expert teacher is guiding you while you read these books. Previous year Papers for MBA Entrance Tests gives you complete idea about variation of questions asked from time to time.

B.S.C.'s Classroom Coaching programme has been designed to address the need of interpersonal learning. We have a total of 24 centres across 19 cities in India. Besides, we prepare students for interview at our main office in Delhi.

name: London Banking Circuit
description:
The London Banking Circuit is the ultimate stepping-stone to launch your career in investment banking or sales and trading in London. Together with 19 fellow students you will embark on a 3 day crash course (7th until 9th of October) on what it means to work for a world-renowned investment bank in the financial heart of Europe. Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, Lazard and Morgan Stanley will each host case studies, presentations and social events. 

All Belgian students in their third bachelor, masters or pursuing a Phd are eligible to apply.

name: Banking
description: A bank is a financial intermediary that creates credit by lending money to a borrower, thereby creating a corresponding deposit on the bank's balance sheet. Lending activities can be performed either directly or indirectly through capital markets. Due to their importance in the financial system and influence on national economies, banks are highly regulated in most countries. Most nations have institutionalized a system known as fractional reserve banking under which banks hold liquid assets equal to only a portion of their current liabilities. In addition to other regulations intended to ensure liquidity, banks are generally subject to minimum capital requirements based on an international set of capital standards, known as the Basel Accords.Banking in its modern sense evolved in the 14th century in the rich cities of Renaissance Italy but in many ways was a continuation of ideas and concepts of credit and lending that had their roots in the ancient world. In the history of banking, a number of banking dynasties — notably, the Medicis, the Fuggers, the Welsers, the Berenbergs and the Rothschilds — have played a central role over many centuries. The oldest existing retail bank is Monte dei Paschi di Siena, while the oldest existing merchant bank is Berenberg Bank.

name: Bank BJB
description:
Sejarah Pendirian - 1961

Pendirian Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dilatar belakangi oleh Peraturan Pemerintah Republik Indonesia nomor 33 tahun 1960 tentang penentuan perusahaan di Indonesia milik Belanda yang dinasionalisasi. Salah satu perusahaan milik Belanda yang berkedudukan di Bandung yang dinasionalisasi yaitu NV Denis (De Erste Nederlansche Indische Shareholding) yang sebelumnya perusahaan tersebut bergerak di bidang bank hipotek. Sebagai tindak lanjut dari Peraturan Pemerintah nomor 33 tahun 1960 Pemerintah Propinsi Jawa Barat dengan Akta Notaris Noezar nomor 152 tanggal 21 Maret 1961 dan nomor 184 tanggal 13 Mei 1961 dan dikukuhkan dengan Surat Keputusan Gubernur Propinsi Jawa Barat nomor 7/GKDH/BPD/61 tanggal 20 Mei 1961, mendirikan PD Bank Karya Pembangunan dengan modal dasar untuk pertama kali berasal dari Kas Daerah sebesar Rp. 2.500.000,00.

Perubahan Badan usaha - 1978

Untuk menyempurnakan kedudukan hukum Bank Karya Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat, dikeluarkan Peraturan Daerah Propinsi Jawa Barat nomor 11/PD-DPRD/72 tanggal 27 Juni 1972 tentang kedudukan hukum Bank Karya Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat sebagai perusahaan daerah yang berusaha di bidang perbankan. Selanjutnya melalui Peraturan Daerah Propinsi Jawa Barat nomor 1/DP-040/PD/1978 tanggal 27 Juni 1978, nama PD. Bank Karya Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat diubah menjadi Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat.

Peningkatan Aktivitas - 1992

Pada tahun 1992 aktivitas Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat ditingkatkan menjadi Bank Umum Devisa berdasarkan Surat Keputusan Direksi Bank Indonesia Nomor 25/84/KEP/DIR tanggal 2 November 1992 serta berdasarkan Perda Nomor 11 Tahun 1995 mempunyai sebutan "Bank Jabar" dengan logo baru.

Perubahan Bentuk Hukum - 1998

Dalam rangka mengikuti perkembangan perekonomian dan perbankan, maka berdasarkan Perda Nomor 22 Tahun 1998 dan Akta Pendirian Nomor 4 Tanggal 8 April 1999 berikut Akta Perbaikan Nomor 8 Tanggal 15 April 1999 yang telah disahkan oleh Menteri Kehakiman RI tanggal 16 April 1999, bentuk hukum Bank Jabar diubah dari Perusahaan Daerah (PD) menjadi Perseroan Terbatas (PT).

Perluasan Bentuk Usaha - Dual Banking System 2000

Dalam rangka memenuhi permintaan masyarakat akan jasa layanan perbankan yang berlandaskan Syariah, maka sesuai dengan izin Bank Indonesia No. 2/ 18/DpG/DPIP tanggal 12 April 2000, sejak tanggal 15 April 2000 Bank Jabar menjadi Bank Pembangunan Daerah pertama di Indonesia yang menjalankan dual banking system, yaitu memberikan layanan perbankan dengan sistem konvensional dan dengan sistem syariah.

Perubahan Nama dan Call Name Perseroan - 2007

Berdasarkan Hasil Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa (RUPS-LB) PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat tanggal 3 Juli 2007 di Bogor, sesuai dengan Surat Keputusan Gubernur Bank Indonesia No. 9/63/KEP.GBI/2007 tanggal 26 November 2007 tentang Perubahan Izin Usaha Atas Nama PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat menjadi Izin Usaha Atas Nama PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten serta SK Direksi Nomor 1065/SK/DIR-PPN/2007 tanggal 29 November 2007 maka nama perseroan berubah menjadi PT Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat dan Banten dengan sebutan (call name) Bank Jabar Banten.

Perubahan Logo & Call Name Perseroan - 2010

Berdasarkan Hasil Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Luar Biasa (RUPS- LB) PT. Bank Pembangunan Daerah Jawa Barat & Banten Nomor 26 tanggal 21 April 2010, sesuai dengan Surat Bank Indonesia No.12/78/APBU/Bd tanggal 30 Juni 2010 perihal Rencana Perubahan Logo serta Surat Keputusan Direksi Nomor 1337/SK/DIR-PPN/2010 tanggal 5 Juli 2010, maka perseroan telah resmi berubah menjadi bank bjb.

name: Zenith Bank Plc
description:
We are a global financial services provider with presence in the United Kingdom, Ghana, Sierra Leone and Gambia.

Operating from our head office in Lagos, Nigeria, we have a network of over 500 branches and business offices in prime commercial centres in all the states of the Federation and the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nigeria as well as representative offices in South Africa and China. 

We have a shareholder base of about one million and currently Nigeria’s biggest bank by tier-1 capital. In 2013, about $850 million worth of our shares were listed at the London Stock Exchange (LSE) at $6.80 each.

Over the years, we have built a reputation in e-Banking in Nigeria, having blazed new trails in the deployment of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) infrastructure to create innovative products that meet the needs of its teeming customers. 

We are market leaders in the deployment of various channels of banking technology, and the Zenith brand has become synonymous with the deployment of state-of-the-art technologies in banking.

name: KBZ BANK
description:
The name Kanbawza  is related to a traditional name of the Shan State. KBZ Bank was established on 1st of July 1994 in Taunggyi in Southern Shan State. In 1999, current management took over and reformed the organization into one of the biggest private banks in Myanmar.

As of March 2014, KBZ Bank has expanded up to 225 branches (inclusive of mini branches) all over Myanmar.

Since November 2011, KBZ Bank has been rapidly expanding into international and wholesale banking businesses - targeting multinational corporations and large local corporates by establishing International Banking Division (IBD). Through IBD, KBZ Bank has launched a series of financial services and products related to trade finance, cash management, treasury, corporate financing, international remittance and related services. 

Throughout the years, KBZ Bank has consistently recognized as the market leader among private bank. KBZ is ranked #1 in term of market share, retail network, total deposit, total capital base, total assets, total paid up capital and total loans generated in Myanmar.

name: Banking Frontiers
description:
The Banking, Financial Services and Insurance, or BFSI, sector is today the most happening sector - be it the excitement of challenging business models, or products and services or mergers and acquisitions or pure organic growth or the response to globalization. There is keen popular interest in what is happening in the sector and dissemination of information is a major challenge

Banking Frontiers aspires to meet this vital need as a medium providing the latest and the crucial information on the sector by way of researched articles, opinions, analyses and news happenings. Starting as a 20-page magazine way back in February 2002, primarily focusing on banking technology, we have come a long way. Today, the focus has enlarged from technology to the entire spectrum of banking and financial services - capturing for the readers what is happening and what is expected to happen in the sector - in short the essence of the industry bringing together the issues and concerns that it faces and the views and experiences of the leaders

We have also diversified our activities into providing online and offline platforms for the stakeholders of the sector such as round tables, seminars, conferences, web forums, web surveys and research to cater to the needs of the BFSI community

Some of the key functional areas addressed by Banking Frontiers include

Risk Management
Compliance
Retail Banking
Corporate Banking
Treasury
Information Technology
Security
Alternate channels
Customer Care

name: Private banking
description: Private banking is banking, investment and other financial services provided by banks to high-net-worth individuals who enjoy high levels of income or invest sizable assets. The term "private" refers to customer service rendered on a more personal basis than in mass-market retail banking, usually via dedicated bank advisers. It does not refer to a private bank, which is a non-incorporated banking institution.Private banking forms an important, high-level and more exclusive (for the especially affluent) subset of wealth management. At least until recently, it largely consisted of banking services (deposit taking and payments), discretionary asset management, brokerage, limited tax advisory services and some basic concierge-type services, offered by a single designated relationship manager. Taking a largely passive approach to financial decision making, most clients trust their private banking relationship manager to ‘get on with it.’

name: Investment banking
description: An investment bank is a financial institution that assists individuals, corporations, and governments in raising financial capital by underwriting or acting as the client's agent in the issuance of securities (or both). An investment bank may also assist companies involved in mergers and acquisitions (M&A) and provide ancillary services such as market making, trading of derivatives and equity securities, and FICC services (fixed income instruments, currencies, and commodities).Unlike commercial banks and retail banks, investment banks do not take deposits. From 1933 (Glass–Steagall Act) until 1999 (Gramm–Leach–Bliley Act), the United States maintained a separation between investment banking and commercial banks. Other industrialized countries, including G7 countries, have historically not maintained such a separation. As part of the Dodd–Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 (Dodd-Frank Act of 2010), the Volcker Rule asserts full institutional separation of investment banking services from commercial banking.

name: The City Bank Limited, Bangladesh
description:
City Bank, established in 1983, is a first generation private commercial bank in Bangladesh. City Bank is considered as one of the best banks in terms of adopting global best practices by doing away with age-old traditional decentralized banking practices and culture. The bank, with 3500+ employees, is the best example of “bank transformation” this country has seen so far. Previously it used to follow traditional and orthodox banking methods, but the bank has undergone massive restructuring in 2007 and has implemented centralized business model, serving its customers through four distinct business divisions namely Corporate & Investment Banking, Retail Banking, SME Banking and Treasury and Market Risks. The focus of the “transformation” project was also on improving the overall quality of assets; re-launching the brand anew; leveraging the technology potential; improving the quality of product offerings and placing much higher benchmarks for customer service. The bank has implemented several innovative initiatives to turn itself into a modern financial supermarket using modern technologies.
City Bank is a real time online bank having 106 online branches includes full-fledged Islamic Banking operations, more than 250 own ATMs spread across the country that. The bank, in collaboration with American Express, has launched the prestigious American Express Credit Card in Bangladesh and is the sole caretaker of the brand overseeing all local operations. City Bank is also the first bank in Bangladesh to have issued Dual Currency Credit Card and holds a principal membership of VISA and MasterCard franchises. 
In 2014, City Bank has been named as ‘Best Bank in Bangladesh 2014’ by Euromoney, ‘Best Commercial Bank in Bangladesh 2014’ by FinanceAsia and ‘Best Consumer Internet Bank in Bangladesh 2014’ by Global Finance. Besides winning these prestigious awards, City Bank also received ‘Best Bank in Bangladesh 2012’ from FinanceAsia, ‘The Strongest Bank in Bangladesh 2010’ from The Asian Banker, ‘American Express Marketing Award 2010’ for Outstanding New Card launch from American Express, MoneyGram International’s ‘Best Corridor Collaboration – South Asia in 2011’ in recognition of its inward remittance growth and the ISO 9001:2008 certification from Moody International, for its entire back end and technology operations. Recently the Bank became an IFC (International Finance Corporation) client, the fourth such bank from Bangladesh.
Recently, the Bank has launched Priority Banking services ‘Citygem’ for high net worth individuals; fully fledged Internet Banking platform ‘Citytouch’ and  the country’s first Business-to-Business (B2B) card payment solution. Major products, such as mobile banking for unbanked people, are in the pipeline.  The vision of the bank is: “The Financial Supermarket with a Winning Culture Offering Enjoyable Experiences”. City Bank brand is already recognized as the “most reputed transforming institution in the country” and is poised to become the “Most Reputed Financial Institution Brand” soon. For more information please visit www.thecitybank.com.

name: Islamic banking
description: Islamic banking is banking or banking activity that is consistent with the principles of sharia and its practical application through the development of Islamic economics. As such, a more correct term for 'Islamic banking' is 'Sharia compliant finance'.Sharia prohibits acceptance of specific interest or fees for loans of money , whether the payment is fixed or floating. Investment in businesses that provide goods or services considered contrary to Islamic principles is also haraam . Although these prohibitions have been applied historically in varying degrees in Muslim countries/communities to prevent unIslamic practices, only in the late 20th century were a number of Islamic banks formed to apply these principles to private or semi-private commercial institutions within the Muslim community.As of 2014, sharia compliant financial institutions represented approximately 1% of total world assets. By 2009, there were over 300 banks and 250 mutual funds around the world complying with Islamic principles and as of 2014 total assets of around $2 trillion were sharia-compliant. According to Ernst & Young, although Islamic Banking still makes up only a fraction of the banking assets of Muslims, it has been growing faster than banking assets as a whole, growing at an annual rate of 17.6% between 2009 and 2013, and will grow by an average of 19.7% a year to 2018.

name: Bank Alfalah Limited
description: Bank Alfalah Limited is a private bank in Pakistan owned by the Abu Dhabi Group. Bank Alfalah was incorporated on June 21, 1997 as a public limited company under the Companies Ordinance 1984. Its banking operations commenced from November 1, 1997. The bank is engaged in commercial banking and related services as defined in the Banking companies ordinance, 1962.HistoryBank Alfalah Limited was launched on June 21, 1997 as a public limited company under the Companies Ordinance 1984. The bank commenced its operations on November 1, 1997. The bank introduced commercial banking and related services as defined in the Banking companies ordinance, 1962. Bank Alfalah is the 6th largest bank of Pakistan with 648 branches in Pakistan and abroad.The roots of the bank go back to the Bank of Credit and Commerce International (BCCI), which was closed down due to various allegations. The Pakistan operations of BCCI were taken over by State Bank of Pakistan and nationalized to safeguard the consumer interests, under a new identity of HCEB or 'Habib Credit and Exchange Bank'. In 1997, the bank was privatized and taken over by 'Abu Dhabi Group' of UAE, with a new identity of 'Bank Alfalah Limited'. The management of the bank had implemented strategies and policies so the bank would become a major player in the market. With a partnership with the Abu Dhabi Group the position of the bank became stronger which allowed the bank to invest more in technology to increase its range of products and services.BangladeshOn the 16th of May, 2005 Bank Alfalah formally took over the Bangladesh operations of Shamil Bank of Bahrain for US $17.88 million and renamed it to Bank Alfalah. This was the first branch of the bank outside Pakistan.

name: Red Bank, New Jersey
description: Red Bank is a borough in Monmouth County, New Jersey, incorporated in 1908 and located on the Navesink River, the area's original transportation route to the ocean and other ports. As of the 2010 United States Census, the borough had a population of 12,206, reflecting an increase of 362 (+3.1%) from the 11,844 counted in the 2000 Census, which had in turn increased by 1,208 (+11.4%) from the 10,636 counted in the 1990 Census.Red Bank was originally formed as a town on March 17, 1870, from portions of Shrewsbury Township. On February 14, 1879, Red Bank became Shrewsbury City, a portion of Shrewsbury Township, but this only lasted until May 15, 1879, when Red Bank regained its independence. On March 10, 1908, Red Bank was formed as a borough by an act of the New Jersey Legislature and was set off from Shrewsbury Township.HistoryOccupied by indigenous peoples for thousands of years, in historic times the area of modern-day Red Bank was the territory of the Algonquian-speaking Lenape Native Americans, also called the Delaware by the English. The Lenape lived in the area between the Navesink River and the Shrewsbury River in an area that they called Navarumsunk. The Native Americans traded freely with European settlers from England and the Dutch Republic in the mid-17th century, who purchased land in the area.

name: Banking in Switzerland
description: Banking in Switzerland is regulated by the Swiss Financial Market Supervisory Authority (FINMA), which derives its authority from a series of federal statutes. The country's tradition of bank secrecy, which dates to the Middle Ages, was first codified in the Federal Act on Banks and Savings Banks, colloquially known as the Banking Law of 1934. The regime of bank secrecy that Swiss banks are famous for coming under pressure in the wake of the UBS tax evasion scandal, and the 1934 banking law was amended in 2009 to limit tax evasion by non-Swiss bank clients.In 2011, banks represented 59.4% of the total value added of the Swiss financial sector, totalling CHF 35.0 billion representing 6.2% of the country's GDP. UBS and Credit Suisse, the two largest banks in Switzerland, were ranked globally at #19 and #25 among banks, with assets of approximately US$1.375 trillion and US$1.090 trillion, respectively.As of 11 October 2008), the banking industry in Switzerland has an average leverage ratio (assets/net worth) of 29 to 1, while the industry's short-term liabilities are equal to 260 percent of the Swiss GDP or 1,273 percent of the Swiss national debt.HistorySwiss mercenaries brought home funds from their contracts that helped Swiss banks begin. Banking began in the eighteenth century by way of the riches of merchants. Wegelin & Co., established in 1741, was the oldest bank in Switzerland until it restructured into a new legal entity in 2013. Hentsch & Cie and Lombard Odier were both founded in 1796 in Geneva as private banks, and The Pictet Group was established in 1805 as a merchant bank. Hentsch & Cie was a founding member of the Swiss National bank during 1852.

In addition to its headquarters in its home state of Gujarat, it has a corporate headquarters in the Bandra Kurla Complex in Mumbai.Based on 2014 data, it is ranked 801 on Forbes Global 2000 list. BoB has total assets in excess of 3.58 trillion, a network of 5307 branches in India and abroad, and over 8000 ATMs.The bank was founded by the Maratha, Maharaja of Baroda, H. H. Sir Sayajirao Gaekwad III on 20 July 1908 in the Princely State of Baroda, in Gujarat. The bank, along with 13 other major commercial banks of India, was nationalised on 19 July 1969, by the Government of India and has been designated as a profit-making public sector undertaking (PSU).

Here's a good news for all the Bank jobs Aspirants in India. Now the government's plan for conducting a common entrance test for al bank exams is to be materialized and Indian Bank's Association (IBA) has finalized this innovative and new method of banking Personnel selection. The changes are to take effect from June-2011.
This new method will eliminate the complaining about the delay in knowing results of bank exams in the current banking recruitments. A few points about this new method of selection in Banks are as follows:-
Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) will conduct this exam 2 times in a year. Once each for Clerks and Probationary Officers.
Each Candidate will be given a scorecard Which will be valid for One year.
Participating Public sector banks That will look to recruit for above posts will invite applications from candidates having valid scorecards with all the Eligibility conditions like age, education, Percentage explicitly mentioned. Those satisfying the eligibility criteria can send their applications and get directly in Interview or Group discussion (Accroding to bank selection Criteria).

SYLLABUS:-





Bank PO Syllabus 2013:-

1. Test of Reasoning/Mental Ability/Aptitude:

This section usually tries to test the reasoning abilities and mental aptitude of the candidate. Questions are asked mainly from the following categories.

VERBAL

    * Number Series
    * Alphabet Series
    * Test of Direction Sense
    * Coding-Decoding
    * Number Ranking
    * Arithmetical Reasoning
    * Problem on Age Calculation
    * Blood Relations
    * Analogy
    * Decision Making etc.

NON-VERBAL

    * Non Verbal Series
    * Mirror Images
    * Cubes and Dice
    * Grouping Identical Figures
    * Embedded Figures etc

2. Quantitative Aptitude:

This section tests the quantitative and mathematical skills of the candidate. Questions are asked mainly from the following categories.

    * Number System
    * HCF, LCM
    * Simplification
    * Decimal Fractions
    * Ratio and Proportions
    * Unitary Method
    * Percentage
    * Time and Distance
    * Time and Work
    * Profit and Loss
    * Average
    * Simple and Compound Interest
    * Mensuration (2D and 3D)
    * Algebra
    * Data Interpretation

3. English:

This section is designed to test the language abilities and understanding of English grammar. Questions are asked mainly from the following categories.

    * Verb
    * Adverb
    * Subject Verb Agreement
    * Error Correction
    * Tenses
    * Sentence Rearrangement
    * Fill in the Blanks with Modals, Articles etc
    * Comprehension
    * Answering questions based on Unseen Passages
    * Vocabulary
    * Synonyms
    * Antonyms

4. General Awareness:

This section is checks whether the candidate keep himself/herself up to date with the world around them. Questions are asked mainly from the following categories.

    * Current Affairs (National and International)
    * Major Financial/Economic News
    * Budget and Five Year Plans
    * Who’s Who
    * Sports
    * Books and Authors
    * Awards and Honours
    * Science - Inventions and Discoveries
    * Abbreviations
    * Important Days
    * International and National Organisations

name: Asia Investment Banking Conference 2015
description:
2014 bucked consensus expectations, with bond markets rallying despite the US Federal Reserve completing its Quantitative Easing Program. Amidst volatility and gloom, with many investors pulling money out of Asia following market turmoil in early 2015 and a general flight from emerging markets, there are still many reasons to be optimistic. Economic reform is abound, as China is embarking on a significant programme of reforming and deregulating its economy and financial markets, while India and Indonesia seem poised to enact changes following electoral victories by their respective leaders. Will deal-making continue to flourish amidst a backdrop of healthy corporates and political headwinds? How will markets in Asia perform amidst diverging economic pictures? And will a Chinese slowdown disrupt Asian financial markets?


Initiated by students from the London School of Economics and Political Science (LSE), the Asia Investment Banking Conference (AIBC) is the largest student-run conference in Asia focused on corporate advisory and financial markets. Held for the 7th year running, the conference continues to attract more than 300 of the brightest and most talented students from approximately 50 renowned universities across the globe each year. As Asian financial markets evolve and become more dynamic, this year's conference will comprise keynote speeches, panel discussions, workshops and interactive learning sessions featuring senior professionals within the industry.

Participate in our competitions and stand a chance to be fast-tracked to the 2016/17 Summer Internship with Credit Suisse in Hong Kong or Singapore!
