name: I ♥ Cape Town
description:
Cape Town Tourism seeks to maintain a community full of fans with a variety of perspectives, through its social media platforms I ♥ Cape Town and @CapeTownTourism.
We encourage and welcome your comments and participation in order to create a community that is lively, welcoming and full of love for all things Cape Town. We do however ask I ♥ Cape Town Fans and @CapeTownTourism Followers to please abide by the following simple guidelines.

Respect.
Everyone deserves respect. Whether you agree with them or not, respect is necessary. Any personal insults or negative comments directed at a specific individual will be removed. In other words, please refrain from engaging in personal attacks, posting inflammatory language, or antagonizing other Fans and Followers.

Responsibility.
We cannot take responsibility for the content or opinions posted by our users. Not all posts on our social networking sites I ♥ Cape Town and @CapeTownTourism necessarily reflect the opinions of our organisation, nor do we confirm their accuracy. By engaging with our social networks, you grant I ♥ Cape Town and @CapeTownTourism and its affiliates the right to utilise all posted content in any media without any legal of monetary obligation to the poster or author.  We do, reserve the right to reject or remove posts that violate the rules, at our sole discretion and without prior notice. In certain circumstance where a Fan or Follower has attacked or spammed our social sites we will ban them without notification


NB:  We are not responsible for the privacy practices of sites linked to from our social media sites.
Remember that your posts are visible to the general public. Protect your privacy and don’t give out any personal information.

Prohibited. 
Fans and Followers may not post messages that are threatening, abusive, harassing, intimidating, libellous, defamatory, obscene, vulgar, pornographic, profane, indecent, illegal or unlawful. Spam is not allowed; we define spam as posting the same message over and over or posts related to commercial promotion.

I ♥ Cape Town and  @CapeTown Tourism reserves the right to report unlawful behaviour and vandalism of our communities to your Internet service provider or to law enforcement. In addition, we retain sole discretion to reject posts, delete existing posts, or block users from further participation at any time and without prior notice.
Monitoring & Contacting Us:
We work hard to monitor all of our social media channels daily, during the hours of 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. 
Monday – Friday. While we sometimes might respond after normal business hours, we cannot guarantee we will be able to resolve issues until close of the following business day. If you have a specific social media issue we ask that you email our team at fb@capetown.travel their box is monitored Monday – Friday 8am to 6pm.

name: Visit Myrtle Beach, South Carolina
description:
Visit Myrtle Beach, SC Facebook Page Terms and Conditions:

Visit Myrtle Beach, SC (part of the www.VisitMyrtleBeach.com brand, managed by the Myrtle Beach Area Chamber of Commerce/CVB) has created this page as a hub for people who are planning to visit, have visited, or simply have a great love for our sunny vacation destination. Here you’ll find the latest Myrtle Beach news, events, and special offers on hotels and attractions, as well as plenty of images and videos that help capture the Myrtle Beach experience. We welcome all Myrtle Beach visitors and residents to share comments, images and videos – because who else can tell the visual story better than you guys? 

Visit Myrtle Beach, SC does not accept responsibility for the comments of fans on this page and it’s important to note that postings to the Visit Myrtle Beach, SC Facebook page are not representative of the opinions of Visit Myrtle Beach, SC or the Myrtle Beach Area Chamber of Commerce/CVB nor do we confirm their accuracy. We encourage the expression of opinions and free, frank and open discussion, but we do want people to act responsibly and play nice.

Posts will be deleted if they contain:

- violent, obscene, profane, hateful, derogatory, illegal or racist comments, content, links or images or incite such comment or behavior

-comments that threaten or defame any person or organization

- solicitations, advertisements, or endorsements of any financial, commercial organizations

- multiple successive off-topic posts by a single user

- repetitive posts copied and pasted or duplicated by single or multiple users

-offensive, inaccurate, false, misleading or deceptive comments or content

-material which infringes third party intellectual property rights

-any other inappropriate content or comments as determined in Visit Myrtle Beach, SC absolute discretion

Users who do not comply with this policy will also be blocked from the page in Visit Myrtle Beach, SC absolute discretion. If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at info@VisitMyrtleBeach.com

Posting photos to our wall:

Visit Myrtle Beach, SC does NOT claim ANY ownership rights in photos that you post on our ‘wall’. However, by posting a photo on our wall you hereby grant to Visit Myrtle Beach, SC a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide, revocable, non-transferable, perpetual licence to use, modify, delete from, add to, publicly display and/or reproduce, your photo, including without limitation in any online media formats and through any social media channels, pages or accounts.

You can revoke this license at any time by contacting us in writing at photomedia@visitmyrtlebeach.com and informing us that you no longer want us to use your photo.

name: Akshar Travels - International Tours, Indian Holiday Packages
description:
Visit - www.akshartours.com 

About us

HISTORY

Shree Akshar International, an ancillary business organization in the tourism industry, began in 1997. It catered to various services like procurement of passport and visa privileges for various countries, railway ticket booking, car rentals etc.

Seeing the vast potential in the tourism industry, our director/ founder decided to enter the travel trade. Thus Akshar Travels Pvt. Ltd. was born in 1997.

OUR LEADER AND MOTIVATOR

Mr. Manish Sharma, the director of Akshar Travels, started his firm Shree Akshar International in 1997.This parent company of Akshar Travels began with lots of dreams and a vision to make it big in the Tourism Industry. 

The Director, like the captain of a ship, steered it towards success and the very next year, launched Akshar Travels, to chase his dreams further. The flagship of the company,he is a much respected man in the industry. His dedication and quest for proficiency in all fields has made him a true leader.

DEVELOPMENT & PROGRESS

Through this journey of Thirteen long years, we have evolved both in size and quality. Spread across the globe, we have offices meeting international standards both in terms of infrastructure and ambience. Our fully automated offices, with well equipped communication systems help us meet our deadlines. The spacious interiors of our offices make our customers feel at ease and free of apprehensions.

Enforced with an enthusiastic, experienced and professional team, we guarantee individual attention and personal care to the customer’s needs. Akshar Travels owes it’s success to this team.

REGULAR FRESH OFFERS

Through this journey of Thirteen long years, we have evolved both in size and quality. Spread across the globe, we have offices meeting international standards both in terms of infrastructure and ambience. Our fully automated offices, with well equipped communication systems help us meet our deadlines. The spacious interiors of our offices make our customers feel at ease and free of apprehensions. 

Akshar Travels offers new products and concepts from time to time. Keeping the effect of change of seasons on the human mind and body, we revise our itineraries regularly. This is because the comfort and the satisfaction of our customers is paramount to us. 

We also keep factors like age, tastes and trends of our clients to plan these tours. Thus you can always look forward to something new and innovative at Akshar Travels. 

We aim to:

 Provide the best in products and services
 Ensure Customer satisfaction
 Have faith & confidence in our products
 Possess marketing ability & guts
 Possess complete back up services
 Honour suggestions from customers

OUR ACHIEVEMENTS

 We are IATA, UFTAA, TAAI and TAFI certified agents
 We are Govt. Approved Agents of Gujarat Tourism

OUR MISSION

When planning a dream vacation Akshar Travels are the tour organizers for you. Our fantastic packages, both for Indian destinations and abroad are designed to provide easy and reliable travel solutions. Our packages are:

 Fun filled
 Informative
 Hassle-free
 Comprehensive

Akshar Travels believe in providing quality services to their customers, we are leading and trusted service provider of domestic tour packages, international tour packages, domestic hotel booking services, international hotel booking services, passport, visa services, domestic air ticket booking, international air ticket booking services, car rental services.

name: Atlas Travel
description:
Дорогие друзья!

Компания ATLAS TRAVEL успешно работает на туристическом рынке международного и внутреннего туризма с 2008 года, регистрационный номер 98, Лицензия на турагентскую деятельность № 040609.
 Девиз: «Больше, Чем Туристическое Агентство»  - остается неизменным со дня открытия компании. Сплоченный коллектив единомышленников прилагает все усилия для того, что бы Ваши путешествия были интересными и незабываемыми. Своими успехами и достижениями мы обязаны прежде всего нашим партнерам, коллегам, туристам и просто друзьям.
 Постоянно возрастающее количество отдыхающих через наше агентство является подтверждением высококачественного обслуживания и профессионализма наших сотрудников.

Основные сферы деятельности компании:

• выездной туризм,
 • въездной туризм,
 • внутренний туризм,
 • организация регулярных групповых и индивидуальных туров,
 • бронирование и продажа авиационных и железнодорожных билетов,
 • обслуживание корпоративных заказчиков,
 • подготовка специалистов для туристического и авиационного бизнеса,
 • бронирование гостиниц в Азербайджане и за рубежом,
 • подтверждение от отеля,
 • организация трансферов, заказ такси,
 • аренда автотранспорта,
 • транзитное обслуживание в Баку,
 • оформление выездных виз для граждан Азербайджана;
 • оформление въездных виз для иностранных граждан;
 • медицинское страхование.

Мы предлагаем самые разнообразные туры в самых красивых местах: Азербайджан, Турция, ОАЭ, Страны СНГ, Страны Европы, Страны Юго-Восточной Азии, также Лечебные Туры, Экзотичные Туры, Морские Круизы и т.д. Мы предлагаем туры разных ценовых категорий от эконом до VIP туров.
 К нам возвращаются и рекомендуют друзьям и знакомым. Надеемся, что все большее количество туристов доверит нам организацию своего отдыха, а мы в свою очередь приложим все усилия для того, чтобы оправдать все ожидания. Ждем Вас!


С уважением, ATLAS TRAVEL

name: FEST Travel Seyahat Acentası
description:
FEST Seyahat Acentası 13 Ağustos 1985 tarihinde kuruldu. O günden bu yana Turizm Bakanlığı’nın A 1410 sayılı İşletme Belgesi ile yurtdışından Türkiye’ye turist getiriyor, onlara Türkiye’de geziler düzenliyor, yerli gezginleri de İstanbul’da, Anadolu’da ve dünyada gezdiriyor. FEST’in sahibi FEST TURİZM ve TİCARET A.Ş. adlı bir şirket.

FEST gerek yabancı turistler gerekse yerli turistler açısından kültür turizminin öncüsü. FEST 1985’den bugüne yabancı turistlere Türkiye’de çok başarılı toplumsal konulu, tematik turlar yaparken 1988’de yerli gezginlerimize de sıra dışı, entellektüel kültür gezileri yapmaya başladı. Kültür gezilerine Tarih ve Toplum Dergisi işbirliği içinde “Köşe Bucak İstanbul” gezileri ile başladık. “Adım Adım İstanbul”, “İstanbul’la Tanışın” gezilerini Doğu Anadolu, Batı Anadolu, Orta Anadolu, Kapadokya ve yurtdışı kültür gezileri izledi.

FEST tutkunları bıkmadan, usanmadan, severek, geliştirerek, karda, kışta, yağmurda, çamurda, eksilmeyen, giderek artan bir ilgiyle KÜLTÜR GEZİLERİ’ni sürdürüyor. Her olumlu çabanın kısa sürede tükendiği ya da tüketildiği Türkiye’de böylesi bir girişimin yaklaşık 20 yıldır sürmesi ve kurumlaşması oldukça önemli.

İstanbul ve çevresinde doksanı aşkın güzergaha uzmanlarıyla geziler yaptık. Kırk yıllık, elli yıllık binlerce İstanbulluyu İstanbul ile yeniden buluşturduk, İstanbul bilinci yarattık. Ardından Doğu Anadolu da dahil, Anadolu’nun çeşitli bölgelerini gezdik. Yok olmaya yüz tutmuş güzellikleri yakaladık. Tartıştık, varolan bilgileri ortaklaşa aşmaya, tarih bilincini ve çevre duyarlılığını birlikte geliştirmeye çalıştık. “İçre olduğumuz deryayı bilmeye” çabaladık. Doğanın ve kültürel mirasın yeniden yaşanmasına dayalı, oldukça yorucu, yoğun, ama edilgin olmayan, etkin bir dinlenceyi, “farklı olan”ı yaşadık. 

Tarihi hâlâ yaşayan kalıntılarıyla bir kültür mirası olarak yaşamak istedik. Dünü anlamak ve yarını kurmak için, ortak kültürel varlığımıza sahip çıkmak için, maviyi ve yeşili sevmek ve korumak için GEÇMİŞE YOLCULUKLAR yaptık.

Günlük ya da hafta sonu kültür gezilerimize katılanlara bir bilgi broşürü verilmesi, yurtdışı gezilerinden önce gezilecek yerlere ilişkin fotoğraflarla bir hazırlık toplantısı yapılması ve geniş bir bilgi broşürü dağıtılması, yurtiçi ya da yurtdışı uzun gezilerde “ekstra tur” satılmaması, “herşey dahil” tam gün geziler yapılması Türkiye turizminde “İLK”lerdendi. Varolanlardan farklı bir yaklaşımla, tarihsel, kültürel anlatımlarla dolu dolu, yoğun programlarla, özverili uzman rehberlerle önceden belirttiğimiz maddi koşullara harfiyen uymamız, hatta bazen müşterilerimize maddi sonucunu yansıtmadan programda olmayan yerleri bile gezilerimize katmamız sonucu gezilerimiz büyük ilgi gördü. Gezi kültürüne yeni bir anlam kazandırdık, yeni bir parantez açtık.

Yurtiçinde Anadolu’da yüze yakın güzergaha gezi yaptık: Vize, Midye, Kurşunlu, Kumyaka, Zeytinbağı, Üskübü, Gölcük, Cumalıkızık, Taraklı, Göynük, Frig Vadisi, Sütçüler, Adada, Selge, Yalvaç, Ketakekaumene, Efteni Gölü, Metropolis, Gelveri, Uzuncaburç, Meke Gölü, Manazan Mağaraları, Taşkale, Hasankeyf, Midyat, Karadeniz ahşap camileri, Haho… gibi birçok yer FEST gezileri ile tanındı ve gezginlerin güzergahına girdi. Öne çıkmamış değerlerimizi tanıttık. Bu anlamda yerel kültür turizminin gelişmesine büyük katkımız oldu.

Yurtdışında aynı yıl içinde 80 ayrı ülkeye 110 farklı gezi yapan ilk acenta olduk. Türkiye’den Özbekistan’a, Kamboçya’ya, Laos’a, Vietnam’a. Machu Picchu’ya, Peru’ya, Bolivya’ya, Nikaragua’ya, Küba’nın tamamına, Yucatan’a, Paris’in tüm Müzeleri’ne, Polonya’ya, Berlin, Postdam, Weimar, Dresden, Erfurt’a, Fransa’nın Brötanya Bölgesi’ne, İrlanda’ya, İskoçya’ya, “kültür gezisi” yaklaşımı içinde 25 kişi üzerindeki grupları ilk kez FEST TRAVEL götürdü. Olaylı Belfast’ı ve İrlanda’nın kuzeyindeki jeoloji harikası Giants Causeway’i Türkiye’den ilk kez FEST grupları gezdi. Grup olarak Cesky Krumlov’a, Pecs’e, Zigetvar’a, Briksdal Buzulu’na, Girit’e, San Cristobal’e, Kacuraho’ya, Sucoğ’a, Fas’ın Merzuga Çölü’ne, Gobi Çölü’ne, Santa Clara’daki Che’nin Mezarı’na... ilk kez FEST grupları gitti. Böylesi büyük grupları Güney Hindistan’a, Ladak’a, Daramsala’ya, Madagaskar, Botswana, geniş Zimbabwe, Etiyopya, Libya’nın Ubari Kum Çölü’ne, Polonya’ya, Sri Lanka’ya, Trans-Sibirya Ekspresi ile Sibirya’ya, Kuzey Kore’ye, Racastan’ın tamamına, Kaşmir, Darciling, Karnataka’ya, Sumatra ve Java adalarına, Patagonya’ya, Geniş İran’a, Yemen’e, Myanmar’a, Tibet’e, Butan’a, İpekyolu’na, Moğolistan’a, farklı bir Alaska’ya, Kanada Kayalıkları’na ilk kez FEST götürdü. İlk kez yurtdışına “yalnızca müze” ve “klasik konser turu” gezilerini FEST gerçekleştirdi. 

Bu 19 yıl içinde değişik kültürel etkinliklerimiz oldu. 1992 yılında gerçekleştirdiğimiz “Buharlı Tren ile Sapanca Gezisi” değişik şair ve yazarlarla “kitap sohbetleri”, göl çevresinde gezinti, orman yürüyüşü, canlı müzik, şiir dinletisi gibi keyifli anları içermişti. Bir süre yürüyüş turları yaptık. Değişik mekanlarda KÜLTÜR GEZİLERİ’ne katılanların katkısıyla “dialı söyleşiler” gerçekleştirdik. Değişik yayınlardaki yazılarla KÜLTÜR GEZİLERİ kavramını yaymaya çalıştık. Tarih, sanat ve arkeolojiye ilişkin “seminer”leri başlattık.

Tarih ve kültür tutkunları için “FEST KÜLTÜR GEZİLERİ” artık birer klasik oldu.

name: Passionate Traveller - One Stop Travel Concierge
description:
Passionate Traveller is about the passion to travel; to seek new horizons in different environments, culture and cuisine. I love traveling, and I know there are many different objectives to traveling. Shopping, backpacking, landscape touring, food tours, wildlife, culture tours...they all form part of the desires in us when we go to a new place. "I live to travel, and love to experience what it has to bring for me. You should too.."

Our Vision
Traveling is my passion. There is nothing more fulfilling to me than the smell of a new beach, the sounds of a new city, the traditions of an alternative culture, the flavors of a different cuisine, and the melody of an unfamiliar language. Meeting interesting and diverse people around the world, connecting with them and learning about their perspective on how to live life has enriched my life and my knowledge of the world in a way that words cannot express.

We all live with the objective of being happy, our lives are all different and yet the same.” No matter where I travel in the world, I notice day after day that everyone seem to be seeking one common thing: Happiness. All people regardless of their age, race, or social class are looking for happiness. 

Whatever you are dreaming of – with or without previous research, we have the resources to take you from dream to memory. In a world as wide as your imagination, let us take you beyond your wildest dreams. So contact us, today. Our passion for travel and skill for planning will allow you to enjoy the richest travel opportunities available.

name: Egypt And Africa Travel
description: Egypt & Africa Travel is a well established tour operator with high experience for providing high quality service to people from around the world seeking to explore the wonders of Egypt, granting us the perspective and experience to provide top quality service to tourists seeking to experience any of the unique adventures that Egypt and the region have to offer.

name: Leisure Travel Vans - Triple E RV
description:
It has been said that you don't know where you're going if you don't know where you've been. For Triple E Recreational Vehicles, it started over 40 years ago with a little 13 foot travel trailer with sloping curves and quaint appearance.

Today, Triple E RV & Leisure Travel Vans is one of the largest manufacturers of Class B/B+ motorhomes with a reputation for building the best quality RV's in the industry. 

Triple E is a prominent corporate member of the vibrant, ethnically Mennonite community of Winkler, Manitoba, Canada. What you'll find at the Winkler plant is an impressive, progressive, production facility complete with welding shop, paint shop, fibreglass and mold shop, sewing department, and cabinet manufacturing department. Triple E has grown into an extremely vertically integrated company. This means much of what you see in our products is built on site to Triple E's high standards. Gaining expertise in such a wide variety of crafts and techniques translates into a more custom product.

name: Travel.Booking.BD
description:
TravelBookingBD is specialized in exclusive travel services for independent travelers, Family Members and groups. We believe in providing the best levels of service throughout the South Asia & Asia Pacific travel industry, be it with planning your tour or cost estimations, hotels suggestions and bookings, transport options, tourism information, sightseeing, shopping, guided tour, special interest tours, air, bus and rail tickets bookings. Our extensive tour plans have been researched and developed by our overseas travel partners experienced travel professionals and we are confident that we bring a wide range of options and tour itineraries to the most discerning traveler/tourist/holiday maker.

TravelBookingBD already have overseas Partners who have been working in this industry/regions for quite a long time and they are providing absolutely amazing services throughout these years .We cater for all kinds of tours to suit your budget and taste, be it for individuals, groups or corporate guests. We offer customized and tailor-made tours comprising of destinations in South Asia, Asia Pacific, Middle East and Europe. With a network of fully trained and experienced staff overseas, you can be assured of appropriate guidance and prompt assistance, who take care of every aspect of your inquiry or deal with any issues that may occur whilst you are traveling, making your vacation with us almost like touring with your own personal guide.

TravelBookingBD is committed to providing the best possible assistance in realizing your dreams of traveling anywhere in the world. Not only do we have the widest range of options, but we’re happy to work with you to make your trip just what as you have expected. Our pre-arranged tours are those we’ve found through years of experience of our overseas partners, and offer the most amazing experiences for the visitors. The options and combinations are limitless, offering you the opportunity adjust to suit you, using our knowledge as one of the best in the business.

description: Agjensi udhetimi me qender ne Tirane prej vitit 2009. Aktiviteti i Kalemi Travel ka fillur ne Gjirokaster ne 1995 me hapjen e Kalemi Hotel.

name: Travelstart Nigeria
description:
Travelstart is Nigeria’s newest online travel agency. Whether you’re travelling to London for high flying business or looking for a hotel in South Africa, Travelstart Nigeria can help you.

But enough about us—let's talk about you. When you’re travelling for business or leisure, you need an online travel agency that takes care of the complicated stuff so you can focus on your job or your holiday.

name: Travelstart Kenya
description: We offer a wide range of services including but not limited to products such as airline tickets, accommodation, rental car and various travel related insurance policies.  Owned by one of the worlds most experienced and innovative online travel agencies, Travelstart Kenya's range of travel solutions are now within reach. Thanks to our state of  the art booking engine, you can search, compare and book all domestic and international flights and pay securely online. All you need is access to the internet. If you are not happy to shop online, then give us a call instead and we will assist you over the phone.

name: Sky King Travel & Tours Co.,Ltd
description:
អំពីយើង
	នាសតវត្សទី21ក្នុងយុគសម័យដ៏ទំនើបនេះ វិស័យទេសចរណ៍ត្រូវបានដើរតួយ៉ាងសំខាន់ក្នុងប្រទេសកម្ពុជាហើយថែមទាំងបានជួយលើកស្ទួយ សេដ្ជកិច្ចក្នុងប្រទេសទៀតផង។ស្របពេលនេះ ក្រុមហ៊ុនទេសចរណ៍ស្កាយឃីងដែលជាក្រុមហ៊ុនមួយឈានមុខគេនៅក្នុងព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ដែលមានអាស័យដ្ឋានស្ថិតនៅលើ មហាវិថីកម្ពុជាក្រោម,កែងស្តុបដេអិន, រាជធានីភ្នំពេញនិងមានទីធ្លាធំទូលាយ ។ ក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងខ្ញុំមានបទពិសោធន៍ជាង១០ឆ្នាំ ក្នុងការរៀបចំកព្ចាប់ដំណើរកំសាន្តជាតិនិងអន្តរជាតិនិងមានដៃគូរសហការតាមបណ្តាប្រទេសអន្តរជាតិជាច្រើន អ្វីដែលជាមោទនភាពជាងនេះទៀតនោះ ក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងខ្ញុំថែមទាំងទទួលបាននូវប័ណ្ណសរសើរផ្នែកសេវាកម្មដំណើរកំសាន្តល្អឥតខ្ចោះពីក្រសួងទេសចរណ៍ផងដែរ ។ ដោយមានការគាំទ្រពីសំណាក់អតិថិជនជាច្រើន ក្រុមហ៊ុន ស្កាយឃីងបានបន្ថែមនូវរថយន្តទេសចរណ៍ទំនើបៗ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្ទាល់ជាច្រើនគ្រឿងទៀតសំរាប់បំពេញនូវគ្រប់តំរូវការបន្ថែមរបស់ភ្ញៀវកិត្តិយសទាំងអស់ ។ មិនតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ក្រុមហ៊ុនតែងតែរៀបចំកម្មវិធីចាប់ឆ្នោតផ្តល់រង្វាន់ជូនដល់អតិថិជនដែលតែងតែគាំទ្រយើងខ្ញុំកន្លងមកផងដែរ។
In the 21st century of modern technology, tourism sector plays a very vital role to promote economic growth in Cambodia. Therefore, having known this priority,   Sky King Travel and Tours is making its best afford to help the government reduce poverty and improve economic welfare by sustaining and serving tourist sector. The Sky King Travel and Tours, which is located on the Kampuchea Krom Blvd, next to the DN traffic light, Phnom Penh, has experienced in organizing domestic and international tour packages for more than 10 years and has been in partnership with many other companies in abroad. Moreover, we have earned a certificate of being a perfect tourism service provider from Ministry of Tourism. As we have been supported by many clients, we have upgraded our transportation services to serve customers with satisfaction.  Most importantly, we often arrange a special lucky draw for all our special clients who long time support our company.
关于我们
	于21世纪的现代，旅游部是柬埔寨经济发展重要的业务之一。同时，“天皇旅行社有限公司”是全国大型旅行社之一。地址位于金边市干隆街大道128路号（有广大的停车场）。本公司与旅游业具有10年多的丰富经验及敬业精神在于安排出境和入境的旅游团队。我们拥有众多的国际伙伴。而且本公司还领取了柬埔寨旅游部颁发最佳旅行公司的嘉许。正如我们所收到许多客户的支持，本公司新增许多舒适旅游巴以满足客户的需求。此外，凭借贵宾的信任与支持,本公司经常举行幸运大抽奖的活动。





គោលការណ៍របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
គោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងបានកំណត់ទុកនោះគឺ៖ 
1) គុណភាពកាន់តែខ្ពស់ សេវាកម្មកាន់តែល្អ
2) បណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងហ្វឹកហាត់ដល់បុគ្គលិកអោយកាន់តែស្ទាត់ជំនាញ
3) តំលៃសមរម្យស្របទៅតាមទីផ្សារ
4) សុវត្ថិភាពជាចម្បង
5) មានភាពទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
6) សុជីវធម៌និងការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់
7) បំពេញរាល់តំរូវការណ៍និងស្រាវជ្រាវអ្វីដែលថ្មីៗ
ដោយផ្អែកទៅលើគោលការណ៍និងការអនុវត្តរបស់ស្កាយឃីងខាងលើនេះយើងខ្ញុំតែងតែបានទទួលនូវការកោតសរសើរនិងប្រសិទ្ធនាមថា ៖ក្រុមហ៊ុនទេសចរណ៍ស្កាយឃីងគឺជា អ្នកជំនាញរៀបចំដំណើរកំសាន្តដ៏ប៉ិនប្រសប់។
Company’s Principle
Our major principles are as following:
1.	To offer good quality and services
2.	To train all staffs with specific skills
3.	To offer a proper and an acceptable price
4.	To mainly prioritize safety first
5.	To have high responsibilities
6.	To serve clients with politeness and satisfaction 
7.	To satisfy clients’ desire by doing new researches. 
The Sky King Travel and Tours have been so well-known and given high reputation of : “PROFESSIONAL TOURIST SERVICE PROVIDER”. 
公司的宗旨
本公司社的宗旨如下： 
1.	更高的素质与更好的服务
2.	精练培训员工有教育品德
3.	提供优惠的价格
4.	安全第一
5.	富有责任感
6.	礼貌与热情款待
7.	满足所客户的需求，并研究更多新的旅游线路
取决于如上的宗旨，天皇旅行社已被贵客称为“天皇是一家旅游操作专家”。

សេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
- រៀបចំកញ្ចប់ដំណើរជុំវិញពិភពលោក
- លក់សំបុត្រយន្តហោះទៅកាន់ទូទាំងពិភពលោក
- រៀបចំឯសារស្នើរសុំទិដ្ឋការទៅកាន់ស្ថានទូតនានា
- លក់សំបុត្រឡាននិងទូក
- ពន្យារសុពលភាព ទិដ្ឋាការនិងធ្វើលិខិតឆ្លងដែន
- ទទួលកក់សណ្ឋាគារក្នុងនិងក្រៅប្រទេស
- ទទួលបកប្រែឯកសារគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
- ជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំដំណើរកំសាន្តជាលក្ខណះ៖ អង្គប្រជុំ, អង្គសិក្ខាសាលា, គ្រួសារ, អង្គការ និងស្ថាប័ននានា
- មានជួលរថយន្តទេសចរណ៍គ្រប់ប្រភេទ
- ជាអ្នកតំណាងតែមួយគត់របស់មន្ទីរពេទ្យ ត្រូពិចកាណា ក្នុងផ្នែកពិគ្រោះយោបល់
- ជាអ្នកតំណាងផ្នែកលក់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនធានារ៉ាប់រង
Our Services:
-	Outbound, Inbound & Domestic tours arrangement

name: Alouf travel
description:
Alouf Group of companies was established in 1996 with an Egyptian capital. In 2005 we were enlarged within activities and group services to provide specialized companies and customers with  tourism services, transportation services, ticketing, maintenance service , Limousine so that the company will fulfil the line of business with all the services offered to companies and individuals, also we entered the area of specialized tourism like internal and external tourism, religious tourism, Nile cruises, Honeymoon trips, hotel booking, and ticketing to ensure fulfilling and raising the level of our services offered for all clients.

Mission Statement :-
Our mission is to provide our businesses and customers with the best quality services in the field of tourism, transportation and ticketing combined with our three core values (Transparency, support and community service) in order to meet our customers’ needs through continuous improvement for the service. 

Vision:-
Based on our belief that your satisfaction is our ultimate target, our vision is to enhance both the transportation and travel experience through making it a charmed lifelong experience. In order to do that, Alouf group aims to be one of the biggest travel agencies worldwide. 

Our core values :-
In spite of the growth we have achieved through the past years and our commitment joined with our basic values. Our concern is to make it all according to these core values.

• Transparency: All we do is transparent, we act based on the highest occupational morals as a group and as individuals.
• Honesty: our commitment to fulfil our clients’ needs and provide services which exceed our clients’ expectations. We deliver more than what we promised. 
• Community service: Our aim is to establish a better community through engaging to it based on our concept which is that we all have responsibilities towards the society we live in.

name: Sarap Mag Biyahe (SMB) Travel and Tours
description:
Sarap Mag Biyahe (SMB) Travel and Tours is a Philippine-based travel agency that specializes on Domestic and Asian tour packages. This company was founded by young and vibrant travel enthusiasts whose expertise and strong passion for travel prompted them to establish a travel agency that is not purely business but also a service-oriented company that looks after its clients.

SMB Travel is an authorized ticketing partner of Air Asia Zest, Tiger Air, Jetstar, and soon Cebu Pacific. 

SMB Travel is also one of the exclusive travel deals supplier of METRODEAL and CASHCASHPINOY. 

SMB Travel and Tours offers a wide range of services including international and domestic packages, passport and visa assistance, documentation assistance, team building/educational tour packages and ticketing services. 

With the help of SMB Team, every traveler can now experience a hassle-free vacation without worrying too much about their pockets as we offer amazing yet affordable holiday and vacation packages, insider tips and customized tours. Moreover, we aim to provide excellent services from the moment you make an inquiry to the time you return home from an enjoyable trip.

Book with us and experience a fun-filled adventure only with SMB Travel and Tours! 

Albert & Kat

name: Holiday Travel & Tourism - Jordan
description:
Holiday Travel is a fast growing full-fledged travel and tourism company based in Amman that specializes in outgoing, incoming and ticketing to various destinations all over the world. Through our network of customer focused services, we offer individual travelers, corporate clients and groups of hundreds unique opportunities to see the world, and welcome a break from routine through rest and relaxation

Established in 2001, Holiday Travel was built on the promise that we will never cease to look for ways to meet the needs of travelers, may they be individuals or corporate clients, and offer them the flexibility of working within the most cost-effective way possible. Our attention to detail, personal service and superior understanding of our client’s requirements never fail to ensure their comfort and convenience.


We take pride in the fact that we have a realistic and transparent approach to business. An integral element in our philosophy is to provide our customers with personalized attention, quality work, maximum value, and highly competitive market prices.

At Holiday Travel, we go to great lengths to make everything happen for clients just as they imagined… and just as we promised.


Our company continues to draw inspiration from our enduring mission, vision and values all of which continue to shape our business and influence our way forward.

name: Tzell Travel Group LLC
description:
Tzell Travel is a part of Travel Leaders Group. It is currently ranked first among the nation's largest corporate travel management companies, according to Business Travel News. Tzell maintains its headquarters in New York City and has offices all over the United States. 

Our job is to provide our clients with the highest quality, most personalized travel experience integrated with today's technology - whether it be corporate or leisure. For the individual traveler, Tzell addresses value, convenience, comfort and safety, with its customized quality traveler services. For the corporation, Tzell offers a broad product line of cost containment, meeting services and comprehensive travel management programs. 
Our comprehensive travel management programs are a blend of the vast resources of a travel powerhouse and the personalized dedication and emphasis on quality that you would expect to find in a smaller agency. Our travel professionals and support team are hard at work every day to ensure that your travel experience is the best that it can be. 

We're so good in fact, that Business Travel News has ranked Tzell - Travel Leaders Group #1 among travel management companies in its 2012 annual Business Travel Survey.

name: Travel Choice Egypt
description:
Travel Choice Egypt aims to help our customers control, plan and administer their travel and travel related expenses. Having developed our business over many years, Travel Choice Egypt is in a position to offer the widest possible range of services, covering everything from Meet & Assist to camel rides! We can arrange sightseeing tours all over Egypt, hotel and Nile cruise bookings and transportation, both for individual travellers or group arrivals. We can also provide visa facilities for inbound clients.

Travel Choice's international presence, supported by the latest technology and highly trained staff, means clients can plan and book travel with confidence anywhere in the world. Our customers can make significant savings on most of their travel arrangements thanks to Travel Choice's position as a world's leading travel company.

Our Outbound Leisure Department can provide holiday packages abroad to a wide variety of destinations. In addition, package tours can be tailor-made for individuals or groups. We can also offer other facilities including car hire, hotel reservations, cruises and rail passes, using the services of our Worldwide Network.

On the financial side, most of our branches incorporate a foreign exchange bureau for a wide range of transactions - Travellers Cheques and foreign exchange. We offer competitive rates and there is a 24-hour service at our offices inside Cairo Airport.

Yusuf Bin Ahmed Kanoo (Holdings) Co W.L.L. (Kanoo) announced its new acquisition of the whole operations of Travel Choice Travel and Foreign Exchange Services in Egypt and Lebanon. This acquisition symbolizes the expansion strategy for Kanoo Group after its previous entry into the Egyptian, British and French markets.

Last, but by no means least, Travel Choice has an active Quality & Customer Services Department to look after the needs of our clients and to constantly monitor our performance through a variety of quality initiative.

Travel Choice is committed to dedicating time and effort in the pursuit of an excellent standard of service for all our customers. In other words, exceptional service from exceptional people:

Proactive implementation of travel policy.
Responsive, accurate handling of travel arrangements.
Optimum use of travel expenditure.
Travel support and emergency assistance worldwide.
The management information essential to control travel costs.
Maximum value in supplier relationships.
Continuous assessment and improvement of our service, based on quality principles and practices.
Efficient after sales service.

name: Travel North Dakota
description:
Welcome to North Dakota! Here you will find the latest information on attractions and events, how to find our hidden gems, places to share in our cultural experiences and plenty of adventure along the way.  

Travel North Dakota Facebook Disclaimer and Comment Policy:
Thank you for visiting our Facebook page. Travel North Dakota welcomes your comments, questions and thoughts, but we ask that you keep your posts respectful. By posting comments on the Travel North Dakota Facebook Fan Page, you are agreeing to the following:
* All comments left on the Travel North Dakota Facebook Fan Page are the responsibility of the commenter. By submitting a comment on our page you agree that the comment content is your own, and Travel North Dakota is harmless from any and all repercussions, damages, or liability.  
* Travel North Dakota reserves the right to remove any post that is inaccurate, offensive, advertises commercial products, or is otherwise objectionable. We also reserve the right to ban individuals who violate any of the guidelines listed below or Facebook’s terms of service.
* While this is an open forum, it’s also a family friendly one, so please keep your comments, photos, videos, and wall posts clean. In addition to keeping it family friendly, we ask that you follow our posting guidelines here. If you don’t comply, your message will be removed.
* We will not allow personal attacks or vulgar, abusive, offensive, threatening or harassing language. This includes creative spellings of swear words using asterisks or spaces between words.
We will not allow comments that promote, foster or perpetuate discrimination on the basis of race, creed, color, age, religion, gender, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, national origin, physical or mental disability or sexual orientation.
* We will not allow comments that contain sexual content or links to sexual content.
* We will not allow comments that promote or advertise a person or a business or commercial transaction that is unrelated to travel in the state of North Dakota.
* We will not allow spamming, nor the same content to be posted multiple times. 
* Any subsequent posting of identical information will be deleted.  
* We will not allow comments that promote or oppose any person campaigning for election to a political office or that promote or oppose any ballot measure.
* We will not allow comments or posts that disclose information which the agency and its employees are required to keep confidential by law or administrative rule.
* You participate at your own risk, taking personal responsibility for your comments, your username and any information provided.
* Opinions expressed in public comments do not necessarily reflect official positions of North Dakota Tourism.
* Any information posted here is considered public information and may be subject to monitoring, moderation or disclosure to third parties.

name: Travelwings.com
description:
We don't stop playing because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
-       George Bernard Shaw.

 
Flapping her wings like a bird she flew around the room, emulating the birds she saw flying in the sky, she was just 4 years old. “Mummy, what if I had wings? what if, I could fly over mountains and rivers, over oceans and continents? What if I had Wings to fly across the globe, free as a bird?
 
It’s amazing how birds travel across continents with a freedom unknown to us!
 
Man kind’s desire to travel like a bird, is the desire facilitated by TravelWings.com, a Dubai based, privately owned visionary retail & leisure travel facilitator, with over 25 years of experience in the Travel industry.
 
Once you think of jumping off your nest, we at TravelWings.com share the excitement and sheer joy of the journey. With our simplified, 3 step revolutionary process, you can Search, Select & Serve yourself a pair of wings.

name: Traveler
description: Traveler is a short-lived American television series that ran from May 10, 2007 until July 18, 2007 on ABC in the United States. The series was produced by Warner Bros. Television.Traveler was officially canceled after eight first-run episodes on July 18, 2007. Fans then tried to save the show but were unsuccessful. David DiGilio, the creator, posted an "answers blog" on September 28, 2007, which officially ended the show.SynopsisThe series follows Jay Burchell and Tyler Fog , two graduate students who become suspects when the fictitious Drexler Museum in New York is bombed while they are pulling a juvenile prank. It appears that their friend and roommate, Will Traveler , has framed them for the bombing. Afterwards, Traveler disappears and there is no evidence that he ever existed. Jay and Tyler flee from the authorities, who believe them to be domestic terrorists. While on the run and trying to clear their own names, they attempt to delve into Will Traveler's past in hopes of discovering Will's motives for turning on his friends.Meanwhile, Traveler goes on a similar search for answers. It is revealed that he is in fact a secret agent working for a division of the Department of Homeland Security called the Fourth Branch, and slowly a complex conspiracy is unraveled.Jay and Tyler reunite with Will by the seventh episode, and together the three attempt to bring those responsible to justice. They manage to kidnap Jack Freed, director of the Fourth Branch, but before they can use him to clear Jay and Tyler's names, the limousine with Jack Freed in it explodes.

name: 08 თრეველი - 08 Travel
description:
11808-ის ბაზაზე, დაარსდა საერთაშორისო ტურისტული კომპანია „08 თრეველი“. ჩვენი კომპანია ორიენტირებულია განსაკუთრებული სიზუსტის და გამორჩეული ხარისხის მომსახურებაზე, როგორც გარე ისევე, შიდა ტურიზმზე.11808-ის ნდობა და ჩვენი პირდაპირი  საერთაშორისო კავშირები, გვაძლევს საშუალებას შემოგთავაზოთ ბაზარზე ყველაზე ხელმისაწვდომი ფასები. 

„08 თრეველის“ უმთავრესი უპირატესობაა, მომხმარებლის მოთხოვნებიდან გამომდინარე, ზედმიწევნით ზუსტად და პროფესონალურად შეურჩიოს, შესაბამისი ტური, მსოფლიოს ნებისმიერი მიმართულებით, როგორც დაბალბიუჯეტიან, ასევე საშუალო და განსაკუთრებული მოთხოვნების მქონე მომხმარებლებს. ჩვენი მომსახურების ჩამონათვალში შედის, როგორც სტანდარტული ტურები, ასევე პრაქტიკულად ყველა სახეობის ტური, თუ ექსკურსია, როგორებიცაა მაგალითად: სამთოსათხილამურო, კულტურული, ეკო, პილიგრიმული, მუსიკალური, ისტორიულ-ეთნოგრაფიული და სხვა. აგრეთვე, ტურები სამყაროს ყველაზე ეგზოტიკურ ადგილებში: ამაზონიის ჯუნგლებში, საჰარის უდაბნოში, ჰიმალაის მთებში, ანტარქტიდასა და კოსმოსშიც კი!

თქვენი მოგზაურობის მაქსიმალური კომფორტისთვის, ზუსტი, სწრაფი დამაქსიმალურად  ხელმისაწვდომი შემოთავაზებისთვის ჩვენ დავამყარეთ პირდაპირი და უმეტეს შემთხვევაში ექსკლუზიური კონტაქტები მსოფლიოს უმსხვილეს საერთაშორისო სატრანსპორტო და ტურისტულ კომპანიებთან როგორიცაა: “Deutche Bahn”, “Eurolines”, “Rental Cars”, “Sayama Travel”, “Pegast Tourstik”,“Coral Travel”, “Qatar Airways“, “Lufthansa”, “Turkish Airlines”, “Air Baltic”, და ა.შ. 

„08 თრეველში“ მოგემსახურებიან გამოცდილი და პროფესიონალი თანამშრომლები. გვანდეთ თქვენი დასვენება ჩვენ და  ყოველთვის მიიღებთ მოლოდინზე მეტს.

-------------------------------------------------------------

08 travel LTD- The international travel agency was established in 2014. Ever since its creation, it has been highly customer-centric company with a distinguished quality of the service in both domestic and international tourism. The company has strong connections abroad, therefore they have the opportunity to make the most convenient and affordable offers to the customers.

The primary aim of the company is to fulfill all the wishes and demands of the customer. The tours are customer tailored for individual client. The prices of the tours vearies from affordable to exclusive, so they will fit every budget. “08 Travel” provides various kinds of tours, which includes: hiking and skiing, ethnographical and cultural, historical and pilgrimage tours. Company also provides exotic tours to Amazonian jungle, Sahara desert, Himalayas and Antarctic. 

To provide the best and affordable service for a customer, we established a good working and sometimes exclusive relationships with the world’s leading travel agencies, such as: Deutche Bahn, Eurolines, Rental Cars, Samaya Travel, Pegast Tourstic, Coral Travel, Qatar Airways, Lufthansa, Turkish Airlines, Air Baltic etc.

Our staff is very friendly and highly experienced. Each member will go extra mile to make our customers experience as satisfying as possible.

-------------------------------------------------------------

Международная туристическая комрания ” 08 трэвел ” была основанна в 2014 году.Наша комрания ориентированна на особую точность и исключительное качество обслуживания как на внутренние также на международные туры.  Наши прямые международные связы дают возможность предложить вам наеболее приемлемые цены.

Основная цель “08 трэвел“  учесть требования пользователя  с особой точностью и професионализмом подобрать подходящий тур по любому направлению мира, как для мало бюджетных  потребителей также среднего и с особенными потребностями.

В список наших услуг входит как стандартные туры и экскурсии, также практически туры любого типа, такие как : горнолыжный, культурный, музыкальный, эко , полигримный, историко- этнографический и др. Также туры в экзотических местах мира: в джунглях амазонки, в пустыне сахары,в горах гималая, антарктиде и даже в космосе!

Для максимального комфорта вашего путешествия точного,быстрого и доступного отдыха мы установили прямые и в большинстве случаях эксклюзивные контакты с крупнейшими международными и туристическими комраниями мира такими как: “Deutche Bahn”, “Eurolines”, “Rental Cars”, “Sayama Travel”, “Pegast Tourstik”,“Coral Travel”, “Qatar Airways“, “Lufthansa”, “Turkish Airlines”, “Air Baltic” и др.

В ” 08 трэвел ” вас обслужат опытные и професиональные сотрудники.
Доверьте ваш отдых нам и вы получите больше ожидаемого.

description:

This page aims to be a meeting point for tourism businesses and all those who are travelers interested also in learning about tourism’s role and responsibility in preserving the Planet.

name: Trafalgar Travel
description:
At Trafalgar, we passionately believe in the power of travel to broaden the mind and build bridges between people. By sharing with you the hidden places not mentioned in guidebooks, the local people you wouldn’t otherwise meet, and the traditions you may not have experienced by yourself, we ensure that you get the ‘insider’ view, an authentic and enhanced experience you simply could not have had on your own.
 
It is this dedication to taking our guests beyond the obvious sights that has helped us grow over nearly 70 years into one of the most trusted and successful international guided vacation/holiday companies in the world. From Europe to the United States, South America to South Africa, and with the recent addition of Asia, we pride ourselves on uncovering the hidden gems, cultural highlights and not-to-be-missed attractions of the places you visit. We’ll help you delve deep into the heart of each city and capture the true essence of each new destination.

Privacy Policy: www.trafalgar.com/privacy-policy

name: Tenger travel
description:
Манай  компани нь хөгжил, цэцэглэлтээрээ дэлхийд тэргүүлж байгаа  БНХАУ-ын   Бээжин, Шанхай, далайн эргийн амралтын диваажин Хайнан, дорнын сувд Хонконг, тоглоомын ертөнц Макао, Азийн бар Сингапур, Малайз, Өмнөд Солонгос, гайхамшигт Тайланд, арлуудын улс Филлиппин, социалист Вьетнам, түүнчлэн хүн төрөлхтний соёл иргэншлийн өлгий Египт, Ази Европын хосолмол дүр төрх болох Турк зэрэг Ази, Африк, Европын 9 орны 30 гаруй га газар руу  40 гаруй маршрутаар жилийн дөрвөн  улирлын туршид мянга мянган жуулчдыг аялуулж байна. 
        Манай үйлчилгээг сонгосноор  дэлхийн  хэмжээний аялал жуулчлал хөгжсөн өндөр хөгжилтэй орнуудаар  аялж, соёл иргэншил, түүх дурсгалын гайхамшигтай танилцан  амьдралынхаа хамгийн дурсамжтай, хэзээ ч мартагдашгүй мөчүүдийг өнгөрүүлж, алжаал ядаргаагаа тайлан амьдралын баяр баясгалангийн дээдийг эдлэх болно. 
         Бид “Нүдээр үз, биеэр мэдэр” хэмээх уриан дор  үйл ажиллагаа  явуулахын зэрэгцээ  үйлчлүүлэгчдийнхээ өмнө тив дэлхийг  тойрох  олон шинэ  аяллуудыг нээхийг үргэлж  эрмэлзэн  та бүхэнтэйгээ ойр байж, алс холын аяны тань байнгын үнэнч хөтөч тань  байх болно.

Iowa Economic Development Authority (IEDA) reserves the right to remove posts at any time, for any reason, but ones that are offensive, threatening, violent in nature or that contain profanity will always be removed immediately. description:
Social Media: Please visit http://twomonkeystravelgroup.com for more stories and adventures!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/2monkeystravel

Instagram: http://instagram.com/kach2monkeys

We're a couple from the UK and Philippines who met in Laos after deciding to quit our jobs in Europe and the Middle East. Travelling since April 2013 from Asia and now currently exploring South America.

We're both certified Tantra Yoga teachers, TEFL English teachers and  Ayurvedic massage therapists!  It's been an amazing year so far and we're sure it's only going to get better, more exciting and fulfilling over the next two years. 

Our longer term goal is to build our own Yoga resort and sustainability education center in an island paradise in the Philippines.

We hope you enjoy reading about our adventures and experiences as much as we enjoy making them happen!

Positive Vibes!!!

name: Solo Travel Society
description: The Solo Travel Society is a community of people who love (and some who long) to travel solo. Every day we post a question or a quote on solo travel so that people can share their thoughts and ideas about traveling alone. Throughout the day we point you to two posts from the archives of Solo Traveler (http://solotravelerblog.com) and then, at the end of the day, we put up the Solo Traveler post of the day. This page is moderated by Janice Waugh, author of The Solo Traveler’s Handbook [http://solotravelerblog.com/solo-travelers-handbook/ ] and Tracey Nesbitt, editor and food and wine columnist for Solo Traveler. Janice has been quoted in many media outlets including CNN, the Washington Post, Chicago Tribune, LA Times and USA Today. Janice speaks about travel at consumer events and the business of blogging at industry events.

name: Sharjah Airport Travel Agency - SATA
description:
Sharjah Airport Travel Agency – SATA, is  owned by the Sharjah Airport Authority, Government of Sharjah and was established in 1985, primarily to cater to the needs of passengers travelling through Sharjah International Airport. In 2001, SATA decided to change its strategy by deciding to position itself as a professional agency capable of taking up any challenge, competing with existing premium travel agencies.  Resultantly SATA moved its head office to Sharjah city with the vision to spread its wings firstly within the Emirate of Sharjah and later on all over the UAE. Today SATA is a well established and IATA accredited travel agency with 9 offices in Sharjah and one each in the Emirates of Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Ajman and Ras Al Khaimah.  More branches are planned to open across the emirates in future.

Today by customizing the travel services, SATA has positioned itself as a premium travel agency in UAE. The well trained professional staff of SATA are capable of planning and booking travel services such as worldwide airline reservation and ticketing, worldwide hotel reservation, meet and greet, executive and limousine transfers, rent a cars, conferences and meetings, air charters, etc. Presently SATA caters to a wide segment of society which includes business travelers, leisure travelers, groups and incentives. Using modern technologies and supported by 24 hour uninterrupted service and the ‘Can Do’ attitude of SATA staff, the clients travel needs are taken care with a spirit of care and professionalism. This approach has put SATA as a front runner among the premium travel agencies in UAE. 

The work ethics in SATA are ingrained to meet the demands and requirements of ever changing needs of travelers. Each staff is recruited after stringent tests and evaluations to check their ability and professionalism in executing their job. This makes all our staff highly competent and the constant training provided, keeps them always motivated and abreast of others. At SATA, no efforts are spared to make all staff updated about the trends in the industry to serve the customers more professionally. Every feedback from the customers are thoroughly reviewed by competent authorities and corrective actions are implemented immediately.

With a humble starting in 1985 with 5 staff and an annual turnover of AED 500,000/-, SATA has crossed the mile stone of reaching AED 100 million (USD 28 Million)annual sales turn over in 2009 with a strength of  80 travel industry professionals recruited from different nationalities .  The SATA assurances to our customers are: 

• Price confidence: We give you the assurance that we shall provide you the best available price for requested services.
• Can do attitude: Our well trained staff are ready to take care of any of your travel needs with a spirit of care and professional approach.
• Personal care: We strive hard to know our customers and their requirements and find solutions to fit their needs and budget.
• Assurance: 24 x 7 service wherever you are.

Our Mission Statement
==============
SATA strongly understands that excellence comes not from mere words or procedures, but from our actions. These actions come from an urge to strive and deliver the best every time – a mindset that always says, “When it is good enough, improve it”. It is our way of thinking which comes only from a drive within.

Our mission is to provide excellent service to our customers and be the number one “Value for Money” Travel Service Provider. Our goal is to meet and exceed the customer’s expectations. We accomplish this challenge by providing personalized service to all clients on 24 x 7 basis 365 days. The professional staffs at SATA are always available to help any customer to plan a travel program – be it a business travel, leisure travel or a conference movement or even a special occasion like “Marriage”.

What makes us different from others?
=======================
• World class service at very affordable rates without compromising on the quality.
• Up to date knowledge of what is happening in terms of ground services wherever you want to travel.
• Strive and work hard to maintain a very good relationship with our clients and business partners – mutual support.
• Goes out of the way to match the requirements of the clients - however difficult these may be.
• Well mannered, professional and thoroughly trained staff to attend the customers.
• Special attention given to the minutest details of the client requirements.
• Passion to provide excellent service which we provide with honesty.

Our Strategy - “Together we win”
====================
Our strategy is to align our actions, with the expectations of the customers to ensure that all service requirement and service expectations are achieved with maximum expense optimization. Expectation management of our customer is the mile stone of our success.

name: Flower Travellin' Band
description: Flower Travellin' Band Furawā Toraberin Bando) were a rock band from Japan that was formed in 1968. In Japan they often go by the moniker FTB.They were connected to Japan's counterculture movement and noted for their mixture of early heavy metal with psychedelic and progressive rock. They received wide acclaim from critics but failed to achieve commercial success and disbanded in 1973 to pursue individual careers. The band reunited in late 2007 when hippie influences became popular again in Japanese fashion, music and cinema; it was permanently disbanded after the 2011 death of vocalist Joe Yamanaka.While the band's releases have never sold well they continue to be held in high regard by the music industry. Their albums have never been out of print and they continue to be made available on new audiophile formats such as SHM-CDs. The former members of the Flower Travellin' Band continue to perform FTB songs live together under the name Flower Power with other musicians.HistoryThe band was initially started as a side-project by Yuya Uchida when he returned to Japan after visiting his friend John Lennon in England in the mid 1960s, where he was introduced to various upcoming artists such as Cream and Jimi Hendrix. Yuya wanted to introduce a similar sound to the Japanese, and formed the "Flowers" as a cover band with various group sounds musicians, and two vocalists; male singer Chiba Hiroshi and female singer Remi Aso. They released the album Challenge! in 1968, featuring covers of songs by Jimi Hendrix, Cream, Jefferson Airplane and Big Brother and the Holding Company, in addition to an original song. The cover caused a stir in the Japanese media as it depicted each member posing naked.

主題推薦
想要吃遍達人心目中，日本最值得推薦的餐點，或不想錯過任何歷史建築與自然美景嗎？旅行酒吧定期就甜點、拉麵等主題美食，或櫻花、神社等特定景點，分享達人心目中的top整理，讓您一趟旅行把最愛一網打盡！

description:
Welcome to Colombia, a tropical country of incredible diversity and charm. Its ever-changing geography, a history loaded with mystery and adventure, its people and cultures, have fascinated the world for centuries.

Although its excellent coffee and the purity of its emeralds have made the country famous, Colombia is also the homeland of the El Dorado legend and the magical universe of Garcia Marquez Macondo. If you still have not been here, you can browse our portal and realize how much you have been missing. Coming to Colombia is discovering a completely new world.

Enjoy it! Become acquainted with Colombia and do not hesítate to select this country as your next vacation destination. Colombia is Magical Realism.

name: 永安旅遊 Wing On Travel
description:
永安旅遊成立於1964年，目前在香港設有17間分行，在英國及澳門等地均設有海外分社，現時在全球聘用超過600名精英。永安旅遊憑藉其出入境旅行團的報團人數、旗下辦事處及分行的數目，以至旅行團路線網路以及多元化的業務範疇，成爲香港旅遊業界首屈一指的旅行社，並且連續7年獲市民評選為香港最佳旅行社。2010年，永安旅遊成爲攜程旅行網的成員(納斯達克交易代碼：CTRIP)，共同打造環球旅遊服務品牌。
永安旅遊每年客量超過40萬，而每年開發超過2000個旅遊産品，涵蓋400多個目的地，路線遍佈全球50個國家。永安旅遊積極發展內地市場，與各省市政府及旅遊局合作，發掘新景點、開拓更多具有華夏特色的新遊程。除了組辦旅行團外，公司同時提供代訂機票和酒店套票、郵輪及遊學團、私家團業務。公司並擁有兩艘富中國特色的遊覽船，爲海外及本地遊客提供多種海上遊覽路線。

name: Belize Vacation
description:
No other country in Central America or the Caribbean has a more fascinating and elusive past than Belize— with glorious beaches, Maya sites, all-inclusive offerings and memorable activities like scuba-diving, cave tours and the great Blue Hole. Belize is Mother Nature’s Best Kept Secret and an eco-friendly country with deep, rich culture and history. Come discover why we pique the interests of newlyweds, families, eco-tourists, adventure seekers and more, bringing them back to Belize again and again.

REGARDING POSTING PHOTOS TO OUR WALL: 
The Belize Tourism Board (BTB) / Belize Vacation Facebook Page does not claim any ownership rights to photos posted to the Timeline. However, by posting a photo here users grant the BTB / Belize Vacation Facebook Page license to use, modify, delete from, add to, publicly display and/or reproduce photos including reuse through any social media channels, pages or accounts owned by the BTB (ex. @belizevacation) 

Users may opt out of this agreement and / or request their photo be removed from a BTB channel at any time by contacting the BTB at ml@travelbelize.org. Please direct any and all questions about our policy to ml@travelbelize.org.

NOTE, photos posted to the Belize Vacation wall are subject to be shared via the Belize Vacation cover photo (remaining static for approximately 2 weeks at a time) and / or inclusion in bi-monthly photo albums featuring user generated content. 

Name provided (first name and last initial) via Facebook profile and location of the photo will be featured prominently with the image on the Belize Vacation Facebook Timeline in the event that it is selected to be featured as a cover photo. Additional photos posted to the wall will be featured in a weekly album. Photo location and approximate date taken will be featured in the photo description at that time. The user that provided the image will be tagged in the photo to give credit. All featured cover photos will additionally be saved in the Belize Vacation Facebook Page cover photo album with photo location and approximate date taken featured in the photo description.

The Belize Vacation page reserves the right to remove any inappropriate, unrelated or otherwise disruptive photos from our Timeline and / or albums at any time. Please direct any and all questions about our policy to ml@travelbelize.org.

name: Airworld Travel & Tours
description:
Our Background

AIRWORLD TRAVEL & TOURS SDN BHD was established by Datuk John Lim (Former Mayor of Kota Kinabalu) in 1986. In 1995, Dato' Seri D'Raja Winston Liaw (also Chairman of Sabah Association of Tour and Travel Agent) bought over the company and from there on, the company grew rapidly, with staff strength of fifty now. Our main office is located at Kota Kinabalu and has branch offices in Tawau, Miri and Kuching. Airworld is also a wholesaler in Sandakan, Labuan, Lahad Datu, Bintulu, Sibu, Pontianak, Balikpapan and Tarakan. We will be expanding our business covers west Malaysia and other neighbour countries in the coming future with internet website online booking. 

Due to overwhelming demand, we started to charter flights in 2000, to provide cheaper packages to China. Charter flights include Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Changsha, Shanghai, Beijing, and Chengdu. Today, we have brought more than 15,000 passengers from Sabah to overseas via Charter Flights and it’s still increasing. We are an authorized agent for airlines such as Malaysia Airlines, Mas Wing, Royal Brunei Airlines, Dragon Air, Cathay Pacific, Asiana Airlines, Korean Airlines, Thai Airways, China Southern, KLM, Air Canada, Air Asia and many more. We are also specialized on Cruise Holidays, FIT travel packages, travel related services such as visa applications, and travel insurance expert. Future projects in our pipeline includes Inbound setup, local operator setup, IT online website booking etc.

name: Nomadic Matt's Travel Site
description:
I'm a native of Boston, Mass but, now, everywhere has been my home. After a trip to Thailand in 2005, I decided to leave the rat race and explore the world so I finished my MBA, quit my cubicle job, and, in July 2006, I set out on an adventure around the world.

My original trip was supposed to last a year. I didn't come home until 18 months later. Once back, I knew I couldn't go back to my old life or a typical job - I wanted to travel. I wanted to make this my life. Three months later, I was on the road again and I haven't stopped since.

This website is not only a chronicle of my travels but also a way for people to find inspiration, travel tips, destination advice, travel news, and beautiful photos. People always say to me how much they would love to do what I do, even if it just for a little while.  I'm here to tell you you can. I'm here to show you how. Travel doesn't have to be an expensive task nor does taking a long term trip require you to uproot your existence. Forget what the ads say! If I, a lazy guy from Boston, can make this travel thing be affordable and work for me, you can do it too!

Our company has been a Member of Civil Aviation & Tourism,  Also  Member of  Association of Travel Agents of Bangladesh (ATAB).
 
Our values include:
 

    We are passionate about what we do.
    We believe in having a fun filled environment.
    We believe in making our clients the happiest by satisfying their travel needs.
    We believe in growth.
    We welcome innovative growth.
    We work with full dedication.

Our Work Culture
	
 
 
There is a strong sense of community, involvement and shared goals and ideas. We re simply dedicated to satisfy the needs of people in a relaxed environment. There are no ego issues and rivalry. We believe in teamwork as   only a team can lead to the progress of the company and not an individual alone. 

Honeymoon Travels & Tours is committed to attracting and retaining the best people by providing a positive work environment. People who enjoy their work will naturally create an environment where guests will feel welcome. We   know our employees are the key to building loyal relationships with our guests and are integral part to the success of our Brand. We are always interested in finding new people to join our team. 

So, if you think you're capable enough to join our travels, we welcome you with open arms.
 
 
 
Client Satisfaction
	
 
For achieving complete client satisfaction we put our consistent and sincere efforts in serving our clients in best possible manner. Our Consultants develops and offer the most suitable itinerary/tour depending upon budgetary constraints. We offer and assist right from booking the air/rail tickets to hotel bookings and arranging cars or transport. We provide customer-friendly services through our Traveling and Tourism services and we strive to provide complete customer satisfaction to our clients.
 
 
Quality Assurance
	
 
We strive to maintain amiable relations and thus our services provide an incredible and blissful experience. We offer a plethora of packages and destinations to choose from across the world with our inbound and outbound tour. These packages can be tailor-made or customized as per the requirements of individuals, groups or couples. We provide top quality services and deliver them as per schedule. We guarantee timely execution of bookings and complete customer satisfaction.
 
 
Why Honeymoon Tours & Travels:
	
 

    An environment conscious and eco-friendly travel company.
    We offer a variety of tour and travel services of all range.
    Besides the tours, we are looks after other needs such as accommodation, ticketing, guide for the sight seeing, airport transfers, Visa processing etc. 
    We ensure tension free traveling.
    We are obligated to uphold the key principles of responsible travel.

 

 
OUR Clients: Our clients from Brac Bank, Standard Chartared Bank, HSBC, DUTCH BANGLA BANK, PRIME BANK, FBCCI, MINISTERS FAMILY, GOVERNMENT OFFICER, PRIVATE COMPANY SERVICE HOLDER, GRAMEEN PHONE, AIRTEL, TELETALK, ROBI, CITYCELL, BANGLA LINK, BANGLA LION, A LOT OF GROUP OF COMPANY, LIONS INTERNATIONAL CLUB, EMBASSY STAFF, NITOL NILOY Group, FAS Finance & Investment ETC .

name: Backpackers Traveller
description:
Teringinnya nak pergi melancong ke luar negara, tapi tgk pakej dalam iklan semuanya tak mampu nak ikut..sebenarnya BOLEH melancong tetapi kene dengan cara lainlah.... 

Assalammualaikum semua dan salam sejahtera kepada mereka yang bukan beragama islam.

Ada jugak yang dengar cakap tak puas bila ikut pakej sebab kene ikut jadual mereka, Jadi masa menjadi amatlah terhad!! tidak mendapat kepuasa maksimum apabila melancong. Kita tidak boleh salahkan travel agency tersebut sebab kalau admin pun yang buat travel agency admin akan buat begitu. betul? jadi bagaimana?

Admin dan keluarga sememangnya sangat suka melancong. 

Tetapi kami melancong ke luar negara dengan CARA kami sendiri, dengan MASA kami sendiri dan dengan JADUAL kami sendiri. 

Kami sendiri yang menentukan kami nak kemana dan berapa lama kami hendak berada disana. Nak tentukan berapa kali nak pi sana pun boleh..sebab? Melancong dengan cara begini..kitalah yang menjadi "travel agency"nya....

Seronokkan? nak tau apa yang lagi seronok?

MURAH dan puas! dengan cara kami melancong kami dapat jimat banyak wang kerana kami hanya menggunakan pengangkutan awam sahaja.

Penat tetapi BERBALOI!!! kami merasa tempat-tempat yang pakej biasa tidak bawa kami pergi..

Setakat ini alhamdulillah kami sudah sampai ke German, Amsterdam, Italy, Austria, London, Scotland, Australia, Korea, Beijing, France dan banyak lain tempat-tempat lawatan terkemuka dunia semuanya TIDAK menggunakan pakej. 

Sememangnya ramai yang membantu antaranya sahabat2 dan kenalan akan tetapi yang paling banyak membantu kami ada pelajar2 kita di luar negara. memang best! Mereka memang sangat sporting dan sempoy..tanpa mereka agak sukar untuk kami "merayau-rayau"

Ikutilah fanpage ini dan insyaAllah kami akan berkongsi pengalaman2 kami merantau disini.

name: Snow Travel
description:
Snow Travel Argentina una de las mejores compañías de turismo estudiantil, con una vasta y comprobada experiencia en el rubro.

El comienzo se remonta a mediados de los 90, durante los años en que cambiaría para siempre la industria del turismo estudiantil.

Por entonces cuatro jóvenes emprendedores del rubro compartían una idea: crear una empresa que ofreciera una experiencia distinta, un viaje inolvidable en cada detalle.

Así, sumando conocimiento, compromiso y por sobre todas las cosas innovación, en 2003 comenzaba  a hacerse realidad ese sueño, y en sólo tres años se convertiría en un actor principal del mercado, aumentando sus ventas en un 1000% y creciendo de manera ininterrumpida hasta este 2014.

Hoy somos un equipo de más de 2000 personas, sumamos 25 años de experiencia, y mantenemos intacto ese espíritu de cambio que inició todo, convirtiéndonos en una de las principales empresas de turismo estudiantil a lo largo y a lo ancho del país. Somos Snow Travel Argentina y seguimos pensando diferente. Que bueno!!

name: The Naked Traveller
description:
1 Aussie who sold everything he owned in 2009, walked away from the office cubicle life, to find a life full of adventure & new experiences around the world, while trying to make a difference in the process.
 
Travel Series Host
Charity & Skype Ambassador
‘Best Job in World' winner 

http://youtu.be/mH-ukSN2chg


Travelling since 2009 (50+ countries through 6 Continents, on less then $10k a year), my ultimate goal is to not only share & inspire others, on some of the amazing experiences & sights I have come across... but also pass on the tips, secrets & advice I have learnt that has allowed me to travel for as long as I have, while still seeing everything, on such a small budget.

The Naked Traveller is more then just a name which was given to me on my travels, it is a philosophy & way of travel that does make it possible to see & experience more from each location you visit, for cheaper then you could imagine, for as long as you desire.  It is freeing yourself of material possessions & travelling ready to experience everything the world has to offer!

Recent winner of The Best Job in the World competition ($100,000, 12 months all expenses travel, 50 destinations) so please expect very exciting content from that coming very soon :)

Global Charity Ambassador for RainCatcher - carrying & installing water filters while I travel & fundraising every opportunity I can.  Amazing Ambassador Program coming very soon, that will make it possible for others to do the same :)

:)

#RealLifeExperiences

These companies were merged with WorldTravel BTI, marking the end of the brand. BCD Travel, the new corporate identity for the consolidated companies, began trading under that name on March 31, 2006.In 2013, BCD Travel acquired TBiz, the corporate division of Travelocity.See also Business travel John Fentener van Vlissingen

name: Wilderness Travel
description:
For more than 30 years, people have entrusted their travel dreams to us. Our adventures span every corner of the globe, and the quality of our itinerary design and leadership has earned us one of the highest rates of repeat travelers in the business. Our core philosophy is elegantly simple: it’s not just where you travel, but how you travel that sets our trips apart. The magic of the "how" at Wilderness Travel comes from our expert Trip Leaders—the undisputed best in the business—a meticulously planned and artfully executed itinerary, and the camaraderie and just plain fun of traveling with a small group of like-minded people.

On our website, www.wildernesstravel.com, you’ll find more than 175 off-the-beaten-path journeys in 75 countries, from wildlife adventures to hiking odysseys to expedition cruises. There are three ways to travel with us: on our classic Small Group Adventures, our WT Expeditions: Rare Journeys and Exploratories, and our Private Journeys.

name: Ontario Travel
description:
The following Posting Policy applies to those who choose to use Ontario Travel’s (Ontario Tourism Marketing Partnership Corporation) Facebook fan page. By using this fan page and submitting a comment, photo, video and/or other materials, you (and your parent/legal guardian if you are under the age of majority in your jurisdiction of residence) agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Posting Policy.
• While we will not be able to monitor every posting, the OTMPC reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to remove, edit, or otherwise modify any content that does not adhere to this Posting Policy, Facebook’s Statement of Rights and Responsibilities and other policies from time to time.
• The purpose of this page is to celebrate and share travel experiences in Ontario. Please use this space to make your own posts in line with this theme.
• Please respect other users. name: National Geographic Traveller India
description: National Geographic Traveller India is a magazine from the National Geographic brand, that focuses on real travel for real people. We are about immersive travel and authentic story-telling. We are very much about family travel, about travel experiences and insights. The magazine will also focus on great photography, insightful articles and reader-friendly service information. Our tag line is "Nobody Knows This World Better". A Nat Geo Traveller India story attempts to capture a place's essence in a way that will inspire readers to create their own memorable trips, and come back with their own amazing stories.

Established in 2003 and built with prior experience of excellence in the travel field Quest Travels has been proving and providing exceptional service to cater the travel and hospitality needs of today’s world in Nepal. • We’ve been having fun since 1977. No wonder BCCL owns a 13% stake in us!

description: British Travel is based in Western Australia. Selling flights, accommodation, car hire, coach tours, cruises, city tours and travel insurance to UK & Europe. All our staff have over 20 years of experience in travelling around UK.

name: Batanes Travel and Tours
description:
Batanes Travel and Tours (BT&T) was established in 2008 by an Ivatan (Batanes local) who dreamt of sharing the beauty and culture that the Batanes offered to the rest of the world.  

BT&T’s mission is simple: To offer an extraordinary travel experience at an unrivalled value. Our guiding principle is providing the best service for clients so you truly feel that Batanes becomes your second home, even just for a few days.
 
BT&T COMPANY ADVANTAGE:
Private Guide and Customized Tours: Discerning travellers don’t want to be constrained by a strict itinerary. With BT&T, each travel day is an adventure that is private, flexible and customized for your exact needs. You can start and end your vacation at your most convenient time and can request for itinerary changes as you wish. 

Experienced Local Guide with 24/7 Support: Expert local guides work with our team on the ground to give you helpful tips and fun ideas 24/7 making your trip memorable and worthwhile.  

Responsible Tourism: By employing locals as our tour guides, you contribute to providing livelihood for the local Ivatans.

name: Airlite Int'l Travel & Tours
description: Airlite Travel provides affordable domestic & international packages.  Our company deals directly with wholesalers and operators of various places around the world. That's the reason we could be able to provide competitive and affordable rates.

name: National Geographic Traveler Poland
description: National Geographic Traveler w Polsce ukazuje się od 2004 r., zaś na świecie od 1984 r. Początkowo był wydaniem specjalnym miesięcznika National Geographic Polska, od kwietnia 2010 r. ukazuje się jako miesięcznik. To praktyczny magazyn o podróżach, który inspiruje i informuje. Skierowany do osób aktywnych, ambitnych, ciekawych świata. Dostarcza gotowe przepisy na fascynujące wyprawy, także rodzinne. Mocną stroną magazynu są rzetelne informacje, mapy i testy sprzętu przeprowadzane przez ekspertów. Dodatkowy atut stanowią autorzy, uznani globtroterzy. Raz w roku redakcja oraz czytelnicy przyznają prestiżową nagrodę TRAVELERY, promującą polskich naukowców i podróżników.

name: Budget Travel
description: Our mission is to make travel accessible to all. We do this every day by sharing the most useful, relevant, and interesting travel information, ideas, and deals.

name: Will Travel For Vegan Food
description:
Hiya, my name is Kristin Lajeunesse and after 23 months, 48 states, 547 restaurants, & over 35,000 miles I have officially completed a personal mission of mine - to eat at every 100% vegan restaurant in the United States!!! 

Will Travel For Vegan Food (the road trip) *officially* came to a close on August 11, 2013 but you can read about every single restaurant over on the blog, here: http://wtfveganfood.com And stay tuned for my first-ever book (a memoir about the road trip), coming out in the spring of 2014. :)

name: NLEX Travel

In addition to offering our own host of travel management solutions, we are also the fulfillment partner for Air Arabia Holidays and manage the operations for some of Air Arabia’s ticketing sales shops in the region.

東南西北旅遊有限公司於1973年在香港成立，38年來在旅遊行業已享有驕人的聲譽，以及佔有重要的市場地位。開業以來,我們一直秉承以客人為尊之服務精神，讓數以百萬計的客戶得到了滿意的服務。 
          
我們的服務目標是為客戶預定機票、旅遊套餐、遊輪、獨立包團、酒店及簽證申請，提供友好和完全值得信賴的服務，到目前為止，我們可以為你在全世界範圍內預定到大約100家航空公司和40,000家酒店，其中有120家酒店在香港。這些航空公司及酒店與本公司皆保持著緊密的合作關係。 
         
每當您想要旅行，您只需給我們一個電話，我們就會為你提供準確及滿意的服務。 
**能達成您的愿望也就是我們的服務宗旨**

Tung Nam Tours (S.E.A.) Ltd. was established in Hong Kong in 1973. We have built up a rich history and an important position in the travel industry. We have served a countless number of satisfied customers over the years.

Our objective is to provide a friendly and trustworthy service for Air Tickets, Travel Packages, Cruises, Hotels and Visa applications. We are linked with more than 100 airlines and 40,000 hotels all over the world including 120 hotels in Hong Kong.

Whenever you want to travel, please give us a ring. We shall look after your needs. 
**YOUR WISH IS ALWAYS OUR COMMAND**

description:
ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕ကိုယ္တိုင္ဟာ ခရီးသြား၀ါသနာႀကီးပါတယ္။ 
ခရီးသြားေနရတဲ့အခါ ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕မ်က္ႏွာေတြဟာ အျမဲတမ္းျပံဳးရႊင္ေနၾကတယ္... အသစ္အသစ္ေတြကိုေလ့လာစူးစမ္းတဲ့ မ်က္လံုးေတြဟာအေရာင္တလက္လက္ေတာက္ပေနတယ္... ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕ရဲ႕ေန႕စဥ္ဘ၀ေတြကိုေမ့ပစ္ထားႏိုင္တယ္.... စိတ္ဓာတ္ခြန္အားေတြကိုေမြးဖြားႏိုင္တယ္...လြတ္လပ္ျခင္းနဲ႕ စိတ္ခ်မ္းသာျခင္းစတဲ့ ပီတိတရားကိုခံစားရတယ္။
ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕အတြက္ခရီးသြားလာရတာဟာ ရသေျမာက္တဲ့ အႏုပညာတစ္ခုဖန္တီးျခင္း သို႕မဟုတ္ ဘ၀မွာမေမ့ႏိုင္တဲ့ ေပ်ာ္ရႊင္စရာအခိုက္အတန္႕ေတြကို ဖန္တီးေနရတယ္လို႕ပဲ ယူဆပါတယ္...

Tourbox Travel ကေပးတဲ့ Service ေတြကဘာေတြလဲလို႕ေမးခဲ့ရင္ ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕ရရွိတဲ့ လြတ္လပ္မႈ၊ ေပ်ာ္ရႊင္ၾကည္ႏူးမႈေတြကို ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕နဲ႕ အတူလက္တြဲၿပီးခရီးသြားတဲ့ မိတ္ေဆြတိုင္းကို ထပ္တူရရွိေစတာပါပဲ။ ခရီးသြားတဲ့အခါေပ်ာ္ရႊင္မႈရရွိေစရံုသက္သက္မွ်မဟုတ္ဘဲ Cultural intelligent ျဖစ္ေစဖို႕၊ ႏိုင္ငံတကာအသိအျမင္နဲ႕ဗဟုသုတတိုးပြားေစဖို႕ နဲ႕ ေပ်ာ္ေပ်ာ္ႀကီး ခရီးသြားရင္း တန္ဖိုးမျဖတ္ႏိုင္တဲ့ ခရီးသြားမိတ္ေဆြသစ္မ်ားဖြဲ႕စည္းထားတဲ့ ခရီးသြားNetwork ႀကီးတစ္ခုကို တည္ေဆာက္ဖို႕ျဖစ္ပါတယ္။
ထပ္ေျပာရရင္ မိတ္ေဆြတို႕ခရီးသြားစဥ္မွာ လြတ္လပ္ေပ်ာ္ရႊင္မႈ၊ လံုျခံဳစိတ္ခ်မႈႏွင့္ ဘယ္သူနဲ႕မွမတူတဲ့ ၀န္ေဆာင္မႈေတြနဲ႕ ဘယ္တုန္းကမွမခံစားခဲ့ဘူးတဲ့ ခရီးသြား အေတြ႕အႀကံဳေတြကိုဖန္တီးေပးဖို႕ ကၽြန္ေတာ္တို႕TOURBOX Travel ေရာက္လာၿပီဆိုတာပါပဲ....
