name: Travel writing
description: The genre of travel literature includes outdoor literature, exploration literature, adventure literature, nature writing, and the guide book, as well as accounts of visits to foreign countries.The subgenre of travel journals, diaries and direct records of a traveler's experiences, dates back to Pausanias in the 2nd century AD and James Boswell's 1786 Journal of a Tour to the Hebrides.HistoryEarly examples of travel literature include Pausanias' Description of Greece in the 2nd century CE, and the travel journals of Ibn Jubayr (1145 - 1214) and Ibn Batutta (1304 - 1377), both of whom recorded their travels across the known world in detail. The travel genre was a fairly common genre in medieval Arabic literature.Travel literature became popular during the Song Dynasty (960–1279) of medieval China. The genre was called 'travel record literature' (youji wenxue), and was often written in narrative, prose, essay and diary style. Travel literature authors such as Fan Chengda (1126–1193) and Xu Xiake (1587–1641) incorporated a wealth of geographical and topographical information into their writing, while the 'daytrip essay' Record of Stone Bell Mountain by the noted poet and statesman Su Shi (1037–1101) presented a philosophical and moral argument as its central purpose.

name: Travel Agent
description: A travel agency is a private retailer or public service that provides travel and tourism related services to the public on behalf of suppliers such as airlines, car rentals, cruise lines, hotels, railways, and package tours. In addition to dealing with ordinary tourists most travel agencies have a separate department devoted to making travel arrangements for business travelers and some travel agencies specialize in commercial and business travel only. There are also travel agencies that serve as general sales agents for foreign travel companies, allowing them to have offices in countries other than where their headquarters are located.OriginsThe modern travel agency first appeared in the second half of the 19th century. Thomas Cook, in addition to developing the package tour, established a chain of agencies in the last quarter of the 19th century, in association with the Midland Railway. The first ever tour organised was from Loughborough to Leicester carrying 500 passengers – 12 miles journey for 1 shilling. They not only sold their own tours to the public, but in addition, represented other tour companies. Other British pioneer travel agencies were Dean & Dawson, the Polytechnic Touring Association, and the Co-operative Wholesale Society. The oldest travel agency in the United States is Brownell Travel; on July 4, 1887, Walter T. Brownell led ten travelers on a European tour, setting sail from New York on the SS Devonia.

name: Vacation (G.R.L. song)
description: "Vacation" is the debut single recorded by American-British-Canadian girl group G.R.L., for their debut studio album. The song was written by Bonnie McKee, Lukasz Gottwald, Max Martin and Henry Walter with production handled by the latter three. "Vacation" is an upbeat breakup song.Background and compositionFollowing the disbandment of The Pussycat Dolls in 2010, Robin Antin suggested that the group would be "revamped" with new members. After different incarnations of the group Antin along the guidance of manager Larry Rudolph formed the group under a new name, G.R.L. with members: Lauren Bennett, Paula Van Oppen, Natasha Slayton, Simone Battle, and Emmalyn Estrada. Bennett was the first cast as a member for group with members being added gradually over the next year and a half. The group was officially unvelied at Chateau Marmont in April. On June 16, "Vacation" temporarily bundled and available for free as a B-side to Britney Spears' "Ooh La La for the soundtrack of The Smurfs 2. The song was available for digital download on June 18, 2013 and was sent to mainstream radio on September 3, 2013.

name: Vacation (film)
description: National Lampoon's Vacation, sometimes referred to as Vacation, is a 1983 Technicolor comedy film directed by Harold Ramis and starring Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Randy Quaid, Dana Barron, and Anthony Michael Hall. John Candy, Imogene Coca, Christie Brinkley, and Jane Krakowski appear in supporting roles.The screenplay was written by John Hughes, based on his short story "Vacation '58" which appeared in National Lampoon. The original story is a fictionalized account of his own family's ill-fated trip to Disneyland when Hughes was a boy. The success of the film helped advance his screenwriting career.The film was a box-office hit, earning more than $61 million in the US with an estimated budget of $15 million, and received widespread acclaim from critics. In 2000, readers of Total Film voted it the 46th greatest comedy film of all time. It is widely considered to be the best film in the Vacation series, and continues to be a cult film and a staple on cable television., the film has received a 95% "fresh" rating on Rotten Tomatoes.

name: The Moorings Vacations
description:
In an effort to establish a social space where all of our fans feel comfortable sharing their travel memories, we have assembled some guidelines to keep in mind as you interact on our Facebook Page. We hope these guidelines will ensure an enjoyable experience and encourage all of our fans to return regularly.

1)	Be Respectful - Our Facebook page is an open social space for discussing yacht charters, travel and brand-related topics. Please do not post any statements that could be offensive or insulting to others. Any posts (text, links, images or videos) that include violent, obscene, indecent, pornographic, profane, hateful, racist, defamatory, harassing, threatening, offensive, religious, political, off-topic or inappropriate content, will be removed. 

2)	Protect Yourself - Please avoid posting any personal information on our Facebook page. Any posts that include an email address, phone number, mailing address or other personal information will be removed.

3)	Facts First - Please avoid posting any false, misleading or speculative information about our brand. If there is anything in the media that raises questions, feel free to ask so that we can provide you with as much detail as possible.


4)	Advertising / Solicitation - Please avoid posting any messages that serve as advertisements, endorsements or self-promotion. Any posts on our page that promote yourself, an off-topic event, your business, a financial, commercial or not-for-profit organization will also be removed.

5)	Keep it Original - Posting any content that is not your original content, such as branded logos, graphics, trademarks or slogans will be removed from this page. Continual off-topic posts by a single user, as well as repetitive posts copied and pasted or duplicated by single or multiple users will also be removed.

We reserve the right to ban any user who infringes these rules. If you have any questions or comments about this policy, feel free send us a message or contact us at  www.moorings.com/contact.

name: Volunteer Vacations
description:
A Volunteer Vacations fechou parcerias com algumas das principais ONGs do mundo para proporcionar a pessoas dos mais variados perfis uma experiência de curto prazo em uma organização de ajuda humanitária. Cuidamos de todo o planejamento e burocracia e montamos junto com você uma experiência capaz de aliar diversão e a realização pessoal que é colaborar com uma causa importante para o nosso planeta.
Uma excelente oportunidade de realizar uma viagem nacional ou internacional, conhecer diferentes culturas, fazer o bem, ter contato com algumas das grandes questões da humanidade e fazer a diferença por um mundo melhor. Tudo de acordo com seu gosto, aptidões e em total segurança. Em um dia você está dando um mergulho refrescante em uma praia paradisíaca de mar azul, e no outro colaborar com um projeto agrícola no coração da África. Após uma semana de compras nos mais modernos shoppings da Asia, que tal amamentar elefantes abandonados na Tailândia? Ou, quem sabe, subir as favelas cariocas para ajudar as fofas crianças de um orfanato conhecendo um outro lado da realidade brasileira para depois celebrar a experiência com um chopp gelado em uma roda de samba?

name: Holiday Inn Club Vacations
description:
Hello and welcome to the official Facebook page for Holiday Inn Club Vacations®! Owned and operated by Orange Lake Resorts, we invite you to get in a vacation state of mind, while you explore our 12 family-friendly resorts, interact with travelers and find the room to be yourself.  Come on in and hang out.

Mission
“To provide a fun and relaxing environment where memorable vacations are created and shared among family and friends time and again.”

Company Overview
Kemmons Wilson built the first Holiday Inn® hotel in 1952 in Memphis, TN, redefining how families vacation together. Thirty years later in 1982, Kemmons continued this quest by opening Orange Lake Resort, a first-class, timeshare ownership resort. Today, Orange Lake Resort, located next to Walt Disney World® Resort in Orlando, is the flagship property of Holiday Inn Club Vacations®, which provides quality vacation experiences in top leisure destinations. As the newest member of the Holiday Inn brand family, Holiday Inn Club Vacations was created in September 2008 as a strategic alliance between IHG (InterContinental Hotels Group), the world’s largest hotel company by number of rooms, and Orange Lake Resorts, a leader within the vacation ownership industry with nearly 30 years of proven success.

The Holiday Inn Club® program and Holiday Inn Club Vacations® resorts are independently owned, operated and marketed and are not owned, operated or marketed by the owner of the Holiday Inn® brand. 

Holiday Inn Club Vacations and the H logo are registered trademarks of InterContinental Hotels Group or its subsidiaries. All rights reserved.
Description
Holiday Inn Club Vacations® loves to give you more of what great vacations should be—more room, more amenities and more fun. However the key ingredient is more of you. So, relax, reconnect, and create new vacation memories you and your family will cherish for years to come. From spacious, beautifully appointed suites and villas to twelve fantastic resort destinations each offering wide variety of services, amenities and activities, you can have it all with Holiday Inn Club Vacations. You don’t even have to be an owner or Holiday Inn Club Member to stay with us, come check out our rental program to find your vacation style.
Are you a Holiday Inn Club Member?  If you answered “yes”, we invite you to join us in the Holiday Inn Club Lounge. Exclusively for Holiday Inn® Club Members, this is THE place to gather, hang out, chat and share ideas as well as past vacation memories. It’s a forum where you can ask questions and get answers that will help you make the most out of your ownership with Holiday Inn Club Vacations®. https://www.facebook.com/groups/StaySocial/

name: Vacations
description: A holiday is a day set aside by custom or by law on which normal activities, especially business or work, are suspended or reduced. Generally, holidays are intended to allow individuals to celebrate or commemorate an event or tradition of cultural or religious significance. Holidays may be designated by governments, religious institutions, or other groups or organizations. The degree to which normal activities are reduced by a holiday may depend on local laws, customs, the type of job being held, or even personal choices.The concept of holidays has most often originated in connection with religious observances. The intention of a holiday was typically to allow individuals to tend to religious duties associated with important dates on the calendar. In most modern societies, however, holidays serve as much of a recreational function as any other weekend days or activities.In many societies there are important distinctions between holidays designated by governments and holidays designated by religious institutions. For example, in many predominantly Christian nations, government-designed holidays may center around Christian holidays, though non-Christians may instead observe religious holidays associated with their faith. In some cases, a holiday may only be nominally observed. For example, many Jews in the Americas and Europe treat the relatively minor Jewish holiday of Hanukkah as a "working holiday", changing very little of their daily routines for this day.The word "holiday" has some variance in meaning across different locales. In North America the word refers to widely observed days of rest and recreation, whereas in the U.K. and many Commonwealth nations the word refers to any extended period of recreation. It is this first, more restricted sense of the word that concerns this article.EtymologyThe word holiday comes from the Old English word hāligdæg (hālig "holy" + dæg "day"). The word originally referred only to special religious days. In modern use, it means any special day of rest or relaxation, as opposed to normal days away from work or school.

A Perfect Vacation Spot Directly on the Gulf of Mexico
DUNES OF PANAMA MANAGEMENT and VACATION RENTALS 

A good Gulf of Mexico Vacation Requires fun on the water, a comfortable condo, plenty of on-site services for entertainment as well as a great location. 
The Dunes of Panama Vacation Rentals has just that! 

Your condo will come fully equipped with kitchen and serving bar, dining area, living room, private bedrooms both master and living room have floor to ceiling windows that provide panoramic views of the Gulf of Mexico, two baths, large balconies for the family to dine on or lounge in the sun or enjoy the amazing sunsets from, towels, linens, washer, dryer, and cable television as well as wireless internet.       


Enjoy our amenities during your stay with a game of tennis, shuffleboard, beach volleyball, basketball, fitness room, and for the little ones a beach swing set as well as beach equipment available in office.

Take advantage of Suds Weezer’s and their motto “Drip on In” for a fun beach atmosphere, for breakfast, lunch or dinner along with great snacks, delicious frozen drinks and beverages.


Furthermore, our proximity is just down the road to St Andrews State park, deep sea fishing or many shops on Panama City Beach, day and evening entertainment and dining make for an incredible Florida family trip, couple retreat, girls or guy’s weekend or a general last minute getaway.

For the best Florida Family vacation, Dunes of Panama offers 1, 2 and 3 bedroom condo to accommodate all party sizes in any of our 5 buildings that stretch along 1500 ft of pristine beach front directly on the Gulf of Mexico and Thomas Drive.  


Take a look through our portfolio of floor plans and unit choices online at www.dunesofpanama.com and choose the one that best meets your style or give us a call.  We’d love to make your vacation on the Gulf as good as possible!  Remember all condos have a beautiful View of the turquoise waters of the Gulf of Mexico as well as 1500ft of pristine sugar white beach to enjoy. 
How many Panama City Beach, Florida rentals can offer you that!


You will stay entertained and comfortable for your entire stay.  Book your Dunes of Panama condo for your spring, summer, fall or winter beach vacation you’ve always imagined!  Can’t imagine coming to the beach during fall and winter well you just don’t know what you are missing.  If the gulf is not warm enough to swim we seasonally heat one pool from November 1 to May 1.  

We know that you will not leave disappointed.  You’ll make memories and have the vacation of a lifetime.

name: David's Disney Vacation Club Rentals DVC Rentals
description:
Many have saved THOUSANDS of dollars on their Disney vacations and you can too. No Membership is required.

We have inventories of rooms located on Disney property at the Walt Disney World Resort, Disneyland Resort, Hawaii, South Carolina and the Florida Atlantic coast for rent. Rather than reserve one of these rooms directly through Disney Central Reservations, we have access to the same rooms through members of the Disney Vacation Club at prices that will leave you asking "HOW?".

These rooms, classified by Disney as "Deluxe Disney Villas", are all located within the Disney Vacation Club resorts. You DO NOT need to be a member.

The reservation will be in your name and you will check in at the regular Disney Resort arrival desk. Similar to a reservation booked through Disney Central Reservations, the room will be assigned to you by the Disney Resort Cast Members on your arrival. You will treated the same as every Disney Resort Guest and you will have access to all of the same amenities and and perks afforded to each and every guest staying at a Disney Resort.

The biggest difference is you won't have a room bill to pay when you check out unless you make charges on your room with your Key to the World Card or Magic Band (new Disney feature).

Check in any day of the week and stay as little (2 days) or as long (31 days) as you like. It is not necessary to arrive on a weekend and it is not necessary to stay a full week.

This is not a timeshare solicitation, no presentations are offered and your information is not shared with anyone outside of the booking member and Disney (of course).

More information on our services can be found at http://www.dvcrequest.com

name: Vacation
description: A vacation or holiday is a specific trip or journey, usually for the purpose of recreation or tourism. People often take a vacation during specific holiday observances, or for specific festivals or celebrations. Vacations are often spent with friends or family.A person may take a longer break from work, such as a sabbatical, gap year, or career break.The concept of taking a vacation is a recent invention, and has developed through the last two centuries. Historically, the idea of travel for recreation was a luxury that only wealthy people could afford (see Grand Tour). In the Puritan culture of early America, taking a break from work for reasons other than weekly observance of the Sabbath was frowned upon. However, the modern concept of vacation was led by a later religious movement encouraging spiritual retreat and recreation. The notion of breaking from work periodically took root among the middle and working class.EtymologyIn the United Kingdom, vacation once specifically referred to the long summer break taken by the law courts and then later the term was applied to universities. The custom was introduced by William the Conqueror from Normandy where it facilitated the grape harvest. In the past, many upper-class families moved to a summer home for part of the year, leaving their usual home vacant.

name: Atwood Vacations & Real Estate
description:
Located 45 miles south of Charleston, Edisto Beach is one of the few beaches on the South Carolina coast that has escaped commercialization. As you follow scenic Hwy. 174 to Edisto Island, live oaks draped with spanish moss seem to create a tunnel over the road making first time visitors curious to see what awaits them. For return visitors, this moss draped road is where they begin to feel at home again.

Edisto has always been a family beach, where memories are made and childhoods are reborn. Generations of families have made Edisto Beach their home away from home. The unique style of the island is apparent in its beauty and history offering wildlife, beautiful live oaks, sun, sand, water, plantations and farms. REGARDING POSTING PHOTOS TO OUR WALL: 
The Belize Tourism Board (BTB) / Belize Vacation Facebook Page does not claim any ownership rights to photos posted to the Timeline. However, by posting a photo here users grant the BTB / Belize Vacation Facebook Page license to use, modify, delete from, add to, publicly display and/or reproduce photos including reuse through any social media channels, pages or accounts owned by the BTB (ex. @belizevacation) 

Users may opt out of this agreement and / or request their photo be removed from a BTB channel at any time by contacting the BTB at ml@travelbelize.org. Please direct any and all questions about our policy to ml@travelbelize.org.

NOTE, photos posted to the Belize Vacation wall are subject to be shared via the Belize Vacation cover photo (remaining static for approximately 2 weeks at a time) and / or inclusion in bi-monthly photo albums featuring user generated content. 

Name provided (first name and last initial) via Facebook profile and location of the photo will be featured prominently with the image on the Belize Vacation Facebook Timeline in the event that it is selected to be featured as a cover photo. Additional photos posted to the wall will be featured in a weekly album. Photo location and approximate date taken will be featured in the photo description at that time. The user that provided the image will be tagged in the photo to give credit. All featured cover photos will additionally be saved in the Belize Vacation Facebook Page cover photo album with photo location and approximate date taken featured in the photo description.

The Belize Vacation page reserves the right to remove any inappropriate, unrelated or otherwise disruptive photos from our Timeline and / or albums at any time. Please direct any and all questions about our policy to ml@travelbelize.org.

name: Margaritaville Vacation Club
description:
House Rules 
It's about interacting
Our Facebook fans may use this page to interact with other fans and members of the Margaritaville Vacation Club community through conversations, pictures and sharing stories about experiences.

It's about fun
To ensure this is an enjoyable and enriching experience for all our visitors, we reserve the right to remove comments, photos or other references that are not in keeping with the intended use of this page (i.e. fun, helpful and productive). This includes posting vulgar or offensive language or photos, including aggressive or disrespectful commentary regarding fellow fans or Margaritaville Vacation Club team members.

It's about speaking your mind
We value all feedback, good and not so good - but remember we're people, too… so if you've got a gripe, give us a chance to make it right. And if it's praise for a job well done, well by all means please heap it on!

It's about your community
Most importantly, keep in mind that your participation on this page can help others get the most out of their Margaritaville Vacation Club ownership - that's our mission and we'd love for you to be a part of helping achieve this common goal.

It's about respect
Please also refrain from posting material that will violate the intellectual property rights of another person or entity.

It's about sharing
We love to hear from you & want to show off your content. Any photos or comments posted by you onto our page may also be used for our website, publications, emails, newsletters, etc.

While we hate the thought of doing this, we do reserve the right to block repeat violators of our House Rules and Terms of Use from participating on this page. The comments that are posted on the Official Margaritaville Vacation Club page on Facebook do not reflect or represent the views or opinions of Margaritaville Vacation Club or any of its employees. Feel free to also review our Terms of Use (http://wy.ndh.am/1fSOxcs) for additional information (and please pardon all the legal mumbo-jumbo).

name: Long Vacation
description: Long Vacation is a Japanese television drama series from Fuji Television, first shown in Japan from 15 April to 24 June 1996. Takuya Kimura and Tomoko Yamaguchi played the lead characters. The series enjoyed high ratings and was the earliest of a series of hit productions starring Kimura. It features music by Cagnet.SummaryMinami and Sena meet when Sena's apartment-mate, Asakura, jilts Minami on their wedding day. Minami learns from Sena that Asakura has left, whereabouts unknown. Sena allows Minami to move into the apartment, since she is penniless, having given all her money to Asakura, and cannot pay the rent on her apartment.This is the beginning of a romance between Sena and Minami. Minami and Sena confide in and console each other about their relationship problems and their lack of success in life.Minami meets a professional photographer, Sugisaki, who proposes marriage. Finally Sena has a chance of winning a piano competition and going to Boston, joining the symphony orchestra.The characters in the series have something in common—if not jobless, they can do no better than secure a temporary job. This is a portrayal of a time when Japan was plagued by deep recession, when its people suffered profound depression from constant failure to earn a stable income. The series portrays how relationships are made and broken, and explores how people come to depend on each other for solace.CastTakuya Kimura as Sena Hidetoshi (瀬名秀俊)Tomoko Yamaguchi as Hayama Minami (葉山南)Yutaka Takenouchi as Hayama Shinji (葉山真二)Takako Matsu as Okusawa Ryoko (奥沢涼子)Izumi Inamori as Koishikawa Momoko (小石川桃子)Ryō as Himuro Rumiko (氷室ルミ子)Leo Morimoto as Professor Sasaki (佐々木教授)Ryōko Hirosue as Saito Takako (斉藤貴子)Kosuke Toyohara as Sugisaki Tetsuya (杉崎哲也)

name: Vacation home - "Villa Emina" Medići - Mimice, Croatia
description:
Adorable Stone House with Stunning Sea View in Medici (Omis Riviera)

The house is located in Medici, 100 m from the sea, 10 km from Omis, 30 km from Split, and 22 km from Makarska. 

The house is suitable for 6+1 guests. It comprises of 3 bedrooms, a closet room, 3 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, and living room. The house also has two terraces and a balcony. It faces stunning sea view. There is a spacious green multi level garden with barbeque, garden shower, table tennis, and hammock. As a part of the garden, there is a parking space for three cars, easily accessible from the main street.

The house and a garden are equipped with air-condition in all rooms, TV, internet, Wi-Fi, safe deposit box, dishwasher, washing machine, fridge, freezer, cooker, oven, barbeque, parking space for three cars, garden shower, table tennis, hammock, baby cot, iron, ironing table, hair dryer.

If you want to enjoy in Dalmatian fashion, this adorable stone house is best choice for you.

The price per night, including VAT and tourist fee is:
1) 200€ - July and August;
2) 160€ - June and September;
3) 120€ - The rest of the year;

There are no other additional charges.

For further information, please contact us via Facebook or e-mail: nevenkramer@yahoo.com.

name: Anantara Vacation Club
description:
Anantara Hotels & Resorts was launched in 2001 with story collecting travellers in mind. The Anantara Guiding Principles - indigenous discovery and grounded expertise - are the cornerstones of the brand focused on creating memorable experiences for every guest.

With this in mind the Anantara Vacation Club was launched in January 2011 allowing guests to indulge themselves in a longer term, more economical lifestyle experience. Club Points Owners have the freedom to choose from a range of ownership categories to suit their needs with the flexibility to lend, rent or transfer points from the preceding to the forthcoming year whilst always staying at luxury Club Resorts. The number of Club Points owned is a determining factor for the length of stay, type of accommodation, time of year and resort destination available to enjoy.

Learn more: http://www.anantaravacationclub.com/

In addition to holidaying at the Club Resorts, Club Points Owners can also experience various luxurious resorts and hotels located throughout Asia and the Middle East. The Club Escapes programme provides preferential access to selected Anantara Hotels and Resorts using Club Points.

Through our partnerships with leading international hospitality companies, the Global Traveller programme allows Club Points Owners to create even more exciting new adventures by trading their Club Points for accommodations in thousands of different hotels and resorts around the world. Our partners include Club Intrawest, Hilton Grand Vacations Club, Oaks Hotels & Resorts, Hilton HHonors®, RCI and The Registry Collection.

Read our blog:
http://blog.anantaravacationclub.com/

name: Seaside Vacations Outer Banks
description:
Seaside Vacations offers relaxing accommodations on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. Set on a 200 mile stretch of narrow barrier islands off the coast of North Carolina, the Outer Banks is a popular vacation destination with its beautiful beaches and acres of beautifully landscaped beachfront and sound front properties. Seaside Vacations focuses on family-friendly accommodations with more than 420 vacation rental homes in its inventory. 
 
Seaside Vacations recently completed an acquisition of a local company, swiftly growing its position in the Outer Banks vacation rental market. With properties from Corolla to South Nags Head with many amenities including oceanfront, pools, hot tubs and community privileges, Seaside Vacations offers a unique experience for their guests.  

Seaside Vacations offers an exclusive program for their guests known as Club Seaside providing everything that the Outer Banks has to offer with savings on family portraits, beach yoga, wine tasting, sport fishing, casual and fine dining opportunities, wildlife and historic tours and world-class golf and tennis. The growing list of nearly 500 vacation homes offer views of the Roanoke and Albemarle Sound, beautiful beaches dotted with sea oats, swimming pools, and the Atlantic Ocean.
 
A vacation to the Outer Banks offers indoor and al fresco dining at many of the local restaurants, shopping experiences in Duck and downtown Manteo.  A vacation rental from Seaside Vacations is the perfect home while you explore all that the Outer Banks has to offer. Seaside Vacations is a full-service, world-class vacation rental and property management company.
 
The vacation homes in Seaside Vacations portfolio blend nature with an authentic island experience to deliver southern hospitality to guests of all ages.

name: Cinderelly Vacations affiliate of Academy Travel
description:
A little about myself! My name is Ashley and I am a mother of three girls. I to say the least am a Disney Addict! From a very young age I had a passion for all things Disney. I was hooked on vacations to the various Disney Destinations when I brought my oldest daughter for her first trip. That was 8 years ago! I will never forget the look on her face as we walked down Main Street USA right in Magic Kingdom at Walt Disney World. Such amazement in her eyes! The castle shined in the morning sun as the cast members lined the street waving "hello" while wearing their Mickey Mouse gloves. Tears streamed down my face. I got it, the magic that everyone had spoke of. I felt it! Every trip I have taken since is magic. The world stops and all that matters in that moment is your family, your children and their laughter. Stop and breathe in the air, it smells of fresh baked goods and dole whips! There is a character just around every turn that your sweet faced child still believes is the real deal, take that in! It doesn't last forever.

I aim to build a personal relationship so I am able to create your dream vacation. All my services are FREE!

name: Vacation Rental       Near Disney
description:
The Hamlets villa description  
  
This welcoming 5 bedroom, 3 bath pool home is situated in the electronic gated Community of the Hamlets just off of the US192. It has a well thought out spacious open floor plan with easy access to the extended pool deck from the family room. On the ground floor is a queen size bedroom and a separate full size bathroom with tub and shower. The upstairs master suite has a king size bed, master bathroom with double sink vanity , shower and tub. The remaining bedrooms on this floor are one queen size bedded room and two twin bedded rooms, these share the family bathroom. All bedrooms have the benefit of their own TV. For your convenience Wi-fi internet and free local and long distance telephone calls are supplied in the villa.   
  
The covered lanai area is an ideal place to enjoy al fresco dining and the pool with its extended deck and privacy fence is a perfect way to relax after those long days at the parks and attractions.  
Feeling competitive? There is a mid size basketball shooting game and mid size pool table to test your skills on in the games room  
  
Located just off the US Hwy 192 in a quiet community, yet only minutes from all the major attractions, shops and restaurants. Disney is just 10 minutes away with all the other major parks within a 20 minute drive.  
  
Wal-Mart – a huge superstore, where you can buy almost anything is only 5 minutes away with Publix (supermarket) and Target even closer. Within 10 minutes you can be at other large chain stores such as KMart and also two superb designer outlet malls, featuring all the famous names.  
  
There are numerous restaurants and bars within a 5 minute drive and some do provide at home delivery. Everything is in place to make your stay feel like home.  
  
*FREE HIGH SPEED WIRELESS INTERNET! Included at no extra charge with all bookings!

In this gate-away house, you can find:

This gate-away home is a perfect spot to relax for a couple days and enjoy your time away from the city, get in touch with nature and have a great time with friends and family.

name: Vegas Vacation
description: Vegas Vacation is a 1997 comedy film directed by Stephen Kessler. It is the fourth installment in National Lampoon's Vacation film series, and was written by Elisa Bell, based on a story by Bell and Bob Ducsay. The film stars Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo and Randy Quaid, with Ethan Embry and Marisol Nichols as Griswold children Rusty and Audrey. The film opened at #4 at the box office and grossed over $36.4 million domestically. Vegas Vacation became the first theatrical Vacation film not to carry the National Lampoon label or a screenwriting credit from John Hughes.PlotAt work, Clark Griswold has invented a long life food preservative, earning him a large bonus check. Clark announces to his family that he is taking them on vacation. Enthusiasm wanes, however, when Clark says they are headed to Las Vegas, Nevada. His wife, Ellen and teenage daughter, Audrey have their doubts, as Las Vegas is not known for its family-friendly atmosphere, while teenage son Rusty appears to be more eager. Upon travelling to Vegas, they run into the "girl in the Ferrari" who appeared in the first film. Clark is the only one who sees her, but then notices that she now has a child.

description:
Unsalted Vacations' mission is to be a direct connection between vacation seekers and independent property owners in the beautiful shoreline communities of Michigan. Our great state is full of spectacular sites, beautiful sandy beaches, and charming cities and towns.. Quite simply, it's the perfect destination, and we're here to spread the word.

You're currently witnessing our humble beginnings.. Created in 2014 by husband and wife, Aaron and April May, Unsalted Vacations combines the May's love of Michigan and being by the water, with a clear vision they've had to invest back into the state that they love so much. 

While we only currently own two units ourselves, our goal is to own as many as 10 vacation rental properties by 2025. In addition to our own properties, we'll be representing other property owners and marketing their properties just the same as we do on our own. 

We have some big ideas for the future, but we're having a blast in the present, and we hope to help you create the perfect Michigan vacation for yourself. Thank you for your interest in Unsalted Vacations!

name: Poland Culinary Vacations, Inc.
description:
At Poland Culinary Vacations, we offer customized, intimate cooking, wine and spa vacations throughout various regions of Poland. We combine elements of countryside tourism—known locally as agrotourism—with a satisfying, slow-vacation approach. You'll enjoy hands-on and demonstration-style cooking lessons in Polish villages and acclaimed urban restaurants. In the evenings, you'll retire to the casual elegance and historic wonder of a castle, palace or manor during the rural portion of our trip. Refined luxury hotel accommodations await you while we're exploring the cities of Poland.
Come with us to Poland for a truly amazing vacation experience!
Along the way we'll:
- Cook traditional recipes in Polish villages with local women
- Visit neighborhood markets and Polish food festivals
- Sample rare delicacies from local artisan producers and family farms: breads, cheeses, preserves, sausages, wild game dishes, beer, honey wines, and world-renowned vodkas
- Go blueberry and mushroom hunting
- Learn local crafts
- Visit many famous cultural sites throughout Poland
- Learn about the history, traditions, and identity of the Polish people

description:

When we seem to be striving so desperately today to recapture all of the things we enjoyed in our earlier lives as children growing up, Sunset Beach is the logical choice for the perfect vacation. The island of Sunset Beach is unique in beauty due to the ever-growing size of our south facing island. While some islands have erosion, we seem to gain more & more of the sugar-fine sand that makes Sunset beach expansive and ideal for those who like wide-open spaces. We have one of the few remaining unspoiled treasures that no longer has to be something of the past, that can be enjoyed and cherished today.

Sunset vacations has the distinct privilege of managing some of the most comfortable and affordable vacation properties in today's market. We presently offer a broad spectrum of properties both in price and accommodations that are sure to suit every need from cozy mid-island cottages to luxurious oceanfront duplexes. The staff at Sunset Vacations and property owners share a timeless love for Sunset Beach and it's capacity for rest, relaxation and enjoyment. We invite you to experience for yourself while allowing our professional staff to find the perfect accommodations for your stay at Sunset Beach. We trust that together we can help you plan that vacation long remembered, never forgotten.

We invite you to utilize our website which features an interactive map, slideshows, "Featured Specials", vacation planning tips and much more. You'll find our homes decor, furnishings and equipment reflect the owner's personal tastes and we're sure you'll find a vacation home that especially suits you. For your convenience, you can secure any weekly Saturday to Saturday reservation from our website. All of Sunset Vacations rental homes include the following unless indicated in the home description Central Heat and Air, Dishwasher, Washer Dryer, Coffee Maker, Microwave, and Outside Shower. Or should you feel more comfortable speaking to one of our reservationists, our staff can provide you with year round personal service when you call (800) 331 - 6428. Our office hours are as follows: May 26st - September 1st -- Mon-Sat 9am-5pm Sundays 9am -Noon. September 1st - May 25th -- Mon-Sat-9am-5pm Closed on Sundays. Let the professional Sunset Vacations staff help you plan your Sunset Vacation today!

name: The Vacationist
description:
The Vacationist formed in the summer of 2014.  Cary Judd was working on what was originally intended as a solo album.  After renting a small office in a complex to work on the album, he reached out to Conor Souhrada, a sound designer he’d made friends with through his job at a local music store to occupy an empty office in the same complex.  Over the course of the summer they began collaborating on each other’s projects.  In a short time, they dubbed their work space, “The Wormhole Studio”, which quickly became a respected studio and production house in the Boise, ID area.    

As Judd’s work on the album progressed, he found himself knocking on Conor’s door more and more frequently to help generate sounds and give advice on production.   Judd had originally thought of The Vacationist as the title for his solo album, but as production continued it was clear that a new band was organically evolving.  As the album progressed, the duo recruited some of their friends from other local bands to add to the album.

Sam Carrier of A Sea of Glass fame pitched in on filling out guitar-soundscapes and riffing and writing with Cary and Conor.  Sunnie Lynne, Cary's partner and well known photographer was then enlisted as a band member/live production designer.

Sam continues to make appearances with TVAC as a live guitar player along with Scot Alexander (on loan from Dishwalla).

The sound and lyrical content of The Vacationist is inspired by the interests in physics, spirituality, and humanity’s place in the cosmos.  These elements are painted over sprawling soundscapes with heart pounding rhythms to create The Vacationist sound.

The self-titled debut was released on January 1, 2015.

name: Anantara Vacation Club Phuket Mai Khao
description:
The Anantara Vacation Club has been crafted especially to create a destination experience. In the dynamic climate of today’s world, travelling to remote places for relaxation and rejuvenation has become an indulgence, if not necessity, shared by many. 

As the cost of quality holiday accommodation increases, securing your holidays by becoming an Anantara Vacation Club Points Owner offers you potentially thousands of dollars in savings. During the life of an average person or family, money spent on the rental of holiday accommodation can be quite substantial. Anantara Vacation Club allows you to lock in your future holiday costs at todays values.

You can use your Club Points for many memory-making holidays and/or share your Club Points as a gift for family, friends and business associates. Additionally, through the Club Escapes and Global Traveller programmes, you have access to thousands of other resort destinations. If you cannot get away on a holiday of your own, you can privately rent your holiday reservation, subject to the Club Guidelines. You can also sell, transfer or will as part of your estate, your Ownership Points.

name: Cape San Blas Vacation Rentals: Pet Friendly Beach & Rentals
description: Best Pet Friendly Beach in the USA & great vacation rentals all on an uncrowded, pet friendly, white sand beach that welcomes your WHOLE family...even your dogs!  All of our rentals are in Barrier Dunes, a safe, gated community with 2 pools, tennis courts and 3 fresh water fishing ponds just outside the gates to St. Joseph Peninsula State Park.

name: Andaman Vacations
description:
The Andaman & Nicobar Islands are located to the east of the Indian mainland. Sandy beaches, isolated exotic beaches, underwater marine life, corals, crystal clear water, mangrove-lined creeks, endemic birds, limestone caves, mudvolcanoes and much more. The Andaman & Nicobar Islands are still virgin in the sense of natural beauty with unpolluted environs, unexplored coral life, commanding a rarity in contrast to other Islands in the Indian Ocean. The Andaman & Nicobar Islands undoubtedly form an exotic part of INCREDIBLE INDIA !!!

St. Jude Travels & Tours is a Govt. of India recognized tour operator based in Port Blair in the Andaman & Nicobar Islands. Our Agency was established in the year 2000 and since then has been involved in Air ticketing and handling inbound tours to these Emerald isles. Our office located in Port Blair is approved by IATA.

Our Commitments
We are fully aware that the environment is fragile and many people are poor in the rural belt of these Islands. We care deeply about the local people and the environment and are committed to responsible tourism. As most of our bookings are made by couples or small groups the ecological impact is kept to a minimum.

name: Wyndham Vacation Ownership
description: Wyndham Vacation Ownership, a member of Wyndham Worldwide’s (NYSE: WYN) family of companies, is the world’s largest vacation ownership business, as measured by the number of vacation ownership resorts, individual vacation ownership units and owners of vacation ownership interests.  Wyndham Vacation Ownership develops, markets and sells vacation ownership interests and provides consumer financing to owners through its five primary consumer brands, CLUB WYNDHAM, WorldMark by Wyndham, Wyndham Vacation Resorts Asia Pacific, Shell Vacations Club and Margaritaville Vacation Club®.  As of December 31, 2013, we have developed or acquired more than 190 vacation ownership resorts in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, the Caribbean and the South Pacific that represent more than 23,000 individual vacation ownership units and more than 900,000 owners of vacation ownership interests. Wyndham Vacation Ownership is headquartered in Orlando, Fla., and is supported by more than 16,000 associates globally.

name: Tink's Magical Vacations
description:
Authorized Disney Vacation Planners.  

Our vacation planners are here to help you.  All have completed the College of Disney Knowledge in addition to making trips on their own to Disneyland, Walt Disney World, Aulani, and cruises on Disney Cruise Line.

name: Young's Suncoast Realty & Vacation Rentals
description:
Young's Suncoast Realty & Vacation Rentals is a company that has it's roots deep in the sugar white beaches of the Alabama Gulf Coast.  

In 1962, Young's By The Sea opened as a family owned beachside hotel.  

By 1973, Young's had expanded operations to include rentals of beach houses in the pristine, undiscovered beauty of Gulf Shores.

In 2005, Young's merged with Suncoast to create Young's Suncoast, the finest Vacation Rental and Real Estate company in the area.

Long tradition and experience, combined with business savy and skill, make this little company nimble to change and responsive to clients and customers.  We've never lost the home town touch and friendly personal service that has kept people coming to Gulf Shores, Fort Morgan, and Orange Beach for generations.

Now, from Luxury High Rise Condominium Resorts, to cozy Beach Cottages, and everything in between, Young's Suncoast is ready to manage your property, or find a rental for your vacation or winter migration that will be suited to your budget and your needs.  The properties we manage are kept clean, are well maintained, and in the most experienced hands on the beach.

We've weathered every storm of Nature and the Economy, and year after year, decade after decade, we have treasured our personal relationships.  People with properties to rent, people who want to rent properties, and people looking for a special place for investment or retirement can testify that we treat you like family and will look after you like you're one of our own.

Some have called the Alabama Gulf Coast, Paradise Island.  It's like a little Mayberry by the beach, but with all the activities of a modern resort community, and with all the loving attention that the friendly locals are proud to provide.  The only thing warmer than our reception is the beach itself!

Come stay with us on one of the most beautiful shores in the world.  We're waiting just for you!

name: SummerMaine Vacation Rentals
description:
Houses to rent on the ocean, harbors, bays, and saltwater rivers of Midcoast Maine.

For over twenty years our company, SummerMaine, has been the source for exceptional four-season vacation rentals in Midcoast Maine. From quintessential cottages to spectacular retreats, we offer ideal rental properties for wonderful Maine vacations. Clean, classic and well-appointed waterfront accommodations are our benchmark, regardless of size.

Our houses are located in Port Clyde, Martinsville, Tenants Harbor, Spruce Head, Saint George, Friendship, Cushing, South Thomaston, Owls Head, Rockport, Camden and Vinalhaven — with accommodations for groups of any size. If you are looking for a vacation rental in Midcoast Maine, you have come to the right place.

Fletcher Hall has premier rentals available; she also has homes for sale. For over 6 years Fletcher has been a realtor in Maine. She doesn't find the perfect client for a house, she finds the perfect house for the client. She will make sure she knows what all of your wants and needs are first and foremost.

description:
Cannabis Vacations has gone above and beyond in vetting top tier lodging, with open minded cannabis friendly atmospheres. Tapping into an underserved market of discerning and loyal customers looking for accommodations that embrace their lifestyle.  Gone are the days of placing a towel underneath your hotel door. With Cannabis Vacations you can kick back on a balcony, relax in a hot tub or unwind with a view, and do what comes legally. 
Discover Cannabis Vacations to arrange your next adventure, or have your green-friendly accommodations listed with us
...where it’s always 4:20.

name: Creating Vacations
description:
Cruises, International/Domestic Travel and More!

Creating Vacations is based in Florida, so we were destined to be cruise experts. Florida is home to all kinds of wonderful ships that sail all over the world. With so many options, choosing the right one can be overwhelming. Let Creating Vacations help you sort through it all to find the cruising experience you are looking for.
We work with all the major companies, and the small ones too.  So you can be sure we will be able to find the right cruise for you!
We now also cover river cruising! 

International/Domestic Travel
Creating Vacations specializes in custom International and domestic travel. We can help you through the overwhelming process of choosing the perfect tour, cruise or destination. What sets us apart is our ability to create custom itineraries for those who want a unique and memorable experience. Our strong network of contacts and worldwide expertise allows us to plan a flawless travel experience for you.
This is your dream vacation and we want to make your dream a reality. Our planning process starts by asking you how you envision your trip and what you expect. We cover all aspects including overall budget, hotel quality, goals and experience. We propose to you our progress until you are completely satisfied with your perfect vacation. Let's get started today!
here at Creating Vacations, we are right next door to Mickey Mouse and the whole gang! 
 
Disney
Walt Disney World is just that, an entire world of Disney. There is so much to see and experience when it comes to this magical park.  We've got you and your family covered.  Here at Creating Vacations, we can help plan your perfect park experience from where you lay your head to where you eat your lunch.  We'll let you know all the in's and out's so you feel like a pro!

It's not just Disney World, we can help with all the Disney Resorts, Disney Land, and Disney Cruises!

All you have to do is let us know what you're looking for, and we can start creating your magical journey.
Consider Creating Vacations your fairy godmother when it comes to destination weddings and honeymoons.  We are here to help you make your special day as memorable as you hoped it would be.

Destination Wedding
Weddings are a lot of work! Take a load off, and get some help. Weddings are fun, and destination weddings take it a step further! Trust us, we know what we're talking about when it comes to this.  

Sure, destination weddings are not for everyone, but that's why we also cover honeymoons.

All you have to do is let us know what you're looking for, and we can start creating your happy ever after.

name: Neighbours from Hell 2: On Vacation
description: Neighbours from Hell 2: On Vacation , also known as Neighbours from Hell: On Vacation and Neighbours from Hell 2, is a comedy strategy video game for Microsoft Windows.CharactersWoody - The Playable Character and star of the TV ShowMr. Rottweiler / (The Neighbor From Hell) - The neighbor that Woody must play tricks on.Mom - Mr. Rottweiler's mom, who loves her son less than he loves her.Olga - The woman that the Neighbor is attracted to, and who has a kidOlga's child - He is the boy that the Neighbor tends to pick on for fun, much to annoyance of Olga.Yapper - A dog the Neighbor takes care for his mom.Joe - The director of the show, gives useful hints in training series.GameplayIn this game instead of being in a house, the player travels to various locations around the world. This time the player must have his caution turned to the Mom of the Neighbour from Hell too, if he doesn't want to be caught. The player has now 3 lives instead of one, and if he is spotted by the Neighbour, he will kick him to another area and lose a life. The graphics have been slightly improved. There is also a character named Olga, the woman that the Neighbour is attracted to, and player can use various things to have Olga beat him up (such as breaking the chair Neighbour is standing to and being a Peeping Tom while Olga is having shower). Also Olga has a child, but the player doesn't have to concern of him. As the game progresses, the player unlocks various new locations. In other parts of the game, his mom can also beat him up (such as adding ammunition with a flare gun).See also Neighbours from Hell JoWooD Entertainment

name: SellOffVacations.com
description:
Starting in 1979, “Dream Vacations”, as it was known then, was the first travel retailer to offer all inclusive package vacations.   In partnership with well known all inclusive resort pioneers ‘Jack Tar Village’ and key tour operators,  SellOffVacations.com helped tens of thousands of Canadians experience the convenience and relaxation of  all inclusive vacationing.

In early 2000, as internet technology emerged in the travel industry, SellOffvacations.com launched a transactional website, with an innovative travel discount model, offering Canadian consumers the convenience of shopping and buying affordable package holidays and flights via the internet.

Now offering discount flights, vacation packages, cruises, coach tours, hotels, car rentals, and more – SellOffVacations.com can fulfill all of your travel needs.  SellOffVacations.com has preferred partnerships with all major travel providers including tour operators, airlines, hotel chains, car rental, and bus tour companies.

Today, SellOffVacations.com is proud to be part of the Sunwing Travel Group, a leading vertically integrated privately-owned travel business comprised of Sunwing Airlines, two tour operators; Signature Vacations and Sunwing, and a retail division.  Perpetually on the Profit 100 list of Canada’s most successful businesses, the Sunwing Travel Group has a customer service oriented ‘entrepreneurial’ spirit and maintains a partnership with international travel giant, TUI Travel PLC.

description: VacationCentralFlorida.com is all about enjoying the magical venues of the Orlando area for less.  We are a group of owners who rent Windsor Hills condos and townhouses DIRECTLY to families who want to save money on lodging and save your money for the best vacation your family desires!

name: Global Vacation Network
description:
Global Vacation Network is celebrating 16 years of sales and service. GVN is the largest distributor for Global Connections, Inc® a BBB Accredited Business with
an A+ rating at the Greater Kansas City Better Business Bureau. What began as a buying service in 1971 has transformed into a world premier travel club. Today, GCI boasts a property portfolio with prime inventory in destinations around the world, plus develops and owns resorts in some of the most popular locations in the United States.  Today, Global Connections, Inc® is one of the most respected travel club developers and travel fulfillment providers in the vacation industry.

  
Global Vacation Network is excited to announce that it is working diligently to provide internal marketing and incentive capabilities. Our intention is to foster the best relationships with our clients by eliminating all third party affiliations and with the vendors who are currently shipping the promotional items to each and every client. Global Vacation Network is committed to providing the best possible customer service before during and after the presentation of our products and services. While we realize that everyone is working diligently,  we strive to upgrade and streamline our internal marketing and promotional efforts for the best possible results.

name: Great Value Vacations
description:
We offer premium, pre-built vacation packages to the top destinations in the world. Our vacations feature itineraries designed by travel experts and superior accommodations which have been hand-picked and vetted for quality. What’s more, we offer these vacations packages at Great Value prices that are at or better than if you were to purchase the components separately.  Our state-of-the-art technolgy provides our customers with an easy to use booking system that allows you to book complicated vacations with just a few clicks.

Expert Advice
Our team of product experts are your “feet on the street” creating vacation itineraries we’d send our family on (and they have VERY high standards!) We do the heavy lifting for you by researching the best destinations, hand selecting the most desirable accommodations, designing a perfect vacation itinerary and recommending things to do and see along the way.

Customer Support
We’re there for you at every step – from your first call or visit to our website right up until your flight home. Our vacation specialists and support staff are available to answer questions, provide advice or assist you at any point during the vacation planning process. Plus we offer Trip Protection Plans which allows you to cancel your trip for any reason up to 72 hours prior to travel and received a full refund and have access to 24-hr Emergency Assistance while you travel.

TRAVELER PROTECTION
GreatValueVacations.com is a member of USTOA's $1 Million Traveler's Assistance Program http://goo.gl/YFyu4s

PLEASE NOTE:  We will not address specific customer service issues on this page. If you have a question or an immediate concern you can call a customer service representative at 1.800.896.4600.

name: Vacation Today With Kat
description:
WorldVentures was born
on December 10, 2005, with the mission to create more fun, freedom and fulfilment in people’s lives through the merging of great life experiences, financial opportunity, personal development and contribution.

WorldVentures™ founders Wayne Nugent and Mike Azcue experienced great success in business early in their careers, but both came to realize there had to be a better way to make a living. Wayne always held the belief that work must be about more than money—it needs to be about passion, adventure and fun. For Mike, success had taken a heavy toll on his family life; the long hours, long miles and slavish commitment to the next new business deal had become a wedge between his personal and professional lives. From these life experiences came a simple business philosophy: help people get more fun, freedom and fulfillment in their lives. And thus was born the WorldVentures lifestyle.

รับเฉพาะลูกค้าที่ต้องการพักผ่อนเป็นกลุ่มครอบครัวแบบสงบเท่านั้น
ไม่รับกลุ่มวัยรุ่น นักเรียน นักศึกษา หรือกลุ่มเพื่อนที่ต้องการสังสรรค์ปาร์ตี้แบบเอะอะเสียงดัง
ห้ามร้องคาราโอเกะ ดีดกีตาร์ ร้องเพลง ห้ามใช้เครื่องขยายเสียง
ห้ามสัตว์เลี้ยงทุกชนิด 
เวลาเข้าพักหลัง 14.00 น. เวลาออกไม่เกิน 12.00 น.
ดูรายละเอียดบ้านพัก รูปภาพในบ้านแต่ละหลัง ราคาและตารางจองบ้านได้ที่ www.baanrimtalayhuahin.com ค่ะ (เบอร์ติดต่อดูในหน้าเว็บได้เลยค่ะ อยากให้อ่านรายละเอียดของบ้านพักก่อนโทรมาค่ะ)

name: Adult Vacation Parties
description:
We help open-minded and adventurous adults, couples and singles searching for a fun-filled, wildly expressive, judgment-free holiday experience, find that perfect fantasy vacation. Our clientele work hard all year and wish to indulge their senses and fantasies  amongst like-minded, accepting, fun-loving, free-spirited people in luxurious and upscale resorts.
You’re tired of the same old all-inclusive beach vacation where you end up feeling just as repressed and judged as you do back home. You need a real break – an escape from the routine, the confines and the limitations your ‘normal’ life has you trapped in.
Even though you may love your life, your career, your family and friends, there is a side of you that feels stifled and you want to experience all that life has to offer. You are yearning to explore your fantasies and unleash your passions.
Your family’s travel agency can be awkward and embarrassing. You can try calling a new travel agent and hope they don’t treat you like an outcast. You can research online and try to put together a ‘dream’ vacation on your own but you’re not sure what you’re going to get. It could be too lame or too extreme and you may have to settle for something that isn’t what you were hoping for. We can help!

我們的專業旅遊顧問均擁有超過十年以上的豐富旅遊知識和經驗，能深切了解客戶不同的需要。我們用最真誠貼心的服務態度，按照顧客的要求和所需，為其度身訂造最合適貼切的旅程，且每次為顧客提供實用的旅遊資訊與支援，務求令每位客人得到最優質貼心的全面旅遊服務。

name: SwimBarbadosVacations
description:
Swim in the crystal waters of the Caribbean Sea!  The 4th Barbados Open Water Festival will be held in November 2015. Conditions are ideal for open water swimming in Barbados especially at the venue: the historic and magnificent Carlisle Bay.  The organizers are veterans of the local swim/water polo/triathlon fraternity.  They have a passion for swimming and for growing the sport in Barbados. The focus is on professionalism, safety and providing a truly enjoyable experience in the Caribbean.

The event is made up of two swims, a 1.5km swim (Nov 7th) and a 5 km swim (Nov 8th) plus SUP relay races & kayak races. This year guided practise swims will be offered on November 4,5,6th. (Location of practise swims: Nov 4th - Carlisle Bay, Nov 5th - Port St Charles Yacht club & Nov 6th: Nr Oistins at "Miami Beach"!. Swimmers & triathletes of all skill levels, from recreational to elite are welcome! Swim at your own pace. The races are broken down into age categories for men, women and children, see web site for details on this, prizes and more. Great prizes on offer!
 (http://www.swimbarbadosvacations.com).

In 2014 we welcomed our first open water world champion: Alex Meyer.  He swam and won the 5k event and hosted an open water clinic.  Alex won a gold medal at the 2010 World Championships in the 25-kilometer open water event. He was a member of the 2012 United States Olympic team, and placed tenth in the 10-kilometer open water event at the 2012 Summer Olympics. In 2014 he won the US National 5 km title and a FINA 5km in Canada among others. For the second year you will have the opportunity to line up with Alex Meyer in the 5 km race! Alex recently defended his US National 5km title.
Non-swimming partners, spouses, friends and children are very welcome and can enjoy a wide variety of activities while in Barbados.  Barbados is the land of water sports: kayak, SUP, surfing, fishing plus many wonderful land-based sight seeing tours.  Explore the Caves, sit on a Concorde, sail on a Pirate Ship, discover the art of rum making or just sit on a beach and watch the sun go down.  Follow us on twitter:  @BarbadosOWSwim
Thanks from the Swim Barbados Team!
Email us directly at kevelyn@caribsurf.com and/or zmevelyn@caribsurf.com

name: Big Bear Vacations
description:
We understand it's the memories that bring people back to this amazing area each season.   The more detailed vacation vision you have, the more we can help create that experience!  Pick from over 300 homes and cabins ranging from rustic and simple to luxuriously grand.  Plan your itinerary with our Activity Planner and download our Free Big Bear Vacations Mobile App full of local information. With such a great selection of locations, amenities, decor and pricing, we have the perfect accommodations for you, your family, friends and groups.  You can browse properties online or let us help! Our Team is excited to assist in every way possible to ensure your time is spent enjoying this beautiful mountain setting full of connections and adventures.
The Big Bear area is a Natural Treasure that includes access to:
600,000 acres of pristine National Forest
Hundreds of miles of trails
3,000 acres of crystal clear Lake Surface
23 miles of lake shoreline
Top-rated ski resorts
and so much more...
For this mountain playground, we can coordinate everything from your boat or bike rentals to lift tickets. Flowers can be waiting in your cabin or let us get you a discount with our local horse stables.  Spending some time in your cabin after a day full of activities? Pamper yourself to an in-house massage next to the fireplace, then just relax under the amazing view of the stars.   Visit our Experience and our Concierge pages to find out more.
It’s about reconnecting—to nature, to your friends, your loved ones. Explore the Big Bear winter wilderness on snowshoes, go on a guided off-road tour, take your pick and carve the slopes at Snow Summit or Bear Mountain, or go really big and do them both.

There really is no better winter destination in SoCal. We’re really close to several major airports, and just a few hours’ drive from Los Angeles. And yet up here, in the altitude, with the peaks all glistening under snowcaps and the crisp air filling your lungs, LA might be the last thing on your mind. 

This winter season is going to be an epic one. We had our earliest snowfall on record! The slopes are open and churning, the season is officially on. And if you’re not in the mood to be up on the hill, our little Big Bear Village is a big time too. Great shopping, carriage rides, fine or casual dining, live music, bowling . . . the list goes on. 

Remember: Things book up fast, so start booking now. 

If you want rustic, but you don't want to sacrifice sophistication, we understand that; check out our Big Bear Lake Luxury properties.  We've cultivated a list of luxury homes for your choosing.  Reconnect with style.  There is no roughing it in our upscale homes, built in premiere locations around Big Bear.  From lakeside to slopeside, the choice is yours.

Make yourself at home on the mountain and really get to know life in Big Bear Lake.  Our Extended Stay program enables you to enjoy spring, summer and fall.  For the price you'd pay for only a couple weekends, you can have a whole season of fun and relaxation.

Planning a group retreat?  This is a big responsibility, and we want to help.  We know you need to ensure the accommodations and activities will be great for everyone involved.  Big Bear Lake is the perfect place to cultivate social cohesion and send everyone away with memories that will last a lifetime.

Need assistance finding the perfect fit property and setting up your itinerary?   Our friendly and knowledgeable Vacation Planners are standing by 24/7.

Your family or group will enjoy cooking and entertaining with your own fully equipped kitchen and outdoor BBQ.  Relax in front of the wood burning fireplace or out on the deck in a Jacuzzi. Gather the family and play board games or billiards!  Step out to your deck to enjoy the Mountain View or onto your dock for some lake fun.   Stargazing enthusiast love our spectacular sky away from the city lights.  Most units are pet friendly so if you want to bring your furry family friend, please mention this at the time of booking. (Pet fees apply)

All ownerships are sold as either a ground lease or a term-for-years.Resort LocationsDisneyland Resort (Anaheim, CA)The Villas at Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & SpaWalt Disney World Resort (Lake Buena Vista, FL)Bay Lake Tower at Disney's Contemporary ResortDisney's Animal Kingdom VillasDisney's Beach Club VillasDisney's BoardWalk VillasDisney's Old Key West Resort, originally named The Disney Vacation Club ResortDisney's Polynesian Villas & BungalowsDisney's Saratoga Springs Resort & SpaThe Villas at Disney's Grand Floridian Resort & SpaThe Villas at Disney's Wilderness Lodge

name: Vacation with Derek
description: Vacation with Derek is a 2010 Canadian television movie based on the TV series Life with Derek. The TV movie follows the McDonald-Venturi family as the children are forced to spend part of their summer vacation with their grandmother at her lodge. It was announced on Family Channel and French-Canadian channel VRAK.TV in March 2010 that the movie would premiere on June 25, 2010 in Canada, while December 12, 2010 is listed in the trailer for the US, but never actually aired when it was supposed to. However, the movie finally began airing on Starz Kids & Family in January 2011 in the U.S. A commercial on Nickelodeon Australia stated that it would premiere on June 19, 2010. A commercial on TG4 stated the Irish premiere would be on the channel Thursday October 28, 2010 at 5:10 p.m., part of the channel's Mid-Term Halloween movie week.PlotCasey and Derek are back but nothing has changed, they are still at each other's throats, and still have sibling rivalry. The only good thing about it all is that it's summer vacation, and everyone is planning on going on a trip to Casey and Lizzie's grandmother's lakefront lodge for the summer. But their plans get a little messed up when Derek is forced into going by his dad. Things get even more messed up when Casey has to ride with Derek to the Blue Heron Lodge. On their way up there they get pulled over by the cops, meanwhile Edwin, Lizzie, Marti, Nora and George have already arrived. They soon find out that when Nora's mom said she wanted her grandchildren to visit, she meant her blood grandchildren, but agrees to let them stay, while George and Nora head for Montreal. Soon Derek and Casey get to the lodge but get stopped by Edwin who informs them about what's happened. After this, Derek says he wants to leave, Casey takes his keys, and he starts running after her. That's when Derek meets Felicia. One thing leads to another and Derek stars dating the competing lodge's daughter, then he soon realizes that it wasn't the best thing to be doing, and he breaks up with her. Meanwhile, Casey meets Jesse, a waiter at the lodge dining area, and they both love to dance and start dancing. Meanwhile Edwin gets hurt, Lizzie meets a guy, and Marti finds a lizard. Soon one thing leads to another and they end up trying to save the lodge and they succeed. At the end they have a dance party, and it shows the ending credits then shows it a year later when the first McDonald-Venturi is born. They named him Simon, and everything is well, and everyone lives happily ever after.

A division of South African Airways (FLYSAA, www.flysaavacations.com), the national airline of South Africa and Africa’s most awarded airline, FLY SAA Vacations is highly regarded for its wide array of affordable luxury packages to Africa, and utilizes SAA’s extensive route network to create packages for travel throughout South Africa, Botswana, Victoria Falls, Namibia, Mozambique, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Tanzania and the Indian Ocean Islands. 

The program is managed and fulfilled by Destination Southern Africa (DSA, www.myafricavacation.com), which was founded in 2001 and offers an extensive portfolio of tour programs with a variety of hotels, game lodges and safari companies throughout Southern Africa. 
DSA was one of three tour operators in the U.S. officially appointed by MATCH to develop and sell travel packages for soccer fans visiting South Africa for the FIFA 2010 World Cup, making it a partner with extensive knowledge and know-how in planning the perfect African vacation.

DSA's partner company in South Africa is Tour d'Afrique, one of the most respected ground handlers for Southern and Eastern Africa. The partnership between three such great companies affords the visitor to Africa a one stop shop when it comes to traveling and exploring this magnificent continent.

Perhaps Morehead is more of your flavor with one-of-a-kind restaurants, art, nightlife and watch the fishing charters bring in the day’s catch. Venture over to the Crystal Coast and you’ll find more than sun and sand. These beaches are pristine, wide and uncrowded. Perfect for a family vacation.

Our activities flow throughout the year with festivals, parades, concerts, annual tournaments, and more. www.ncvacations.com/event/index.html
Your next vacation or long term rental is awaiting you and we have it!

Experience the coast.

name: Kingdom Magic Vacations
description:
For over 17 years Kingdom Magic Vacations has specialized in making vacation dreams come true for families visiting Disneyland® Resort, Walt Disney World® Resort, Disney Cruise Line®, and Universal Studios Orlando.  We know that each moment you spend on vacation creates a memory that lasts a lifetime. 

Kingdom Magic Vacations has been honored as an Authorized Disney Vacation Planner and that means we are a recognized by Disney as a leader in planning magical vacations to Disney destinations.  Our knowledge and experience allows our travel professionals to custom-tailor your Disney vacation and make them truly magical.  

Why Kingdom Magic Vacations?

•Disney offers dozens of packages, promotions, ticket plans and places to stay. It can get overwhelming; we can make your vacation planning simple and easy!

•Our Travel management team has years of experience in planning Disney vacations and when you do only one thing, and you love what you do, it shows.

•At Kingdom Magic you will work with the same agent,  every time,  throughout every step of your vacation planning and beyond! 

•All of our agents are Disney College of Knowledge Graduates! That means that we have been personally trained by Disney to plan your magical vacation.

•We make your Concierge Level Service and Priority Dining Reservations for you! You pick the restaurant or special event you would like to attend and we will do the rest.

name: 가을방학(autumn vacation)
description:
둘이 처음 만난 건 2008년 가을. 그랜드 민트 페스티벌에서 브로콜리 너마저 공연을 마친 계피는 주차장에서 우연히 정바비와 마주쳤다. 당시 짧은 대화를 나누고 헤어지며 계피는 말했다. “나중에 백보컬이 필요하면 연락주세요.”

계피의 말에 정바비가 응한 것은 그로부터 꽤 오랜 시간이 흐른 2009년 늦봄이었다. 부담 없이 가볍게 몇 곡 작업해 보자는 제안을 시작으로 둘은 2009년 6월에서 7월 사이 총 12곡을 작업했다. 그리고 그 해 가을 디지털 싱글 <가을방학 / 3월의 마른 모래>를 발매했다. 2010년 가을, 첫 정규앨범 <가을방학>을 발표했다. 모든 곡을 작사·작곡한 정바비가 기타를 잡았고, 계피가 마이크를 잡았다.


2009. 가을방학 결성
2009. 디지털 싱글 <가을방학/3월의 마른 모래>발표.
2010. 민트페이퍼 프로젝트 음반 <Life>에 "취미는 사랑" 수록.
2010. 1집 <가을방학> 발매.
2011. 디지털 싱글 <오래된커플> 발매.
2011. 테라플루 CF 삽입곡으로 <감기약> 발표.
2012. 가을방학 + 김재훈으로 <실내악 외출>발매.
2012. 디지털 싱글 <근황> 발매.
2012. 가을방학 + 에피톤 프로젝트 "아이보리" 공개.
2013. 2집 <선명> 발매.
2013. 디지털 싱글 <첫사랑> 발매.
2014. 디지털 싱글 <종이우산> 발매.

name: Be Photography / Be Vacations
description:
Be Photography
As a photojournalist, I approach wedding photography with the same ethics I use when covering news assignments. My purpose is to observe and document the day with as little interruption and attention drawn to myself as possible. Although I am based in the Baltimore/DC area, I regularly provide services up and down the east coast as well as internationally.

I designed my company to work the way I wish I would have found it when I got married. Unlike most of my competition, you’ll find my pricing directly on the website. You are not forced to buy albums, prints, etc. as part of a package deal, and all of the high-resolution digital files are yours to do with as you please.

Wedding photographers have made this industry way too complicated for couples getting married – Be Photography is wedding photography simplified.

“Destination Weddings Like Nobody Else…”
I travel anywhere in the world, often, at zero cost to my clients. Yes, you read that correctly. This is not a gimmick, a contest, or a promotion. Each year, I accept a limited number of destination weddings that cost my clients nothing.

How is that possible? Well, because I have the added benefit of being a travel agent in addition to being a photographer, I am able to handle destination weddings like nobody else. If you use Be Vacations (my travel company) to book your group’s trip, (and you hit the minimum number of rooms required), you’ll get my photography services (and travel expenses) for FREE! It’s that simple. Call me today to discuss!

name: Cayucos Vacation Rentals, Inc.
description:
Do you remember what a real vacation was like as a kid? 

Cayucos Vacation Rentals does! Carefree sunny days splashing in the ocean water, combing the low tide for shells and star fish. Barbequed burgers and counting the stars at night while listening to waves crashing ashore. Cayucos has been referred to as the town that time forgot, the slow pace, small town charm, with little or no traffic, crime or smog. Leave your busy lives behind while spending a long weekend or a summer week with us and build family memories that will last a life time. When's the last time you built a sand castle at the beach? 

Make plans for your next vacation on the beautiful Central California Coast. Cayucos Vacation Rentals offers more than 50 prime properties. Cayucos (an Indian name for kayak or little canoe) gives visitors the rare experience of slowing down from life in the fast lane with miles of beautiful coastline, no stoplights, and a very slow pace of living that make this quaint beach town a place to remember and a place you will want to return to. It is one of the roads less traveled. You may wish to explore the shoreline, watch the whales, dolphins or seabirds, take a short or long hike, bicycle or kayak in the ocean or on the bay. There are many wineries nearby as well. Perhaps you prefer sport fishing. On the pier, in the surf, or on a boat out to sea, all offer the sport fisherman the best fishing has to offer. 

If you are a golf enthusiast, there are many beautiful courses nearby. You will find several other activities on the inspiring, unspoiled Central Coast as well. If none of the above satisfy your desires for a dream vacation, perhaps you will become renewed, refreshed and enjoy doing nothing at all except relaxing here in Cayucos. The sea brings peace to the soul.

name: Jersey Shore Vacations
