name: Wealth Factory
description:
We help entrepreneurs and business owners keep more of their money and increase monthly cash flow without having to work harder, take on more risk, or hire a single new employee. 

Built by entrepreneurs, for entrepreneurs, we understand the specific needs of self-employed entrepreneurs, small business owners, sole proprietors, professional service providers and freelancers. 

Unlike traditional financial plans that focus exclusively on retirement planning, we teach you money-management techniques that require no painful budgeting, yet frees up your monthly cash flow immediately. These easy-to-implement techniques are extremely powerful and allow you to deploy and enjoy your hard-earned money today rather waiting 20-30 years for retirement. 

Once cash flow is optimized, we’ll give you a plan to build long-term, sustainable wealth by identifying investments that suit you own personal Investor DNA™. This innovative approach takes into account your personality, education and strengths with every investment decision you make. 

This is the only sure-fire method we’ve discovered that puts you in complete control of your financial plan. It leverages what you know best to preserve your wealth and help avoid painful investment losses. 

As busy entrepreneurs ourselves, we’re mindful of the hectic pace of life that comes with owning your own business. As a result, our trainings avoid overly technical economic theory or confusing financial terminology. Instead, we explain everything in full detail, without jargon, using simple direct language that gets to the point quickly to save you time and money. 

We commit ourselves to helping the helpers (business owners like you) enjoy the money they earn right now while simultaneously building a lasting legacy of wealth for your family. 

If you want to build sustainable wealth, increase your monthly cash flow and enjoy financial freedom, we believe we have all the tools and training you need to live the life you love.

name: Wealth Securities Inc.
description:
Wealth Securities, Inc. (WSI or the Company) is a leading member broker of the Philippine Stock Exchange. The Company was incorporated in 1986 primarily to engage in the business of broker and/or dealer of securities. Through the years, WSI has consistently ranked among the top local brokers in terms of value turnover. As such, the Company was adjudged by Euromoney as the “Best Domestic Securities House in the Philippines for the Year 2000.”

WSI is among the highest-capitalized brokers in the industry with paid-up capitalization of P320 million. The Company has access to a diverse client base, both retail and institutional investors, including high net worth individuals. WSI is backed by a research group composed of analysts with combined equities market experience of more than two decades. The group covers the mid-to large capitalization stocks but is also known for their keen eye in spotting small companies with excellent fundamentals and large growth potentials.

To further improve customer service, WSI has recently developed an online trading platform which provides stock brokerage services through the Internet. Customers can now have access to real-time quotes, mark-to-market account & security balances, online order placement, and transaction tracking. Customers who avail of this service will also have access to a wealth of trading information, up-to-date news, analysis and charting tools.

The objective of this online trading facility is to empower customers with tools to help them make well-informed investment decisions and to allow for faster & more convenient execution of trades. With this new service, WSI intends to be positioned at the forefront of the growing online trading business.

name: Wealth
description: Wealth is the abundance of valuable resources or valuable material possessions. This includes the core meaning as held in the originating old English word weal, which is from an Indo-European word stem. An individual, community, region or country that possesses an abundance of such possessions or resources to the benefit of the common good is known as wealthy.The modern concept of wealth is of significance in all areas of economics, and clearly so for growth economics and development economics yet the meaning of wealth is context-dependent. At the most general level, economists may define wealth as "anything of value" that captures both the subjective nature of the idea and the idea that it is not a fixed or static concept. Various definitions and concepts of wealth have been asserted by various individuals and in different contexts. Defining wealth can be a normative process with various ethical implications, since often wealth maximization is seen as a goal or is thought to be a normative principle of its own.United Nations definition of inclusive wealth is a monetary measure which includes the sum of natural, human and physical assets. Natural capital includes land, forests, fossil fuels, and minerals. Human capital is the population's education and skills. Physical (or "manufactured") capital includes such things as machinery, buildings, and infrastructure. Qatar is the wealthiest country in the world per capita.

name: The Wealth Chef
description:
Speaker, trainer and Hay House Author Ann Wilson is a self-made millionaire with a straight forward, jargon free and supportive approach to money, investing and wealth designed to help anyone become Financially Free.

Ann uses her international business experience in high-profile corporate positions together with her skills gained as a professional Civil Engineer and NLP Master Practitioner and Trainer to achieve her mission of making financial freedom a reality for as many woman as possible by teaching them how to keep, invest and grow their money.

Born in South African, a twin and number 5 of six kids, Ann leant how to make myself heard young. After studying Civil Engineering and armed with additional business management studies she worked all over the world on exciting infrastructure projects, not only playing with big construction toys but also having the privilege of adding value and creating assets that improve people lives. 

Along the way she met her husband and together they lived and worked
in Hong Kong, Australia, London, South Africa and now in Paris.

From her last corporate General Management role of making sure £8bn was spent effectively on infrastructure delivery via a team of 200+ contract professionals, Ann now spends her time doing what she loves most;  walking her dog in beautiful places and teaching others the recipes of wealth so they too can be free to live their lives on their terms.

Her journey to financial freedom wasn’t always smooth.... 

In fact in the twenty plus years she has been learning about money, money management, investments and wealth she kissed a lot of real wealth “frogs”, crashed and burned on a few “easy money schemes”, lost and gained money confidence, and at times felt really despondent about ever getting her wealth sorted. 
But she did and along the way discovered that there are only a handful of core ‘recipes’ for wealth, which if learnt and consistently applied, Financial Freedom is guaranteed. 

Ann truly believes anyone can become financially free, as a result of their own efforts and abilities, and she provides anyone who has the desire to achieve financial freedom, all the recipes and menus they need to create abundant wealth and teaches them the skills to master them.

name: 財訊
description:
1974年創刊的《財訊》，是台灣財經雜誌中，最資深權威的財經專業媒體。

數十年來始終秉持「引領趨勢、創造財富，掌握政經、放眼國際」的核心價值，報導領域涵蓋財經趨勢、投資資訊、企業動向、產業動態、政情研判等，是創造兩岸三地政經投資理財議題，洞燭市場的先行者。
 
在 2009年10月28日，《財訊》正式改版為《財訊雙週刊》，更迅速的反映新聞的變化、更及時地為讀者篩選出真正有用的資訊。

一如月刊般嚴謹的查證，追蹤深入報導新聞始末，既有月刊的深度，也具有周刊的速度！
除了既有的財經及政治深入報導之外，還有更多金融訊息與投資含量，提供讀者更專業、更豐富、更實用的財經資訊。
 
《財訊雙週刊》開闢企業、投資、金融、政治、科技等不同領域的重量級名人專欄，由中外名家：諾貝爾大師史迪格里茲、謝金河、陶冬、南方朔、吳念真、顧爾德、林昭亮等輪流執筆，提供專業新知與獨到見解。

同時精選全球財經專業媒體的授權文章，透過英國《金融時報FINANCIAL TIMES》、美國《華爾街日報THE WALL STREET JOURNAL》、日本《朝日新聞》，提供讀者更多元且深入的國際視野。
 
近年更致力於數位化閱讀，電子雜誌、手機格式、線上閱讀等，與平面雜誌同步發行，期許更貼近讀者生活、資訊流通更迅速即時。

name: United Wealth International Inc.
description:
About us
Idealism forms the basis of United Wealth. The company, founded in 2015, is the result of the enthusiasm and creativity of two people. Our goal is to help people move forward in the financial arena, in their personal development, health, emotional and relational spheres, also called environment. United Wealth believes that there is plenty for everyone. Cooperation ensures that we can share this with you. The mission of United Wealth is to provide the opportunities and the tools to strengthen your personal and financial Wealth. We do this by means of the Wealth Creation Workshop. At United Wealth, each UW Partner has equal opportunities, because we use a Multi-level-Marketing system also called direct marketing. United Wealth is an internationally operating company. Clarity and transparency are of major importance for United Wealth. By publishing its business results quarterly United Wealth can guarantee that. These figures are checked by an international auditor. So our UW financial Partners can be certain that everything is sound financially.  Thus they can introduce interested parties to UW convincingly and with confidence. Integrity is paramount at United Wealth. We will not make any unfounded claims and we keep our promises. United Wealth takes responsibility for its UW Partners and therefore checks - before we acquire a company - whether this is sufficiently aware of "corporate social responsibility". United Wealth is Responsible, Honest and Transparent.
Profit-sharing 
In order to realize our “dream”, we have looked for ways to support people financially. This starting point can provide a lasting and hence structural change to a situation. Taking over and setting up new companies in order to share the profits they generate, appears to be the most reliable route for this idealistic concept to succeed, both now and in the distant future. This setup ensures that the value of the United Wealth portfolio of companies will continue to rise. This portfolio is owned by an association, which is based in The Netherlands, Europe.  UW Partners automatically become members of this Association when they join United Wealth.  As a result the income of our United Wealth Partners is guaranteed.

name: Wealth Generators - Team VIP
description:
Wealth Generators is all about helping your money work for you. Sure, everyone talks about putting their money to work, but what do you really DO about it? If you want to invest, it takes a lot of time, a lot of knowledge, and nerves of steel to weather the ups and downs of the market. Until now.

Our Find, Grow, Keep philosophy helps you find money in your own budget you didn’t know you had, and learn to manage your money. Our money management expert helps you learn to control your money, rather than having your money control you.

Wealth Generators helps anyone ─ from trading experts to those who’ve never been in the markets before ─ to grow your money by implementing a simple, affordable, proven system for success that doesn’t require you to spend your days watching the market. Our founders have created a system that helps you do exactly that. The key is the access you get to our market experts. Simply follow their stock alerts, be consistent, and prosper.

Beyond putting your money to work, you also have the opportunity to have your own independent small business with no overhead, allowing you to leverage the efforts of others as well. Plus, you get the tax benefits of having your own business. Our partnership with Taxbot will help you get every possible deduction and its easier than you think.

The unique combination of our founders, experts, and executive team is what makes this all possible. Each person is the very best at what they do. And what they do is everything possible to help you succeed. Wealth Generators… Find, Grow, Keep. It’s that simple.

name: WealthVest
description:
WealthVest — based in Bozeman, MT, and San Francisco, CA — is a financial services marketing and distribution firm specializing in high-quality fixed and fixed index annuities from many high quality insurance companies. For the 10,000+ baby boomers who are retiring daily, retirement is top of mind. Americans have purchased $24.2 trillion in retirement assets to insure their golden years, according to the ICI. WealthVest specializes in the marketing and distribution of these essential building blocks of retirement savings for financial professionals and their clients across the nation.

WealthVest was founded in 2009 by former CEO of American Skandia, Wade Dokken, and former CEO of Hartford Life Limited, Europe, Lincoln Collins. From the beginning, the company has provided financial professionals with exceptional field and phone support, effective sales training materials, thorough coaching, and the highest quality product.
The company possesses four sales teams: a field wholesaling team dedicated to banks and broker-dealers; a field wholesaling team dedicated to independent broker-dealers; a team dedicated to independent agents and advisors; and a Bozeman-based sales team focused on all agents and advisors. WealthVest has relationships with over 130 banks and broker-dealers around the United States, more than 100 committed professionals on its team, and over $1 billion in sales to date.

name: The Wealth of Nations
description: An Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, generally referred to by its shortened title The Wealth of Nations, is the magnum opus of the Scottish economist and moral philosopher Adam Smith. First published in 1776, the book offers one of the world's first collected descriptions of what builds nations' wealth and is today a fundamental work in classical economics. By reflecting upon the economics at the beginning of the Industrial Revolution, the book touches upon such broad topics as the division of labor, productivity, and free markets.HistoryThe Wealth of Nations was published 9 March 1776, during the Scottish Enlightenment and the Scottish Agricultural Revolution. It influenced a number of authors and economists, as well as governments and organizations. For example, Alexander Hamilton was influenced in part by The Wealth of Nations to write his Report on Manufactures, in which he argued against many of Smith's policies. Interestingly, Hamilton based much of this report on the ideas of Jean-Baptiste Colbert, and it was, in part, Colbert's ideas that Smith responded to with The Wealth of Nations.Many other authors were influenced by the book and used it as a starting point in their own work, including Jean-Baptiste Say, David Ricardo, Thomas Malthus and, later, Ludwig von Mises. The Russian national poet Aleksandr Pushkin refers to The Wealth of Nations in his 1833 verse-novel Eugene Onegin.

name: Wealthmanagement
description:
My passion in the financial industry is to help as many people possible. I believe that as South African’s we do not have a saving mentality. The problem comes in where we start saving too late or don’t start at all to save…. We spend from month to month with no provision for emergency money or money when we retire or provision for our families when we are no longer around to provide for them.

If we can help enough people to make a change in their financial planning we believe they will share this with their children so they will help their children when they become adults to plan for a better future, this way we will start to change a generation for the better, so that we don’t send people and families back into the cycle of poverty.

More so in the past, a lot of people weren’t privileged to financial advisers or they just were not told about financial planning, thus the reason they have ended up where they are today, so for me it is important to help as many people as possible and get them to refer me to their friends, families and colleagues, this way if they decide not to look into their financial affairs, they have at least made an informed decision as they had all information on hand

I would love to make a huge impact on the next generations wealth management, once again for the better, to help the ‘everyday’ man out there, not only him/ her, but for their families too.

Imagining a niche financial services group based on creating a unique customer experience and the need to start a dialogue about how to achieve long-term financial security without compromising on lifestyle - they set out to simplify complex financial terms and strategies, making them digestible and above all, relatable. name: Health Wealth Happiness Success
description:
"Officially Changing The World - Member of www.TheWellnessUniverse.com"

Our aim is to inspire and motivate people to find new ways to better health, growth and spiritual awareness and present a whole new world of opportunities to explore. Or redirect your thinking on a more spiritual plane. The techniques of visualization has been used for centuries as a powerful means of training the human mind, and it is a wonderful tool to use in bringing about change. It's a remarkable, powerful way of preparing yourself for success. 

The Spiritual Path and Taking the First Step to No Where.
 
There is no path. Yet as we progress, as we evolve, as we go along, those are the words used to describe what we are doing. In our mind, it seems like we are following a path, a linear kind of thing, as step-by-step, a foot before a foot kind of situation. Yet it isn’t a path we are on, it is an experience of application. The spiritual path is about application. Think about how a plant grows. You take the seed. You apply certain conditions – the right soil mixture, the right water mixture, the right temperature for it and that seed starts to soften and open and split and grow. It grows because it takes from the environment and becomes completely different expression of itself. Such growth is a magical occurrence that happens all the time around us. That kind of evolution is exactly what our spiritual path is like.

name: Art of Mindful Wealth
description:
Hello and welcome! My name is Leisa Peterson and I am a wealth coach and founder of WealthClinic, a global community for learning, sharing and mindfully expanding our experiences with money. I am really glad you are here!

Part of our mission includes sharing the importance of having greater mindfulness in all that we do.

Mindfulness is our innate ability to be present and to pause before we react to the challenges of our busy lives. As opposed to mindlessness, a mindful person pays greater attention to and has more control over their actions of body, speech and mind which helps them to become a better leader, partner, friend and co-worker.

Our history begins with the convergence of two diametrically opposed worlds: spirituality and finance.

At first glance, nearly everyone thinks these two worlds are complete opposites. Because at best, spirituality is grounded in love and compassion. And at its worst, finance is fueled by greed. But what I eventually discovered is these two worlds are direct reflections of each other.

To understand how, let’s rewind a bit…Back in 1999, I was enjoying a successful career in the financial world. That same year, a family tragedy occurred. To help me heal, I started studying spiritual philosophy and trying to meditate. That’s when I began straddling the two worlds.

As soon as I began looking introspectively, I felt pulled to learn and practice more. At first I attended retreats, signing up for longer ones each time. Eventually, I taught others how to meditate and use mindfulness in their day-to-day lives.

During that time, I was also working for a large bank where I witnessed (and participated in) the euphoric economic rise of the mind-2000’s. Followed by the fiscal meltdown of 2007-2008 and the painful aftermath of the Great Recession.

This front row seat to mayhem caused me to ask many questions like:

Why do we repeatedly engage with money in very unconscious ways?
Why does money, at times, cause us do stupid and silly things?
Is there a way to stop this behavior by applying mindfulness to money?
Since I couldn’t find anyone to answer these questions (from either world), I decided to figure them out on my own.

I’ve always loved research, so I dove deeply into researching the answers. But with each psychological study, expert interview, or book I read…my questions grew. After years of study, I ended up with more questions, but no concrete answers.

Eventually, in my position as a financial adviser, I started asking my clients about their personal experiences with money. That’s when the pieces of the puzzle really came together. I combined their feedback with principles from psychology, sociology, biology/neurology, and philosophy. Then added my 22 years of working with money to my 15+ years of personal spiritual development.

It took all of this to create the comprehensive system we apply at WealthClinic. People using the system see quick, dramatic and positive changes in their experiences with money and much more.

I believe the fact it took insight from so many fields reflects the complexity of money in our modern lives. It’s no wonder we keep repeating our limiting and damaging money behaviors, no matter how hard we try to change!

After watching so many people use our process, here’s what really blew my mind…When we change our experiences with money and learn how to see it with a new lens, we throw a new door wide open. A door to life fulfillment (and greater prosperity!) that often remains undiscovered and closed. But when you open that door, life changes in bigger and better ways than we can ever imagine.

Unlike other wealth building programs that merely tell you to change your money mindset and then everything will improve, WealthClinic programs teach you exactly HOW to:

#1. Improve your inner game, change your money mindset, and take your wealth building habits to the next level,

#2. Own your whole story so that you become the creator of the life you want to live,

#3. Create a money mind map for where you want to go, why you want to go there and how you are going to get there, and

#4. Implement your strategy using a broad range of tools and mindfulness based exercises that support your success in a way that fits perfectly for YOU!

If you are interested in learning more about our wealth mastery programs, you can sign up HERE for a complementary ‘Wealth Accelerator’ 30 minute discussion where you’ll learn the #1 thing holding you back from creating mindful wealth and the steps you can take to create both financial success and greater fulfillment.

Namaste,
Leisa Peterson, MBA, CFP®

P.S. A little more about me in case you’re curious…

I am a California gal who lives in beautiful mountain ski town of Truckee with my awesome family which includes my husband of 22 years, Tim and our exceptional (of course!) children, Zoe and Aidan plus our faithful Queensland Healer, Max.  I LOVE to meditate, hike, ride my BWM dual sport motorcycle, camp and spend time with friends and family talking about deeply meaningful topics (having never been very good at small talk…)  I also love painting (one of my paintings is below) and photography. 

Finally, I am deeply inspired by people who are drawn to spiritual growth especially those who value the importance of being vulnerable and keeping their hearts open even when it seems everything is at risk by doing so.  If any of this speaks to you then I REALLY hope you reach out to me and sign up for our eUpdates as I think you’d like hanging out with our growing community!

name: DriveWealth
description:
DriveWealth, LLC (”DriveWealth”) is a mobile investing platform for individual investors that offers a selection of Exchange Traded Funds (“ETFs”) and US listed stocks. DriveWealth also offers free educational content to help investors understand finance and investing basics. With low fees and account minimums, DriveWealth makes online investing accessible. DriveWealth revolves around investors’ personal goals and offers a social community where everyone can share ideas. DriveWealth is an affordable way to start investing for $2.99 per trade with a $50 account minimum, allowing you to build confidence and work toward your financial goals. 

DriveWealth, LLC is a registered broker-dealer and member of FINRA and SIPC. 

You must be at least 18 years of age and comply with our “Know Your Customer” requirements 
in order to open a live investing account with DriveWealth. 

There are no monthly minimum fees, or required ongoing minimum account balance. For non-resident aliens, there is a one-time tax verification fee of $5.00 (representing Form W-8BEN pass-through processing cost). 

All investing carries risk. Past performance is not indicative of future returns, which may vary. 

Investments in stocks and ETFs may decline in value, potentially leading to a loss of principal. Online trading has inherent risk due to system response and access times that may be affected by various factors, including but not limited to market conditions and system performance. An investor should understand such facts before trading. 

DriveWealth's commission charge of $2.99 per transaction is among the lowest of all online brokers, 
based on Barron's survey of online retail brokers (March 15, 2014). 

DriveWealth communications emanating from its social media community are for informational purposes only and are not intended as an offer or solicitation for the purchase or sale of any financial instrument or as an official confirmation of any transaction.

name: WEALTH - We All Live To Help
description:
WEALTH is an international organization seeking to ground our common battle against global poverty in a proper understanding of the human person and society, and to encourage solutions that foster opportunity and unleash the entrepreneurial spirit that already fills the developing world.
We know there is no single solution to poverty, and good people will disagree about methods, but we have joined together to rethink poverty, encourage discussion and debate, promote effective compassion, and advance entrepreneurial solutions to poverty informed by sound economics, local knowledge, the lessons of history and reflections from the tradition.
Helping the rural poor to build a better life in Pakistan!

Website: www.walth.org

WEALTH works with and shares expertise, resources and knowledge to provide a sustainable future for rural communities.

You can help. Find out how you can aid us with your knowledge
Mission
WEALTH works to facilitate a movement to raise living standards by enhancing socio-economic conditions through an integrated development approach which incorporates reduced use of fossil fuels and encourages the exploration of renewable energy, while ensuring the protection of flora, fauna, and marine life.
Description
WEALTH established in 2014, was formed with the simple vision of providing help to neglected coastal communities in Pakistan. This vision has informed our work ethic.

Our priority in any intervention is to ensure that communities become productive members of society by resolving various developmental issues that have hindered their progress. We firmly believe that their poverty is a complex, multi-layered issue so that development must have an integrated approach for success.

Linda

name: Think Wealth 4 Women
description:
Think Wealth 4 Women was born from a desire to assist all women to Financial Freedom.  Our focus for many years has been to provide Wealth through property and during this time I most definitely can see that women seem to worry more about their finances than anyone.  My role is to educate all women, whether they are married, divorced or loving the single life to a position of confidence around Finance.  Coupled with a great team of specialists and a good dose of nurturing and hand holding, we thought it was time to expand our Think Money network and work even more closely with women in this extremely important area.

With statistics now showing that there are nearly as many single parent families as what there are with a mum, dad and kids, it's becoming more and more apparent that single people do not feel they are being catered for or even heard.  I would like to think that Think Wealth 4 Women becomes an education forum for women to share their knowledge and most importantly learn how to better run their financial area of their lives.  This is my passion.

Think Wealth 4 Women like Think Money, will focus on Mindset and education.  We believe that for the most part of any journey at any point in your life it is all about Mindset.  If you have the right mindset you can tackle anything.    I have been fortunate in my life to have a natural ability to be able to apply myself to any given task and get the result I desire, if not at first most definitely after one or two attempts.  These milestones like many other peoples have been significant and quite frankly could have gone either way.  I could have quit and said too hard, or do what I did which was pick myself up, dust myself off and find someone who I could learn from to get what I want.  I did this, I still do it and I am very pleased to say I have that and much much more of what I want.

Think Wealth 4 Women for me is the nurturing spot of Think Money.  I absolutely love helping anyone get their finances in order and assist in lifting their lifestyle to where they want it to be.  Anyone can learn this information and I feel privileged to have a company complete with a sensational team of people that believe in integrity and educating others.

I invite you to become one of our Think Wealth 4 Women, come learn how to get your finances in order.  We have loads of success stories that range from women of all ages who will be there on the day for you to talk to.

I look forward to meeting with you on the 18th.

With wonderful financial thoughts,
Chris Childs

Quote - "If not now when”

name: Wealth Creations Events
description:
Successful entrepreneurs are the heartbeat of our society; they are the embodiment of courage, vision, insight and perseverance. Through their hard-work and tenacity they create jobs, spur economic growth, innovation and stability. Their success suffuses our world and helps to build a vibrant future for our communities and the economy.

It is no secret that the key drivers of entrepreneurship in Botswana are found in the 18-35 youth age group. Embodied in the young people, is the ideas and the determination with a very clear vision but the challenge comes in the know how.  How can these ideas be brought to life and be made sustainable?  Entrepreneurship, unlike a number of life careers, is not something that can be learnt from your typical classroom and implemented in real life but it can be learnt in a different kind of ‘classroom’, what I call the Millionaire Masterclass.  

The Millionaire Masterclass aims to address the information gap that is usually experienced by many entrepreneurs, particularly the start-up entrepreneur, by bringing in highly successful entrepreneurs who will share their success stories; how they got to where they are now and how they overcame their challenges. With the hope to  provide investment in local businesses should they find a suitable venture. Our main goal seeks to develop a new breed of entrepreneur.

1. "Enneagram x Numerology"course:  the aim of this course is to let you discover the answer to "Who am I?" When you know who you are， you can build stronger family relationships, interpersonal relationships and even achieve career success.

When you know what you want, you will be able to create miracles continually, and build your kingdom of heart wealth through learning to live in the present, reconnecting with your true self and operating on the principle of ZERO Limits.

name: Windle Wealth
description:
At Windle Wealth, we do things a bit differently. We are a wealth management firm located in Oklahoma City with 2 goals. 

1.)To help our clients manage their finances, investments, and future with an open mind and an independent thought process. 

2.). Helping people understand the pitfalls of our industry and why the term, "Financial Advisor" isn't always synonymous with "Knowledge". 

We do this a few different ways. First, we aren't here to impress anyone with a new suit. You might just catch us at the office in shorts, in fact you probably will. So much of our industry is bombarded with suits and ties and smooth lines, but does that really constitute knowledge? We can be ourselves because we are confident in our abilities to help you pursue whatever financial goal that you are shooting for.

We also aren't caught up in the sales process of large firms at your expense. So many firms are teaching their "Advisors" the sales process and hardly anything about actually managing your money. We believe in continuing to educate ourselves and to continue to question everything to constantly stretch our knowledge base. We can leave the sales process to another industry.

Most of all, we are here to do what is right, not only for you but for the industry as a whole and sometimes, that means doing things in a different way.


**Securities offered through LPL Financial, member FINRA/SIPC (www.finra.org and www.sipc.org). Investment advice offered through Private Advisor Group, a registered investment advisor. Private Advisor Group and Windle Wealth, LLC are separate entities from LPL Financial.

Third party posts found on this profile do not reflect the views of LPL Financial and have not been reviewed by LPL Financial as to accuracy or completeness.

For a list of states in which I am/we are registered to do business, please visit www.windlewealth.com**

name: The Wealth Advisory Group
description:
Welcome to the Wealth Advisory Facebook page. I have been looking after the financial needs of Canadians for the past 25 years.

We specialize in Risk Protection, Wealth Creation and Asset Preservation via streamlined financial products including RRSP eligible investments.

Too many Canadians are retiring without a properly funded pension, as there are ONLY 11 million Canadians out of 34 million with a pension plan.

Did you know ONLY 50% of Canadians have a personally owned Life Insurance policy? Of those who are insured, over 87% are under insured.

Our goal is to ensure that a families short term and long term objectives are always protected via well structured risk products.

Our aim is to firstly elevate the financial intelligence quotient in all Canadians and then secondly, create a portfolio that addresses the short term and long term needs of our clients.

We focus on objective and holistic financial planning by asking our clients to navigate thru the financial planning process, via our prosperity software - Manage Your Money.

description:
Wealth Creation is a company set up with the vision and mission to empower all mankind to strive to the BEST possible result in whatever, we are doing.

Why, it named "Wealth Creation"?  It needs to separate the TWO words of "Wealth" and "Creation".  To Tony Lim, a word "Wealth" is not only refer to monetary term.  It is symbol of achievement not only from money perspective, it is a meaning need to look from multi-dimention such as from Academy, Family, Religion, Career as well as Wealth (Money). 

Tony Lim reads a person is considered "Wealthy" when he/she has achieved a rounded achievement from Academy, Family, Religion, Career, Health and Wealth (Money).  

People always mislead by the materialistic world by determining wealth from only CASH/Money term.  It is a wrong perspective.  A true wealth will only forming when a person matches his/her achievement on all rounded from Academy, Family, Religion, Career, Health and Money.  

The reason is a wealthy man who is rich in CASH doesn't mean he is living in a happy life or practicing a good personality.  A real wealthy man should be living a balance life in all perspective.  Therefore, Wealth Creation is created to educate and train all mankind included Students, Teachers, Preachers, Managers, Employee, Employer, Investors, Traders and etc.to achieve a real wealth in their life. 

People always forget about a lifespan of human-being.  We tend to believe living is forever.  But, the matter of fact is WE CAN'T END OF LIFE ALIVE!  Therefore, we should find out the purpose in our life and to strive to achieve it.  It is called fulfillment.  Life is not only about living only, is about feeling of fulfillment in life makes a person to be different. 

The second word of "Creation" means creating a life for a life.  During the time, we were born a count-down clock is formed.  If, we are not going to create a life that belong to us.  It will seem like "Sailing Without A Compass".  Sooner or later, we will get lost.  The worse case, we will be living according to other people, country, friends, relative and society judgement.  To judge whether are we considered successful or wealthy from their perception and judgement.  

Why do we need to live from other people judgement?  As well as not by the life we wish to live as?  Therefore, Wealth Creation will be helping all mankind to find out their true meanings of life and assist them to create their own world to live on.  At the end of the day, fulfillment will be difference from one to another.  

Wealth Creation will help to create a TRUE wealth to us and enjoy the best life we could ever live!

name: BumWealthy
description:
How does one sum up the all-encompassing sound of Bum Wealthy, Columbus Ohio’s most anomalous, genre-juggling musical shapeshifters? They can lead an eager crowd through a rabble-rousing rock ‘n’ roll number & then in a blink of an eye, beatbatter their ears with some bone-shaking bluegrass, only to flip the script on them again moments later with a feast of funk. They’re no strangers to the blues or jazz, and swing is definitely their thing. Ska is no faux pas, they’ve got a little punk in their trunk, some metal in their kettle, and have been known to tropically testify with dubstyle & roots reggae. Even old school country, afrobeat, hip hop, and middle eastern sounds have all reared their decibels in the all-inclusive sound wave pool known as Bum Wealthy. The impressive part is how they can make that wavepool (with such an eclectic range of styles) still transition seamlessly and retain a pop sensibility, all the while flowing smoothly without making those who choose to earsurf it seasick. The end result is an amalgamation of sound so inviting that the boys were invited to play an unexpected second set at 2010's Spring Hookahville. One listen to their new album, Cardboard Kingdom, and you'll understand why these musical chameleons, have played shows with such greats as Michael Franti, Government Mule, Ekoostik Hookah, Keller Williams, Badfish, One Under, The Spikedrivers, Assembly of Dust, Jacob Fred Jazz Odyssey, Rumpke Mountain Boys, The Werks, Papadosio, Zach Deputy & many many more. The only thing more esoteric than the band’s sound is their instrumentation. In a single night, audiences can witness these shapeshifters shuffle through guitars, keys, organ, drums, saxophone, trombone, trumpet, mandolin, banjo, washboard, jawharp, bouzouki, sitar, cigar box guitar, accordian, harmonica, slide whistles, & kazoos all without missing a beat. Formed in 2001, the band has carefullly crafted their sound the past 9 years under the radar, slow-cooking their songs to perfection before finally releasing their debut, Bumpercrop in 2007. Their upcoming sophomore release Cardboard Kingdom portrays the band’s music at it’s full potential. The album was recorded by Ben Miller at Central City Recording, and mastered by Brian Lucey (who has mastered both The Black Keys grammy award-winning album, "Brothers", as well as Dan Auerbach’s
solo album and many other renowned artists. The outcome is an album that exceeds even their biggest critics’(themselves) expectations. The album will be out late September 2011.

name: Francines Wealthy Ways
description:
I am a Network Marketer. One day someone asked me these questions:
•	Could you survive for a couple of years without working in event of an unexpected accident or illness? 
•	What was my plan to get out of debt? 
•	How do I intend to generate enough capital to live well and retire comfortably? 

I had no clue. 

I was doing what Mother Nature intended for me to do by caring for people and animals. In caring for them, I lost sight of finances to care for me. I ended up being laid off from my job one, got injured and lost job two, and then got ill and lost job three. 

It was an awaking. Now I am a Network Marketer. I work from home and my 9 ‘kids’ love it very much; 5 Pomeranian, 3 cats, and a hamster named Godzilla. Life is Good!

This page is about all the things I have learned to help in branding myself, promoting my business and learning social media. Thank you and have a Happy Healthy Wealthy Day!

name: Fountain of Wealth
description: The Fountain of Wealth is listed by the Guinness Book of Records in 1998 as the largest fountain in the world. It is located in one of Singapore's largest shopping malls, Suntec City.During certain periods of the day, the fountain is turned off and visitors are invited to walk around a mini fountain at the centre of the fountain's base to collect coins for good luck. At night, the fountain is the setting for laser performances, as well as live song and laser message dedications between 8pm to 9pm daily. It is situated in such a way the fountain is the hub of the shopping mall.HistoryThe Fountain of Wealth was constructed in 1995, together with the main Suntec City development. A symbol of wealth and life, the Fountain Of Wealth is recognized since 1998 by the Guinness Book Of World Records as the World's Largest Fountain. The bronze ring of the fountain is designed based on the Hindu Mandala, meaning universe and is a symbolic representation of the oneness in spirit and unity and further symbolizes the equality and harmony of all races and religions in Singapore.StructureThe fountain is made of silicon bronze, and consists of a circular ring with a circumference of 66 metres supported on four large slanted columns. It occupies an area of 1683.07 square metres, with a height of 13.8m. The sand cast silicon bronze, including all formwork and patternmaking was designed,manufactured and installed by DCG Design and Meridian Projects (from Melbourne Australia) in 1995. The base area of the fountain is 1,683 square metres. In the design plan of Suntec City, where the five tower blocks represent the fingers and thumb of a left hand emerging from the ground, the fountain forms the palm of the hand.

description:
Marco Robinson is a #1 Bestselling Author, Award Winning Entrepreneur, Award Wining World Renowned Property Investor, Restaurateur and Philanthropist.
He is also the founder of the NAKED Group of Companies including the Naked Restaurant and Bar www.nakedrestaurantkl.com recently opened in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
He has also been honoured for his work recently and been given the title Dato Seri’ from Indonesia equivalent to a Knighthood in England.
He has also appeared on Bloomberg TV, The USA Herald, Readers Digest, the MAIL Online, Ogilvy DO Debates, The Daily Globe, FOX News, The Examiner.com, The Napoleon Hill Foundation, The Star Newspaper Group, The New Strait Times, TV3, TV2, Bernama TV, Capital TV, Astro, etc.

Some say he has a very flamboyant lifestyle, which includes, doing all the things he loves which has included becoming a FILM ACTOR, DJ and MALE MODEL, however, his Lifestyle has inspired millions of others to start doing what they LOVE TO DO.
Marco is a featured actor in the movie “Tangerine Skies”, which starts filming on location in Hawaii January 2015. He will play a powerful supporting Actor’s role as Rocco Carrington. GoldLife Distribution Phils., Inc. is working to expand its business not only in the Philippines, but also in Thailand and Indonesia. and we profess that

name: Align Wealth Management
description:
In these challenging economic times, preserving and growing your wealth is a daunting task.  Investment fads, hidden fees, and rising taxes are relentless.  Meanwhile, financial intermediaries such as brokerage firms, bank trust departments, and insurance companies bombard you, selling expensive, commission-based products and declining a fiduciary role that is meant to protect your best interests. Many investors end up taking too much risk for too little return, receiving mediocre service and conflicted "advice," and paying too much in taxes, commissions, and fees.

We solve these problems. Our passion is helping you make the most of your one financial life. 

At Align Wealth Management, we proudly go against the grain, delivering strictly fiduciary advice, and simple and elegant investment solutions to a discerning group of individuals, families, and small business owners.  We believe in straight talk, good old-fashioned common sense, intense research, hard work on your behalf, and complete transparency.

name: Revolution Wealth
description:
Revolution Wealth's Philosophy.

Financial Planning in South-Africa is such an emotive yet complex service offering. For a 170 years now, the industry leaders have been insisting on remunerating representatives in such a way that it spawns the wrong behaviour... sales targets! We, at Revolution Wealth believe this approach is fundamentally flawed!

Selling or driving monthly sales targets should NOT be the approach to financial planning…it should however be solutions driven through creating, long lasting, solid relationships with clients as to assist them over time to achieve their wants and needs.

Why Revolution Wealth?

When analysing your current financial situation we get a better understanding of the scope of work involved before presenting you with our findings based on your financial circumstances, however, it is far more important to understand how the “status quo” in terms of your financial situation, fits into your greater financial goals, priorities and aspirations, than simply doing the number crunching. 
To get a handle on this, we would have to meet again to discuss your wants and needs. Put simply: help me establish what you would like your money, to do for you? This will help us to conduct a “GAP” analysis i.e. the gap between where you are now...and where it is, you want to be?

There are few certainties in the world of financial planning, but here is one: the actions you take today determine the lifestyle you lead in the future.

Our vision at Revolution Wealth is clear:

We believe in assisting clients to create wealth. 
To help create a living financial plan in everyone’s life that will empower you to make the right financial choices so that you can effectively formulate & achieve your lifestyle goals, reliably over time.
We are committed to an advice led, fees based, client centric, lifetime, financial planning process.
Lifestyle financial planning offers clients an improved way of determining a tailored financial plan, helping them to achieve their long-term goals reliably. Core to our approach is a genuine focus on the client, rather than on selling a financial product. Every client receives a customised living financial plan incorporating his or her lifetime goals and current situation. This plan is reviewed on a regular basis by your “financial coach / planner”.

The coaches’ approach and process starts by addressing the personal aspirations and goals of each client and builds every client's personal financial plan on this very sound and client-specific foundation. In many ways, it turns the traditional financial planning model on its head. This model calls for an advice led, fees-based approach to financial planning, something that very few financial planners embrace.

At Revolution Wealth we embrace this philosophy, we will endeavour to understand exactly what it is you would like to achieve, and set out to make certain recommendations that may lead to implementation.

A simplistic example of this may be for instance -“family protection” (the goal) … i.e. at date of death you may want your wife to have R5000 p/m to look after herself and the children, should she re-marry, her new spouse must not be able to spend your kids maintenance or ‘education fund’. The implementation of my recommendations could potentially be… to draft a new will in such a way that the provisions of a “testamentary trust” at date of death caters for the kind of protection you were looking for. Understand that certain recommendations may lead to implementation… that may have a financial implication now, for example, the cost of setting up a new will.
